GP10bhp_03u:1: BhP_03.01.001/1 evam etat purā pṛṣṭo maitreyo bhagavān kila
GP10bhp_03u:2: BhP_03.01.001/2 kṣattrā vanaṃ praviṣṭena tyaktvā sva-gṛham ṛddhimat
GP10bhp_03u:3: BhP_03.01.002/1 yad vā ayaṃ mantra-kṛd vo bhagavān akhileśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:6: BhP_03.01.003/1 kutra kṣattur bhagavatā maitreyeṇāsa saṅgamaḥ BhP_03.01.003/2 kadā vā saha-saṃvāda etad varṇaya naḥ prabho
GP10bhp_03u:7: BhP_03.01.004/1 na hy alpārthodayas tasya vidurasyāmalātmanaḥ BhP_03.01.004/2 tasmin varīyasi praśnaḥ sādhu-vādopabṛṃhitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:8: BhP_03.01.005/0 sūta uvāca BhP_03.01.005/1 sa evam ṛṣi-varyo 'yaṃ pṛṣṭo rājñā parīkṣitā
GP10bhp_03u:9: BhP_03.01.005/2 praty āha taṃ subahu-vit prītātmā śrūyatām iti
GP10bhp_03u:11: BhP_03.01.006/1 yadā tu rājā sva-sutān asādhūn puṣṇan na dharmeṇa
GP10bhp_03u:13: BhP_03.01.006/2 bhrātur yaviṣṭhasya sutān vibandhūn praveśya lākṣā-bhavane
GP10bhp_03u:15: BhP_03.01.007/1 yadā sabhāyāṃ kuru-deva-devyāḥ keśābhimarśaṃ suta-karma
GP10bhp_03u:17: BhP_03.01.007/2 na vārayām āsa nṛpaḥ snuṣāyāḥ svāsrair harantyāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:19: BhP_03.01.008/1 dyūte tv adharmeṇa jitasya sādhoḥ satyāvalambasya vanaṃ gatasya BhP_03.01.008/2 na yācato 'dāt samayena dāyaṃ tamo-juṣāṇo yad ajāta-śatroḥ
GP10bhp_03u:20: BhP_03.01.009/1 yadā ca pārtha-prahitaḥ sabhāyāṃ jagad-gurur yāni jagāda kṛṣṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:21: BhP_03.01.009/2 na tāni puṃsām amṛtāyanāni rājoru mene kṣata-puṇya-leśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:22: BhP_03.01.010/1 yadopahūto bhavanaṃ praviṣṭo mantrāya pṛṣṭaḥ kila
GP10bhp_03u:24: BhP_03.01.010/2 athāha tan mantra-dṛśāṃ varīyān yan mantriṇo vaidurikaṃ vadanti BhP_03.01.011/1 ajāta-śatroḥ pratiyaccha dāyaṃ titikṣato durviṣahaṃ tavāgaḥ BhP_03.01.011/2 sahānujo yatra vṛkodarāhiḥ śvasan ruṣā yat tvam alaṃ bibheṣi
GP10bhp_03u:25: BhP_03.01.012/1 pārthāṃs tu devo bhagavān mukundo gṛhītavān
GP10bhp_03u:28: BhP_03.01.013/1 sa eṣa doṣaḥ puruṣa-dviḍ āste gṛhān praviṣṭo yam
GP10bhp_03u:30: BhP_03.01.013/2 puṣṇāsi kṛṣṇād vimukho gata-śrīs tyajāśv aśaivaṃ kula-kauśalāya
GP10bhp_03u:35: BhP_03.01.015/1 ka enam atropajuhāva jihmaṃ dāsyāḥ sutaṃ yad-balinaiva
GP10bhp_03u:37: BhP_03.01.015/2 tasmin pratīpaḥ parakṛtya āste nirvāsyatām āśu purāc chvasānaḥ BhP_03.01.016/1 svayaṃ dhanur dvāri nidhāya māyāṃ bhrātuḥ puro marmasu tāḍito 'pi
GP10bhp_03u:38: BhP_03.01.016/2 sa ittham atyulbaṇa-karṇa-bāṇair gata-vyatho 'yād uru mānayānaḥ BhP_03.01.017/1 sa nirgataḥ kaurava-puṇya-labdho gajāhvayāt tīrtha-padaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:40: BhP_03.01.017/2 anvākramat puṇya-cikīrṣayorvyām adhiṣṭhito yāni sahasra-mūrtiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:42: BhP_03.01.018/2 ananta-liṅgaiḥ samalaṅkṛteṣu cacāra tīrthāyataneṣv ananyaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:43: BhP_03.01.019/1 gāṃ paryaṭan medhya-vivikta-vṛttiḥ sadāpluto 'dhaḥ śayano
GP10bhp_03u:45: BhP_03.01.019/2 alakṣitaḥ svair avadhūta-veṣo vratāni cere hari-toṣaṇāni
GP10bhp_03u:46: BhP_03.01.020/1 itthaṃ vrajan bhāratam eva varṣaṃ kālena yāvad gatavān prabhāsam
GP10bhp_03u:47: BhP_03.01.020/2 tāvac chaśāsa kṣitim eka cakrāml ekātapatrām ajitena pārthaḥ BhP_03.01.021/1 tatrātha śuśrāva suhṛd-vinaṣṭiṃ vanaṃ yathā veṇuja-vahni-saṃśrayam
GP10bhp_03u:48: BhP_03.01.021/2 saṃspardhayā dagdham athānuśocan sarasvatīṃ pratyag iyāya
GP10bhp_03u:50: BhP_03.01.022/1 tasyāṃ tritasyośanaso manoś ca pṛthor athāgner asitasya vāyoḥ BhP_03.01.022/2 tīrthaṃ sudāsasya gavāṃ guhasya yac chrāddhadevasya sa āsiṣeve BhP_03.01.023/1 anyāni ceha dvija-deva-devaiḥ kṛtāni nānāyatanāni viṣṇoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:51: BhP_03.01.023/2 pratyaṅga-mukhyāṅkita-mandirāṇi yad-darśanāt kṛṣṇam anusmaranti BhP_03.01.024/1 tatas tv ativrajya surāṣṭram ṛddhaṃ sauvīra-matsyān
GP10bhp_03u:52: kurujāṅgalāṃś ca BhP_03.01.024/2 kālena tāvad yamunām upetya tatroddhavaṃ bhāgavataṃ
GP10bhp_03u:54: BhP_03.01.025/1 sa vāsudevānucaraṃ praśāntaṃ bṛhaspateḥ prāk tanayaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:56: BhP_03.01.025/2 āliṅgya gāḍhaṃ praṇayena bhadraṃ svānām apṛcchad
GP10bhp_03u:58: BhP_03.01.026/1 kaccit purāṇau puruṣau svanābhya- pādmānuvṛttyeha kilāvatīrṇau BhP_03.01.026/2 āsāta urvyāḥ kuśalaṃ vidhāya kṛta-kṣaṇau kuśalaṃ śūra-gehe
GP10bhp_03u:59: BhP_03.01.027/1 kaccit kurūṇāṃ paramaḥ suhṛn no bhāmaḥ sa āste sukham aṅga śauriḥ BhP_03.01.027/2 yo vai svas-ṇāṃ pitṛvad dadāti varān vadānyo
GP10bhp_03u:61: BhP_03.01.028/1 kaccid varūthādhipatir yadūnāṃ pradyumna āste sukham aṅga vīraḥ BhP_03.01.028/2 yaṃ rukmiṇī bhagavato 'bhilebhe ārādhya viprān smaram
GP10bhp_03u:63: BhP_03.01.029/1 kaccit sukhaṃ sātvata-vṛṣṇi-bhoja- dāśārhakāṇām adhipaḥ sa
GP10bhp_03u:65: BhP_03.01.029/2 yam abhyaṣiñcac chata-patra-netro nṛpāsanāśāṃ parihṛtya dūrāt
GP10bhp_03u:66: BhP_03.01.030/1 kaccid dhareḥ saumya sutaḥ sadṛkṣa āste 'graṇī rathināṃ sādhu sāmbaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:67: BhP_03.01.030/2 asūta yaṃ jāmbavatī vratāḍhyā devaṃ guhaṃ yo 'mbikayā
GP10bhp_03u:69: BhP_03.01.031/1 kṣemaṃ sa kaccid yuyudhāna āste yaḥ phālgunāl
GP10bhp_03u:73: BhP_03.01.032/1 kaccid budhaḥ svasty anamīva āste śvaphalka-putro
GP10bhp_03u:77: BhP_03.01.033/1 kaccic chivaṃ devaka-bhoja-putryā viṣṇu-prajāyā iva
GP10bhp_03u:79: BhP_03.01.033/2 yā vai sva-garbheṇa dadhāra devaṃ trayī yathā
GP10bhp_03u:81: BhP_03.01.034/1 apisvid āste bhagavān sukhaṃ vo yaḥ sātvatāṃ kāma-dugho
GP10bhp_03u:83: BhP_03.01.034/2 yam āmananti sma hi śabda-yoniṃ mano-mayaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:85: BhP_03.01.035/1 apisvid anye ca nijātma-daivam ananya-vṛttyā samanuvratā ye BhP_03.01.035/2 hṛdīka-satyātmaja-cārudeṣṇa- gadādayaḥ svasti caranti
GP10bhp_03u:87: BhP_03.01.036/1 api sva-dorbhyāṃ vijayācyutābhyāṃ dharmeṇa dharmaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:88: paripāti setum BhP_03.01.036/2 duryodhano 'tapyata yat-sabhāyāṃ sāmrājya-lakṣmyā
GP10bhp_03u:90: BhP_03.01.037/1 kiṃ vā kṛtāgheṣv agham atyamarṣī bhīmo 'hivad dīrghatamaṃ vyamuñcat BhP_03.01.037/2 yasyāṅghri-pātaṃ raṇa-bhūr na sehe mārgaṃ gadāyāś carato vicitram
GP10bhp_03u:93: BhP_03.01.038/2 alakṣito yac-chara-kūṭa-gūḍho māyā-kirāto giriśas tutoṣa BhP_03.01.039/1 yamāv utasvit tanayau pṛthāyāḥ pārthair vṛtau pakṣmabhir akṣiṇīva BhP_03.01.039/2 remāta uddāya mṛdhe sva-rikthaṃ parāt suparṇāv iva
GP10bhp_03u:95: BhP_03.01.040/1 aho pṛthāpi dhriyate 'rbhakārthe rājarṣi-varyeṇa vināpi tena BhP_03.01.040/2 yas tv eka-vīro 'dhiratho vijigye dhanur dvitīyaḥ kakubhaś catasraḥ BhP_03.01.041/1 saumyānuśoce tam adhaḥ-patantaṃ bhrātre paretāya vidudruhe
GP10bhp_03u:97: BhP_03.01.041/2 niryāpito yena suhṛt sva-puryā ahaṃ sva-putrān
GP10bhp_03u:99: BhP_03.01.042/1 so 'haṃ harer martya-viḍambanena dṛśo nṛṇāṃ cālayato
GP10bhp_03u:101: BhP_03.01.042/2 nānyopalakṣyaḥ padavīṃ prasādāc carāmi paśyan gata-vismayo
GP10bhp_03u:103: BhP_03.01.043/1 nūnaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ tri-madotpathānāṃ mahīṃ muhuś cālayatāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:105: BhP_03.01.043/2 vadhāt prapannārti-jihīrṣayeśo 'py upaikṣatāghaṃ bhagavān kurūṇām
GP10bhp_03u:106: BhP_03.01.044/1 ajasya janmotpatha-nāśanāya karmāṇy akartur grahaṇāya
GP10bhp_03u:108: BhP_03.01.044/2 nanv anyathā ko 'rhati deha-yogaṃ paro guṇānām uta
GP10bhp_03u:110: BhP_03.01.045/1 tasya prapannākhila-lokapānām avasthitānām anuśāsane sve
GP10bhp_03u:111: BhP_03.01.045/2 arthāya jātasya yaduṣv ajasya vārtāṃ sakhe kīrtaya
GP10bhp_03u:114: BhP_03.02.001/1 iti bhāgavataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā vārtāṃ priyāśrayām
GP10bhp_03u:115: BhP_03.02.001/2 prativaktuṃ na cotseha autkaṇṭhyāt smāriteśvaraḥ BhP_03.02.002/1 yaḥ pañca-hāyano mātrā prātar-āśāya yācitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:116: BhP_03.02.002/2 tan naicchad racayan yasya saparyāṃ bāla-līlayā
GP10bhp_03u:117: BhP_03.02.003/1 sa kathaṃ sevayā tasya kālena jarasaṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:118: BhP_03.02.003/2 pṛṣṭo vārtāṃ pratibrūyād bhartuḥ pādāv anusmaran
GP10bhp_03u:119: BhP_03.02.004/1 sa muhūrtam abhūt tūṣṇīṃ kṛṣṇāṅghri-sudhayā bhṛśam
GP10bhp_03u:120: BhP_03.02.004/2 tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena nimagnaḥ sādhu nirvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:123: BhP_03.02.006/1 śanakair bhagaval-lokān nṛlokaṃ punar āgataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:124: BhP_03.02.006/2 vimṛjya netre viduraṃ prītyāhoddhava utsmayan BhP_03.02.007/0 uddhava uvāca BhP_03.02.007/1 kṛṣṇa-dyumaṇi nimloce gīrṇeṣv ajagareṇa ha
GP10bhp_03u:125: BhP_03.02.007/2 kiṃ nu naḥ kuśalaṃ brūyāṃ gata-śrīṣu gṛheṣv aham BhP_03.02.008/1 durbhago bata loko 'yaṃ yadavo nitarām api
GP10bhp_03u:126: BhP_03.02.008/2 ye saṃvasanto na vidur hariṃ mīnā ivoḍupam
GP10bhp_03u:127: BhP_03.02.009/1 iṅgita-jñāḥ puru-prauḍhā ekārāmāś ca sātvatāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:128: BhP_03.02.009/2 sātvatām ṛṣabhaṃ sarve bhūtāvāsam amaṃsata BhP_03.02.010/1 devasya māyayā spṛṣṭā ye cānyad asad-āśritāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:129: BhP_03.02.010/2 bhrāmyate dhīr na tad-vākyair ātmany uptātmano harau
GP10bhp_03u:131: BhP_03.02.011/2 ādāyāntar adhād yas tu sva-bimbaṃ loka-locanam
GP10bhp_03u:132: BhP_03.02.012/1 yan martya-līlaupayikaṃ sva-yoga- māyā-balaṃ darśayatā gṛhītam BhP_03.02.012/2 vismāpanaṃ svasya ca saubhagarddheḥ paraṃ padaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:134: BhP_03.02.013/1 yad dharma-sūnor bata rājasūye nirīkṣya dṛk-svastyayanaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:136: BhP_03.02.013/2 kārtsnyena cādyeha gataṃ vidhātur arvāk-sṛtau kauśalam ity amanyata
GP10bhp_03u:138: BhP_03.02.014/2 vraja-striyo dṛgbhir anupravṛtta- dhiyo 'vatasthuḥ kila
GP10bhp_03u:140: BhP_03.02.015/1 sva-śānta-rūpeṣv itaraiḥ sva-rūpair abhyardyamāneṣv anukampitātmā BhP_03.02.015/2 parāvareśo mahad-aṃśa-yukto hy ajo 'pi jāto bhagavān yathāgniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:141: BhP_03.02.016/1 māṃ khedayaty etad ajasya janma- viḍambanaṃ yad vasudeva-gehe
GP10bhp_03u:142: BhP_03.02.016/2 vraje ca vāso 'ri-bhayād iva svayaṃ purād vyavātsīd
GP10bhp_03u:144: BhP_03.02.017/1 dunoti cetaḥ smarato mamaitad yad āha pādāv abhivandya pitroḥ
GP10bhp_03u:145: BhP_03.02.017/2 tātāmba kaṃsād uru-śaṅkitānāṃ prasīdataṃ no 'kṛta-niṣkṛtīnām
GP10bhp_03u:146: BhP_03.02.018/1 ko vā amuṣyāṅghri-saroja-reṇuṃ vismartum īśīta pumān
GP10bhp_03u:148: BhP_03.02.018/2 yo visphurad-bhrū-viṭapena bhūmer bhāraṃ kṛtāntena
GP10bhp_03u:150: BhP_03.02.019/1 dṛṣṭā bhavadbhir nanu rājasūye caidyasya kṛṣṇaṃ dviṣato
GP10bhp_03u:152: BhP_03.02.019/2 yāṃ yoginaḥ saṃspṛhayanti samyag yogena kas tad-virahaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:154: BhP_03.02.020/1 tathaiva cānye nara-loka-vīrā ya āhave kṛṣṇa-mukhāravindam
GP10bhp_03u:155: BhP_03.02.020/2 netraiḥ pibanto nayanābhirāmaṃ pārthāstra-pūtaḥ padam āpur asya
GP10bhp_03u:160: BhP_03.02.022/1 tat tasya kaiṅkaryam alaṃ bhṛtān no viglāpayaty aṅga yad
GP10bhp_03u:162: BhP_03.02.022/2 tiṣṭhan niṣaṇṇaṃ parameṣṭhi-dhiṣṇye nyabodhayad deva nidhārayeti
GP10bhp_03u:163: BhP_03.02.023/1 aho bakī yaṃ stana-kāla-kūṭaṃ jighāṃsayāpāyayad apy asādhvī
GP10bhp_03u:164: BhP_03.02.023/2 lebhe gatiṃ dhātry-ucitāṃ tato 'nyaṃ kaṃ vā dayāluṃ
GP10bhp_03u:165: śaraṇaṃ vrajema BhP_03.02.024/1 manye 'surān bhāgavatāṃs tryadhīśe saṃrambha-mārgābhiniviṣṭa-cittān
GP10bhp_03u:166: BhP_03.02.024/2 ye saṃyuge 'cakṣata tārkṣya-putram aṃse sunābhāyudham āpatantam
GP10bhp_03u:168: BhP_03.02.025/2 cikīrṣur bhagavān asyāḥ śam ajenābhiyācitaḥ BhP_03.02.026/1 tato nanda-vrajam itaḥ pitrā kaṃsād vibibhyatā
GP10bhp_03u:169: BhP_03.02.026/2 ekādaśa samās tatra gūḍhārciḥ sa-balo 'vasat
GP10bhp_03u:170: BhP_03.02.027/1 parīto vatsapair vatsāṃś cārayan vyaharad vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:172: BhP_03.02.028/1 kaumārīṃ darśayaṃś ceṣṭāṃ prekṣaṇīyāṃ vrajaukasām BhP_03.02.028/2 rudann iva hasan mugdha- bāla-siṃhāvalokanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:173: BhP_03.02.029/1 sa eva go-dhanaṃ lakṣmyā niketaṃ sita-go-vṛṣam
GP10bhp_03u:174: BhP_03.02.029/2 cārayann anugān gopān raṇad-veṇur arīramat
GP10bhp_03u:176: BhP_03.02.030/2 līlayā vyanudat tāṃs tān bālaḥ krīḍanakān iva
GP10bhp_03u:177: BhP_03.02.031/1 vipannān viṣa-pānena nigṛhya bhujagādhipam BhP_03.02.031/2 utthāpyāpāyayad gāvas tat toyaṃ prakṛti-sthitam
GP10bhp_03u:179: BhP_03.02.032/2 vittasya coru-bhārasya cikīrṣan sad-vyayaṃ vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:181: BhP_03.02.033/2 gotra-līlātapatreṇa trāto bhadrānugṛhṇatā BhP_03.02.034/1 śarac-chaśi-karair mṛṣṭaṃ mānayan rajanī-mukham
GP10bhp_03u:182: BhP_03.02.034/2 gāyan kala-padaṃ reme strīṇāṃ maṇḍala-maṇḍanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:183: BhP_03.03.001/0 uddhava uvāca BhP_03.03.001/1 tataḥ sa āgatya puraṃ sva-pitroś cikīrṣayā śaṃ baladeva-saṃyutaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:184: BhP_03.03.001/2 nipātya tuṅgād ripu-yūtha-nāthaṃ hataṃ vyakarṣad vyasum
GP10bhp_03u:186: BhP_03.03.002/1 sāndīpaneḥ sakṛt proktaṃ brahmādhītya sa-vistaram
GP10bhp_03u:187: BhP_03.03.002/2 tasmai prādād varaṃ putraṃ mṛtaṃ pañca-janodarāt
GP10bhp_03u:188: BhP_03.03.003/1 samāhutā bhīṣmaka-kanyayā ye śriyaḥ savarṇena
GP10bhp_03u:190: BhP_03.03.003/2 gāndharva-vṛttyā miṣatāṃ sva-bhāgaṃ jahre padaṃ mūrdhni
GP10bhp_03u:191: dadhat suparṇaḥ BhP_03.03.004/1 kakudmino 'viddha-naso damitvā svayaṃvare nāgnajitīm uvāha
GP10bhp_03u:194: BhP_03.03.005/1 priyaṃ prabhur grāmya iva priyāyā vidhitsur ārcchad dyutaruṃ yad-arthe
GP10bhp_03u:195: BhP_03.03.005/2 vajry ādravat taṃ sa-gaṇo ruṣāndhaḥ krīḍā-mṛgo nūnam ayaṃ vadhūnām
GP10bhp_03u:196: BhP_03.03.006/1 sutaṃ mṛdhe khaṃ vapuṣā grasantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sunābhonmathitaṃ dharitryā BhP_03.03.006/2 āmantritas tat-tanayāya śeṣaṃ dattvā tad-antaḥ-puram
GP10bhp_03u:198: BhP_03.03.007/1 tatrāhṛtās tā nara-deva-kanyāḥ kujena dṛṣṭvā harim
GP10bhp_03u:202: BhP_03.03.008/1 āsāṃ muhūrta ekasmin nānāgāreṣu yoṣitām BhP_03.03.008/2 sa-vidhaṃ jagṛhe pāṇīn anurūpaḥ sva-māyayā
GP10bhp_03u:203: BhP_03.03.009/1 tāsv apatyāny ajanayad ātma-tulyāni sarvataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:204: BhP_03.03.009/2 ekaikasyāṃ daśa daśa prakṛter vibubhūṣayā BhP_03.03.010/1 kāla-māgadha-śālvādīn anīkai rundhataḥ puram
GP10bhp_03u:205: BhP_03.03.010/2 ajīghanat svayaṃ divyaṃ sva-puṃsāṃ teja ādiśat BhP_03.03.011/1 śambaraṃ dvividaṃ bāṇaṃ muraṃ balvalam eva ca
GP10bhp_03u:206: BhP_03.03.011/2 anyāṃś ca dantavakrādīn avadhīt kāṃś ca ghātayat
GP10bhp_03u:207: BhP_03.03.012/1 atha te bhrātṛ-putrāṇāṃ pakṣayoḥ patitān nṛpān
GP10bhp_03u:208: BhP_03.03.012/2 cacāla bhūḥ kurukṣetraṃ yeṣām āpatatāṃ balaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:211: BhP_03.03.013/2 suyodhanaṃ sānucaraṃ śayānaṃ bhagnorum ūrvyāṃ na nananda paśyan BhP_03.03.014/1 kiyān bhuvo 'yaṃ kṣapitoru-bhāro yad
GP10bhp_03u:213: BhP_03.03.014/2 aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇiko mad-aṃśair āste balaṃ durviṣahaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:215: BhP_03.03.015/1 mitho yadaiṣāṃ bhavitā vivādo madhv-āmadātāmra-vilocanānām
GP10bhp_03u:216: BhP_03.03.015/2 naiṣāṃ vadhopāya iyān ato 'nyo mayy udyate 'ntardadhate
GP10bhp_03u:217: svayaṃ sma BhP_03.03.016/1 evaṃ sañcintya bhagavān sva-rājye sthāpya dharmajam BhP_03.03.016/2 nandayām āsa suhṛdaḥ sādhūnāṃ vartma darśayan
GP10bhp_03u:218: BhP_03.03.017/1 uttarāyāṃ dhṛtaḥ pūror vaṃśaḥ sādhv-abhimanyunā
GP10bhp_03u:219: BhP_03.03.017/2 sa vai drauṇy-astra-sampluṣṭaḥ punar bhagavatā dhṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:220: BhP_03.03.018/1 ayājayad dharma-sutam aśvamedhais tribhir vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:221: BhP_03.03.018/2 so 'pi kṣmām anujai rakṣan reme kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:223: BhP_03.03.019/2 kāmān siṣeve dvārvatyām asaktaḥ sāṅkhyam āsthitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:226: BhP_03.03.021/1 imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva ramayan sutarāṃ yadūn
GP10bhp_03u:230: BhP_03.03.023/1 daivādhīneṣu kāmeṣu daivādhīnaḥ svayaṃ pumān BhP_03.03.023/2 ko viśrambheta yogena yogeśvaram anuvrataḥ BhP_03.03.024/1 puryāṃ kadācit krīḍadbhir yadu-bhoja-kumārakaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:233: BhP_03.03.025/2 yayuḥ prabhāsaṃ saṃhṛṣṭā rathair deva-vimohitāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:234: BhP_03.03.026/1 tatra snātvā pit-n devān ṛṣīṃś caiva tad-ambhasā
GP10bhp_03u:235: BhP_03.03.026/2 tarpayitvātha viprebhyo gāvo bahu-guṇā daduḥ
GP10bhp_03u:236: BhP_03.03.027/1 hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ śayyāṃ vāsāṃsy ajina-kambalān
GP10bhp_03u:237: BhP_03.03.027/2 yānaṃ rathān ibhān kanyā dharāṃ vṛtti-karīm api
GP10bhp_03u:238: BhP_03.03.028/1 annaṃ coru-rasaṃ tebhyo dattvā bhagavad-arpaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:239: BhP_03.03.028/2 go-viprārthāsavaḥ śūrāḥ praṇemur bhuvi mūrdhabhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:240: BhP_03.04.001/0 uddhava uvāca BhP_03.04.001/1 atha te tad-anujñātā bhuktvā pītvā ca vāruṇīm
GP10bhp_03u:241: BhP_03.04.001/2 tayā vibhraṃśita-jñānā duruktair marma paspṛśuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:243: BhP_03.04.002/2 nimlocati ravāv āsīd veṇūnām iva mardanam
GP10bhp_03u:244: BhP_03.04.003/1 bhagavān svātma-māyāyā gatiṃ tām avalokya saḥ
GP10bhp_03u:246: BhP_03.04.004/1 ahaṃ cokto bhagavatā prapannārti-hareṇa ha
GP10bhp_03u:247: BhP_03.04.004/2 badarīṃ tvaṃ prayāhīti sva-kulaṃ sañjihīrṣuṇā
GP10bhp_03u:248: BhP_03.04.005/1 tathāpi tad-abhipretaṃ jānann aham arindama
GP10bhp_03u:250: BhP_03.04.006/1 adrākṣam ekam āsīnaṃ vicinvan dayitaṃ patim
GP10bhp_03u:253: BhP_03.04.007/2 dorbhiś caturbhir viditaṃ pīta-kauśāmbareṇa ca
GP10bhp_03u:257: BhP_03.04.009/2 lokān anucaran siddha āsasāda yadṛcchayā BhP_03.04.010/1 tasyānuraktasya muner mukundaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:259: BhP_03.04.010/2 āśṛṇvato mām anurāga-hāsa- samīkṣayā viśramayann uvāca
GP10bhp_03u:261: BhP_03.04.011/1 vedāham antar manasīpsitaṃ te dadāmi yat tad duravāpam anyaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:262: BhP_03.04.011/2 satre purā viśva-sṛjāṃ vasūnāṃ mat-siddhi-kāmena vaso tvayeṣṭaḥ BhP_03.04.012/1 sa eṣa sādho caramo bhavānām āsāditas te mad-anugraho yat
GP10bhp_03u:263: BhP_03.04.012/2 yan māṃ nṛlokān raha utsṛjantaṃ diṣṭyā dadṛśvān viśadānuvṛttyā BhP_03.04.013/1 purā mayā proktam ajāya nābhye padme niṣaṇṇāya
GP10bhp_03u:265: BhP_03.04.013/2 jñānaṃ paraṃ man-mahimāvabhāsaṃ yat sūrayo bhāgavataṃ
GP10bhp_03u:267: BhP_03.04.014/1 ity ādṛtoktaḥ paramasya puṃsaḥ pratikṣaṇānugraha-bhājano
GP10bhp_03u:269: BhP_03.04.014/2 snehottha-romā skhalitākṣaras taṃ muñcañ chucaḥ prāñjalir ābabhāṣe
GP10bhp_03u:270: BhP_03.04.015/1 ko nv īśa te pāda-saroja-bhājāṃ sudurlabho 'rtheṣu caturṣv apīha BhP_03.04.015/2 tathāpi nāhaṃ pravṛṇomi bhūman
GP10bhp_03u:272: BhP_03.04.016/1 karmāṇy anīhasya bhavo 'bhavasya te durgāśrayo 'thāri-bhayāt palāyanam
GP10bhp_03u:273: BhP_03.04.016/2 kālātmano yat pramadā-yutāśramaḥ svātman-rateḥ khidyati dhīr vidām iha
GP10bhp_03u:274: BhP_03.04.017/1 mantreṣu māṃ vā upahūya yat tvam
GP10bhp_03u:276: BhP_03.04.017/2 pṛccheḥ prabho mugdha ivāpramattas tan no mano mohayatīva deva
GP10bhp_03u:277: BhP_03.04.018/1 jñānaṃ paraṃ svātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ provāca kasmai bhagavān
GP10bhp_03u:279: BhP_03.04.018/2 api kṣamaṃ no grahaṇāya bhartar vadāñjasā yad vṛjinaṃ tarema
GP10bhp_03u:280: BhP_03.04.019/1 ity āvedita-hārdāya mahyaṃ sa bhagavān paraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:284: BhP_03.04.020/2 praṇamya pādau parivṛtya devam ihāgato 'haṃ virahāturātmā
GP10bhp_03u:287: BhP_03.04.022/1 yatra nārāyaṇo devo naraś ca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:288: BhP_03.04.022/2 mṛdu tīvraṃ tapo dīrghaṃ tepāte loka-bhāvanau
GP10bhp_03u:290: BhP_03.04.023/1 ity uddhavād upākarṇya suhṛdāṃ duḥsahaṃ vadham
GP10bhp_03u:291: BhP_03.04.023/2 jñānenāśamayat kṣattā śokam utpatitaṃ budhaḥ BhP_03.04.024/1 sa taṃ mahā-bhāgavataṃ vrajantaṃ kauravarṣabhaḥ BhP_03.04.024/2 viśrambhād abhyadhattedaṃ mukhyaṃ kṛṣṇa-parigrahe
GP10bhp_03u:292: BhP_03.04.025/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.04.025/1 jñānaṃ paraṃ svātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ yad āha
GP10bhp_03u:293: īśvaras te BhP_03.04.025/2 vaktuṃ bhavān no 'rhati yad dhi viṣṇor bhṛtyāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:295: BhP_03.04.026/0 uddhava uvāca BhP_03.04.026/1 nanu te tattva-saṃrādhya ṛṣiḥ kauṣāravo 'ntike
GP10bhp_03u:298: BhP_03.04.027/1 iti saha vidureṇa viśva-mūrter guṇa-kathayā sudhayā plāvitorutāpaḥ BhP_03.04.027/2 kṣaṇam iva puline yamasvasus tāṃ samuṣita aupagavir niśāṃ tato 'gāt
GP10bhp_03u:302: BhP_03.04.028/2 sa tu katham avaśiṣṭa uddhavo yad dharir api tatyaja
GP10bhp_03u:305: BhP_03.04.029/2 saṃhṛtya sva-kulaṃ sphītaṃ tyakṣyan deham acintayat
GP10bhp_03u:306: BhP_03.04.030/1 asmāl lokād uparate mayi jñānaṃ mad-āśrayam
GP10bhp_03u:307: BhP_03.04.030/2 arhaty uddhava evāddhā sampraty ātmavatāṃ varaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:308: BhP_03.04.031/1 noddhavo 'ṇv api man-nyūno yad guṇair nārditaḥ prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:309: BhP_03.04.031/2 ato mad-vayunaṃ lokaṃ grāhayann iha tiṣṭhatu
GP10bhp_03u:311: BhP_03.04.032/2 badaryāśramam āsādya harim īje samādhinā BhP_03.04.033/1 viduro 'py uddhavāc chrutvā kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:313: BhP_03.04.034/1 deha-nyāsaṃ ca tasyaivaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ dhairya-vardhanam
GP10bhp_03u:315: BhP_03.04.035/1 ātmānaṃ ca kuru-śreṣṭha kṛṣṇena manasekṣitam BhP_03.04.035/2 dhyāyan gate bhāgavate ruroda prema-vihvalaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:316: BhP_03.04.036/1 kālindyāḥ katibhiḥ siddha ahobhir bharatarṣabha BhP_03.04.036/2 prāpadyata svaḥ-saritaṃ yatra mitrā-suto muniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:318: BhP_03.05.001/1 dvāri dyu-nadyā ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇāṃ maitreyam āsīnam
GP10bhp_03u:322: BhP_03.05.002/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.05.002/1 sukhāya karmāṇi karoti loko na taiḥ sukhaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:324: BhP_03.05.002/2 vindeta bhūyas tata eva duḥkhaṃ yad atra yuktaṃ bhagavān
GP10bhp_03u:325: vaden naḥ BhP_03.05.003/1 janasya kṛṣṇād vimukhasya daivād adharma-śīlasya
GP10bhp_03u:327: BhP_03.05.003/2 anugrahāyeha caranti nūnaṃ bhūtāni bhavyāni janārdanasya
GP10bhp_03u:328: BhP_03.05.004/1 tat sādhu-varyādiśa vartma śaṃ naḥ saṃrādhito bhagavān yena puṃsām BhP_03.05.004/2 hṛdi sthito yacchati bhakti-pūte jñānaṃ sa-tattvādhigamaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:330: BhP_03.05.005/1 karoti karmāṇi kṛtāvatāro yāny ātma-tantro bhagavāṃs tryadhīśaḥ BhP_03.05.005/2 yathā sasarjāgra idaṃ nirīhaḥ saṃsthāpya vṛttiṃ jagato vidhatte BhP_03.05.006/1 yathā punaḥ sve kha idaṃ niveśya śete guhāyāṃ sa
GP10bhp_03u:332: BhP_03.05.006/2 yogeśvarādhīśvara eka etad anupraviṣṭo bahudhā yathāsīt
GP10bhp_03u:333: BhP_03.05.007/1 krīḍan vidhatte dvija-go-surāṇāṃ kṣemāya karmāṇy avatāra-bhedaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:334: BhP_03.05.007/2 mano na tṛpyaty api śṛṇvatāṃ naḥ suśloka-mauleś
GP10bhp_03u:336: BhP_03.05.008/1 yais tattva-bhedair adhiloka-nātho lokān alokān saha
GP10bhp_03u:338: BhP_03.05.008/2 acīkḷpad yatra hi sarva-sattva- nikāya-bhedo 'dhikṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:340: BhP_03.05.009/1 yena prajānām uta ātma-karma- rūpābhidhānāṃ ca bhidāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:342: BhP_03.05.009/2 nārāyaṇo viśvasṛg ātma-yonir etac ca no varṇaya
GP10bhp_03u:344: BhP_03.05.010/1 parāvareṣāṃ bhagavan vratāni śrutāni me vyāsa-mukhād
GP10bhp_03u:346: BhP_03.05.010/2 atṛpnuma kṣulla-sukhāvahānāṃ teṣām ṛte kṛṣṇa-kathāmṛtaughāt
GP10bhp_03u:347: BhP_03.05.011/1 kas tṛpnuyāt tīrtha-pado 'bhidhānāt satreṣu vaḥ sūribhir
GP10bhp_03u:349: BhP_03.05.011/2 yaḥ karṇa-nāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhava-pradāṃ geha-ratiṃ
GP10bhp_03u:351: BhP_03.05.012/1 munir vivakṣur bhagavad-guṇānāṃ sakhāpi te bhāratam āha kṛṣṇaḥ BhP_03.05.012/2 yasmin nṛṇāṃ grāmya-sukhānuvādair matir gṛhītā nu hareḥ kathāyām BhP_03.05.013/1 sā śraddadhānasya vivardhamānā viraktim anyatra karoti
GP10bhp_03u:353: BhP_03.05.013/2 hareḥ padānusmṛti-nirvṛtasya samasta-duḥkhāpyayam āśu dhatte BhP_03.05.014/1 tāñ chocya-śocyān avido 'nuśoce hareḥ kathāyāṃ vimukhān
GP10bhp_03u:355: BhP_03.05.014/2 kṣiṇoti devo 'nimiṣas tu yeṣām āyur
GP10bhp_03u:357: BhP_03.05.015/1 tad asya kauṣārava śarma-dātur hareḥ kathām eva kathāsu sāram BhP_03.05.015/2 uddhṛtya puṣpebhya ivārta-bandho śivāya naḥ kīrtaya
GP10bhp_03u:361: BhP_03.05.016/2 cakāra karmāṇy atipūruṣāṇi yānīśvaraḥ kīrtaya tāni mahyam
GP10bhp_03u:363: BhP_03.05.017/1 sa evaṃ bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā kauṣāravo muniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:364: BhP_03.05.017/2 puṃsāṃ niḥśreyasārthena tam āha bahu-mānayan
GP10bhp_03u:365: BhP_03.05.018/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.05.018/1 sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sādho lokān sādhv anugṛhṇatā
GP10bhp_03u:367: BhP_03.05.019/1 naitac citraṃ tvayi kṣattar bādarāyaṇa-vīryaje
GP10bhp_03u:368: BhP_03.05.019/2 gṛhīto 'nanya-bhāvena yat tvayā harir īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:370: BhP_03.05.020/2 bhrātuḥ kṣetre bhujiṣyāyāṃ jātaḥ satyavatī-sutāt
GP10bhp_03u:371: BhP_03.05.021/1 bhavān bhagavato nityaṃ sammataḥ sānugasya ha
GP10bhp_03u:372: BhP_03.05.021/2 yasya jñānopadeśāya mādiśad bhagavān vrajan BhP_03.05.022/1 atha te bhagaval-līlā
GP10bhp_03u:373: BhP_03.05.022/2 viśva-sthity-udbhavāntārthā varṇayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ BhP_03.05.023/1 bhagavān eka āsedam agra ātmātmanāṃ vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:375: BhP_03.05.024/1 sa vā eṣa tadā draṣṭā nāpaśyad dṛśyam ekarāṭ BhP_03.05.024/2 mene 'santam ivātmānaṃ supta-śaktir asupta-dṛk
GP10bhp_03u:376: BhP_03.05.025/1 sā vā etasya saṃdraṣṭuḥ śaktiḥ sad-asad-ātmikā
GP10bhp_03u:377: BhP_03.05.025/2 māyā nāma mahā-bhāga yayedaṃ nirmame vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:378: BhP_03.05.026/1 kāla-vṛttyā tu māyāyāṃ guṇa-mayyām adhokṣajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:383: BhP_03.05.028/2 ātmānaṃ vyakarod ātmā viśvasyāsya sisṛkṣayā BhP_03.05.029/1 mahat-tattvād vikurvāṇād ahaṃ-tattvaṃ vyajāyata
GP10bhp_03u:385: BhP_03.05.030/1 vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tridhā
GP10bhp_03u:386: BhP_03.05.030/2 ahaṃ-tattvād vikurvāṇān mano vaikārikād abhūt
GP10bhp_03u:387: BhP_03.05.030/3 vaikārikāś ca ye devā arthābhivyañjanaṃ yataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:389: BhP_03.05.031/2 tāmaso bhūta-sūkṣmādir yataḥ khaṃ liṅgam ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:393: BhP_03.05.033/2 sasarja rūpa-tanmātraṃ jyotir lokasya locanam
GP10bhp_03u:398: BhP_03.05.036/1 bhūtānāṃ nabha-ādīnāṃ yad yad bhavyāvarāvaram
GP10bhp_03u:399: BhP_03.05.036/2 teṣāṃ parānusaṃsargād yathā saṅkhyaṃ guṇān viduḥ
GP10bhp_03u:400: BhP_03.05.037/1 ete devāḥ kalā viṣṇoḥ kāla-māyāṃśa-liṅginaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:401: BhP_03.05.037/2 nānātvāt sva-kriyānīśāḥ procuḥ prāñjalayo vibhum
GP10bhp_03u:402: BhP_03.05.038/0 devā ūcuḥ BhP_03.05.038/1 namāma te deva padāravindaṃ prapanna-tāpopaśamātapatram
GP10bhp_03u:403: BhP_03.05.038/2 yan-mūla-ketā yatayo 'ñjasoru- saṃsāra-duḥkhaṃ bahir utkṣipanti BhP_03.05.039/1 dhātar yad asmin bhava īśa jīvās tāpa-trayeṇābhihatā na śarma BhP_03.05.039/2 ātman labhante bhagavaṃs tavāṅghri- cchāyāṃ sa-vidyām ata āśrayema BhP_03.05.040/1 mārganti yat te mukha-padma-nīḍaiś chandaḥ-suparṇair ṛṣayo vivikte BhP_03.05.040/2 yasyāgha-marṣoda-sarid-varāyāḥ padaṃ padaṃ tīrtha-padaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:405: BhP_03.05.041/1 yac chraddhayā śrutavatyā ca bhaktyā sammṛjyamāne hṛdaye
GP10bhp_03u:407: BhP_03.05.041/2 jñānena vairāgya-balena dhīrā vrajema tat te
GP10bhp_03u:409: BhP_03.05.042/1 viśvasya janma-sthiti-saṃyamārthe kṛtāvatārasya padāmbujaṃ te
GP10bhp_03u:410: BhP_03.05.042/2 vrajema sarve śaraṇaṃ yad īśa smṛtaṃ prayacchaty abhayaṃ sva-puṃsām
GP10bhp_03u:411: BhP_03.05.043/1 yat sānubandhe 'sati deha-gehe mamāham ity ūḍha-durāgrahāṇām
GP10bhp_03u:412: BhP_03.05.043/2 puṃsāṃ sudūraṃ vasato 'pi puryāṃ bhajema tat te bhagavan padābjam
GP10bhp_03u:413: BhP_03.05.044/1 tān vai hy asad-vṛttibhir akṣibhir ye parāhṛtāntar-manasaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:415: BhP_03.05.044/2 atho na paśyanty urugāya nūnaṃ ye te
GP10bhp_03u:417: BhP_03.05.045/1 pānena te deva kathā-sudhāyāḥ pravṛddha-bhaktyā viśadāśayā ye BhP_03.05.045/2 vairāgya-sāraṃ pratilabhya bodhaṃ yathāñjasānvīyur
GP10bhp_03u:419: BhP_03.05.046/1 tathāpare cātma-samādhi-yoga- balena jitvā prakṛtiṃ
GP10bhp_03u:421: BhP_03.05.046/2 tvām eva dhīrāḥ puruṣaṃ viśanti teṣāṃ śramaḥ syān na tu sevayā te
GP10bhp_03u:422: BhP_03.05.047/1 tat te vayaṃ loka-sisṛkṣayādya tvayānusṛṣṭās tribhir ātmabhiḥ sma BhP_03.05.047/2 sarve viyuktāḥ sva-vihāra-tantraṃ na śaknumas tat
GP10bhp_03u:423: pratihartave te BhP_03.05.048/1 yāvad baliṃ te 'ja harāma kāle yathā vayaṃ cānnam adāma
GP10bhp_03u:425: BhP_03.05.048/2 yathobhayeṣāṃ ta ime hi lokā baliṃ haranto 'nnam adanty anūhāḥ BhP_03.05.049/1 tvaṃ naḥ surāṇām asi sānvayānāṃ kūṭa-stha ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:426: BhP_03.05.049/2 tvaṃ deva śaktyāṃ guṇa-karma-yonau retas tv ajāyāṃ kavim ādadhe 'jaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:427: BhP_03.05.050/1 tato vayaṃ mat-pramukhā yad-arthe babhūvimātman karavāma kiṃ te BhP_03.05.050/2 tvaṃ naḥ sva-cakṣuḥ paridehi śaktyā deva kriyārthe
GP10bhp_03u:429: BhP_03.06.001/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_03.06.001/1 iti tāsāṃ sva-śaktīnāṃ satīnām asametya saḥ
GP10bhp_03u:431: BhP_03.06.002/1 kāla-sañjñāṃ tadā devīṃ bibhrac-chaktim urukramaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:432: BhP_03.06.002/2 trayoviṃśati tattvānāṃ gaṇaṃ yugapad āviśat BhP_03.06.003/1 so 'nupraviṣṭo bhagavāṃś ceṣṭārūpeṇa taṃ gaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:433: BhP_03.06.003/2 bhinnaṃ saṃyojayām āsa suptaṃ karma prabodhayan
GP10bhp_03u:436: BhP_03.06.005/1 pareṇa viśatā svasmin mātrayā viśva-sṛg-gaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:437: BhP_03.06.005/2 cukṣobhānyonyam āsādya yasmin lokāś carācarāḥ BhP_03.06.006/1 hiraṇmayaḥ sa puruṣaḥ sahasra-parivatsarān
GP10bhp_03u:439: BhP_03.06.007/1 sa vai viśva-sṛjāṃ garbho deva-karmātma-śaktimān
GP10bhp_03u:441: BhP_03.06.008/1 eṣa hy aśeṣa-sattvānām ātmāṃśaḥ paramātmanaḥ BhP_03.06.008/2 ādyo 'vatāro yatrāsau bhūta-grāmo vibhāvyate
GP10bhp_03u:442: BhP_03.06.009/1 sādhyātmaḥ sādhidaivaś ca sādhibhūta iti tridhā
GP10bhp_03u:443: BhP_03.06.009/2 virāṭ prāṇo daśa-vidha ekadhā hṛdayena ca
GP10bhp_03u:444: BhP_03.06.010/1 smaran viśva-sṛjām īśo vijñāpitam adhokṣajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:445: BhP_03.06.010/2 virājam atapat svena tejasaiṣāṃ vivṛttaye BhP_03.06.011/1 atha tasyābhitaptasya katidhāyatanāni ha
GP10bhp_03u:446: BhP_03.06.011/2 nirabhidyanta devānāṃ tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
GP10bhp_03u:447: BhP_03.06.012/1 tasyāgnir āsyaṃ nirbhinnaṃ loka-pālo 'viśat padam
GP10bhp_03u:448: BhP_03.06.012/2 vācā svāṃśena vaktavyaṃ yayāsau pratipadyate BhP_03.06.013/1 nirbhinnaṃ tālu varuṇo loka-pālo 'viśad dhareḥ
GP10bhp_03u:449: BhP_03.06.013/2 jihvayāṃśena ca rasaṃ yayāsau pratipadyate BhP_03.06.014/1 nirbhinne aśvinau nāse viṣṇor āviśatāṃ padam
GP10bhp_03u:450: BhP_03.06.014/2 ghrāṇenāṃśena gandhasya pratipattir yato bhavet BhP_03.06.015/1 nirbhinne akṣiṇī tvaṣṭā loka-pālo 'viśad vibhoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:451: BhP_03.06.015/2 cakṣuṣāṃśena rūpāṇāṃ pratipattir yato bhavet BhP_03.06.016/1 nirbhinnāny asya carmāṇi loka-pālo 'nilo 'viśat
GP10bhp_03u:453: BhP_03.06.017/1 karṇāv asya vinirbhinnau dhiṣṇyaṃ svaṃ viviśur diśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:454: BhP_03.06.017/2 śrotreṇāṃśena śabdasya siddhiṃ yena prapadyate BhP_03.06.018/1 tvacam asya vinirbhinnāṃ viviśur dhiṣṇyam oṣadhīḥ
GP10bhp_03u:455: BhP_03.06.018/2 aṃśena romabhiḥ kaṇḍūṃ yair asau pratipadyate
GP10bhp_03u:456: BhP_03.06.019/1 meḍhraṃ tasya vinirbhinnaṃ sva-dhiṣṇyaṃ ka upāviśat BhP_03.06.019/2 retasāṃśena yenāsāv ānandaṃ pratipadyate
GP10bhp_03u:457: BhP_03.06.020/1 gudaṃ puṃso vinirbhinnaṃ mitro lokeśa āviśat
GP10bhp_03u:459: BhP_03.06.021/1 hastāv asya vinirbhinnāv indraḥ svar-patir āviśat
GP10bhp_03u:460: BhP_03.06.021/2 vārtayāṃśena puruṣo yayā vṛttiṃ prapadyate BhP_03.06.022/1 pādāv asya vinirbhinnau lokeśo viṣṇur āviśat
GP10bhp_03u:461: BhP_03.06.022/2 gatyā svāṃśena puruṣo yayā prāpyaṃ prapadyate
GP10bhp_03u:462: BhP_03.06.023/1 buddhiṃ cāsya vinirbhinnāṃ vāg-īśo dhiṣṇyam āviśat BhP_03.06.023/2 bodhenāṃśena boddhavyam pratipattir yato bhavet BhP_03.06.024/1 hṛdayaṃ cāsya nirbhinnaṃ candramā dhiṣṇyam āviśat
GP10bhp_03u:464: BhP_03.06.025/1 ātmānaṃ cāsya nirbhinnam abhimāno 'viśat padam
GP10bhp_03u:466: BhP_03.06.026/1 sattvaṃ cāsya vinirbhinnaṃ mahān dhiṣṇyam upāviśat
GP10bhp_03u:468: BhP_03.06.027/1 śīrṣṇo 'sya dyaur dharā padbhyāṃ khaṃ nābher udapadyata
GP10bhp_03u:469: BhP_03.06.027/2 guṇānāṃ vṛttayo yeṣu pratīyante surādayaḥ BhP_03.06.028/1 ātyantikena sattvena divaṃ devāḥ prapedire BhP_03.06.028/2 dharāṃ rajaḥ-svabhāvena paṇayo ye ca tān anu BhP_03.06.029/1 tārtīyena svabhāvena bhagavan-nābhim āśritāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:470: BhP_03.06.029/2 ubhayor antaraṃ vyoma ye rudra-pārṣadāṃ gaṇāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:472: BhP_03.06.030/2 yas tūnmukhatvād varṇānāṃ mukhyo 'bhūd brāhmaṇo guruḥ BhP_03.06.031/1 bāhubhyo 'vartata kṣatraṃ kṣatriyas tad anuvrataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:473: BhP_03.06.031/2 yo jātas trāyate varṇān pauruṣaḥ kaṇṭaka-kṣatāt
GP10bhp_03u:475: BhP_03.06.032/2 vaiśyas tad-udbhavo vārtāṃ nṛṇāṃ yaḥ samavartayat
GP10bhp_03u:476: BhP_03.06.033/1 padbhyāṃ bhagavato jajñe śuśrūṣā dharma-siddhaye
GP10bhp_03u:477: BhP_03.06.033/2 tasyāṃ jātaḥ purā śūdro yad-vṛttyā tuṣyate hariḥ BhP_03.06.034/1 ete varṇāḥ sva-dharmeṇa yajanti sva-guruṃ harim
GP10bhp_03u:478: BhP_03.06.034/2 śraddhayātma-viśuddhy-arthaṃ yaj-jātāḥ saha vṛttibhiḥ BhP_03.06.035/1 etat kṣattar bhagavato daiva-karmātma-rūpiṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:480: BhP_03.06.036/1 tathāpi kīrtayāmy aṅga yathā-mati yathā-śrutam
GP10bhp_03u:481: BhP_03.06.036/2 kīrtiṃ hareḥ svāṃ sat-kartuṃ giram anyābhidhāsatīm BhP_03.06.037/1 ekānta-lābhaṃ vacaso nu puṃsāṃ suśloka-mauler guṇa-vādam
GP10bhp_03u:483: BhP_03.06.037/2 śruteś ca vidvadbhir upākṛtāyāṃ kathā-sudhāyām
GP10bhp_03u:487: BhP_03.06.039/1 ato bhagavato māyā māyinām api mohinī
GP10bhp_03u:488: BhP_03.06.039/2 yat svayaṃ cātma-vartmātmā na veda kim utāpare
GP10bhp_03u:489: BhP_03.06.040/1 yato 'prāpya nyavartanta vācaś ca manasā saha BhP_03.06.040/2 ahaṃ cānya ime devās tasmai bhagavate namaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:491: BhP_03.07.001/1 evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ maitreyaṃ dvaipāyana-suto budhaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:492: BhP_03.07.001/2 prīṇayann iva bhāratyā viduraḥ pratyabhāṣata BhP_03.07.002/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.07.002/1 brahman kathaṃ bhagavataś cin-mātrasyāvikāriṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:493: BhP_03.07.002/2 līlayā cāpi yujyeran nirguṇasya guṇāḥ kriyāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:494: BhP_03.07.003/1 krīḍāyām udyamo 'rbhasya kāmaś cikrīḍiṣānyataḥ BhP_03.07.003/2 svatas-tṛptasya ca kathaṃ nivṛttasya sadānyataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:496: BhP_03.07.004/2 tayā saṃsthāpayaty etad bhūyaḥ pratyapidhāsyati BhP_03.07.005/1 deśataḥ kālato yo 'sāv avasthātaḥ svato 'nyataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:498: BhP_03.07.006/1 bhagavān eka evaiṣa sarva-kṣetreṣv avasthitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:499: BhP_03.07.006/2 amuṣya durbhagatvaṃ vā kleśo vā karmabhiḥ kutaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:500: BhP_03.07.007/1 etasmin me mano vidvan khidyate 'jñāna-saṅkaṭe
GP10bhp_03u:501: BhP_03.07.007/2 tan naḥ parāṇuda vibho kaśmalaṃ mānasaṃ mahat
GP10bhp_03u:503: BhP_03.07.008/1 sa itthaṃ coditaḥ kṣattrā tattva-jijñāsunā muniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:504: BhP_03.07.008/2 pratyāha bhagavac-cittaḥ smayann iva gata-smayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:505: BhP_03.07.009/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.07.009/1 seyaṃ bhagavato māyā yan nayena virudhyate
GP10bhp_03u:506: BhP_03.07.009/2 īśvarasya vimuktasya kārpaṇyam uta bandhanam BhP_03.07.010/1 yad arthena vināmuṣya puṃsa ātma-viparyayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:508: BhP_03.07.011/1 yathā jale candramasaḥ kampādis tat-kṛto guṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:509: BhP_03.07.011/2 dṛśyate 'sann api draṣṭur ātmano 'nātmano guṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:513: BhP_03.07.013/2 vilīyante tadā kleśāḥ saṃsuptasyeva kṛtsnaśaḥ BhP_03.07.014/1 aśeṣa-saṅkleśa-śamaṃ vidhatte guṇānuvāda-śravaṇaṃ murāreḥ
GP10bhp_03u:514: BhP_03.07.014/2 kiṃ vā punas tac-caraṇāravinda- parāga-sevā-ratir
GP10bhp_03u:516: BhP_03.07.015/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.07.015/1 sañchinnaḥ saṃśayo mahyaṃ tava sūktāsinā vibho
GP10bhp_03u:517: BhP_03.07.015/2 ubhayatrāpi bhagavan mano me sampradhāvati BhP_03.07.016/1 sādhv etad vyāhṛtaṃ vidvan nātma-māyāyanaṃ hareḥ
GP10bhp_03u:518: BhP_03.07.016/2 ābhāty apārthaṃ nirmūlaṃ viśva-mūlaṃ na yad bahiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:519: BhP_03.07.017/1 yaś ca mūḍhatamo loke yaś ca buddheḥ paraṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:520: BhP_03.07.017/2 tāv ubhau sukham edhete kliśyaty antarito janaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:522: BhP_03.07.018/2 tāṃ cāpi yuṣmac-caraṇa- sevayāhaṃ parāṇude BhP_03.07.019/1 yat-sevayā bhagavataḥ kūṭa-sthasya madhu-dviṣaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:523: BhP_03.07.019/2 rati-rāso bhavet tīvraḥ pādayor vyasanārdanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:524: BhP_03.07.020/1 durāpā hy alpa-tapasaḥ sevā vaikuṇṭha-vartmasu
GP10bhp_03u:527: BhP_03.07.021/2 tebhyo virājam uddhṛtya tam anu prāviśad vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:528: BhP_03.07.022/1 yam āhur ādyaṃ puruṣaṃ sahasrāṅghry-ūru-bāhukam
GP10bhp_03u:529: BhP_03.07.022/2 yatra viśva ime lokāḥ sa-vikāśaṃ ta āsate BhP_03.07.023/1 yasmin daśa-vidhaḥ prāṇaḥ sendriyārthendriyas tri-vṛt
GP10bhp_03u:530: BhP_03.07.023/2 tvayerito yato varṇās tad-vibhūtīr vadasva naḥ BhP_03.07.024/1 yatra putraiś ca pautraiś ca naptṛbhiḥ saha gotrajaiḥ BhP_03.07.024/2 prajā vicitrākṛtaya āsan yābhir idaṃ tatam
GP10bhp_03u:531: BhP_03.07.025/1 prajāpatīnāṃ sa patiś cakḷpe kān prajāpatīn
GP10bhp_03u:532: BhP_03.07.025/2 sargāṃś caivānusargāṃś ca manūn manvantarādhipān BhP_03.07.026/1 eteṣām api vedāṃś ca vaṃśānucaritāni ca
GP10bhp_03u:533: BhP_03.07.026/2 upary adhaś ca ye lokā bhūmer mitrātmajāsate
GP10bhp_03u:534: BhP_03.07.027/1 teṣāṃ saṃsthāṃ pramāṇaṃ ca bhūr-lokasya ca varṇaya BhP_03.07.027/2 tiryaṅ-mānuṣa-devānāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:539: BhP_03.07.029/2 ṛṣīṇāṃ janma-karmāṇi vedasya ca vikarṣaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:540: BhP_03.07.030/1 yajñasya ca vitānāni yogasya ca pathaḥ prabho
GP10bhp_03u:541: BhP_03.07.030/2 naiṣkarmyasya ca sāṅkhyasya tantraṃ vā bhagavat-smṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:543: BhP_03.07.031/2 jīvasya gatayo yāś ca yāvatīr guṇa-karmajāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:544: BhP_03.07.032/1 dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāṇāṃ nimittāny avirodhataḥ BhP_03.07.032/2 vārtāyā daṇḍa-nīteś ca śrutasya ca vidhiṃ pṛthak BhP_03.07.033/1 śrāddhasya ca vidhiṃ brahman pit-ṇāṃ sargam eva ca
GP10bhp_03u:546: BhP_03.07.034/1 dānasya tapaso vāpi yac ceṣṭā-pūrtayoḥ phalam
GP10bhp_03u:547: BhP_03.07.034/2 pravāsa-sthasya yo dharmo yaś ca puṃsa utāpadi
GP10bhp_03u:548: BhP_03.07.035/1 yena vā bhagavāṃs tuṣyed dharma-yonir janārdanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:549: BhP_03.07.035/2 samprasīdati vā yeṣām etad ākhyāhi me 'nagha
GP10bhp_03u:550: BhP_03.07.036/1 anuvratānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ ca dvijottama BhP_03.07.036/2 anāpṛṣṭam api brūyur guravo dīna-vatsalāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:551: BhP_03.07.037/1 tattvānāṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ katidhā pratisaṅkramaḥ BhP_03.07.037/2 tatremaṃ ka upāsīran ka u svid anuśerate
GP10bhp_03u:552: BhP_03.07.038/1 puruṣasya ca saṃsthānaṃ svarūpaṃ vā parasya ca
GP10bhp_03u:553: BhP_03.07.038/2 jñānaṃ ca naigamaṃ yat tad guru-śiṣya-prayojanam
GP10bhp_03u:554: BhP_03.07.039/1 nimittāni ca tasyeha proktāny anagha-sūribhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:555: BhP_03.07.039/2 svato jñānaṃ kutaḥ puṃsāṃ bhaktir vairāgyam eva vā BhP_03.07.040/1 etān me pṛcchataḥ praśnān hareḥ karma-vivitsayā
GP10bhp_03u:556: BhP_03.07.040/2 brūhi me 'jñasya mitratvād ajayā naṣṭa-cakṣuṣaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:557: BhP_03.07.041/1 sarve vedāś ca yajñāś ca tapo dānāni cānagha BhP_03.07.041/2 jīvābhaya-pradānasya na kurvīran kalām api
GP10bhp_03u:561: BhP_03.07.042/2 pravṛddha-harṣo bhagavat-kathāyāṃ sañcoditas taṃ prahasann
GP10bhp_03u:563: BhP_03.08.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.08.001/1 sat-sevanīyo bata pūru-vaṃśo yal loka-pālo
GP10bhp_03u:567: BhP_03.08.002/1 so 'haṃ nṛṇāṃ kṣulla-sukhāya duḥkhaṃ mahad gatānāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:568: viramāya tasya BhP_03.08.002/2 pravartaye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yad āha sākṣād bhagavān ṛṣibhyaḥ BhP_03.08.003/1 āsīnam urvyāṃ bhagavantam ādyaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ devam
GP10bhp_03u:570: BhP_03.08.003/2 vivitsavas tattvam ataḥ parasya kumāra-mukhyā munayo
GP10bhp_03u:572: BhP_03.08.004/1 svam eva dhiṣṇyaṃ bahu mānayantaṃ yad vāsudevābhidham āmananti BhP_03.08.004/2 pratyag-dhṛtākṣāmbuja-kośam īṣad unmīlayantaṃ vibudhodayāya
GP10bhp_03u:573: BhP_03.08.005/1 svardhuny-udārdraiḥ sva-jaṭā-kalāpair upaspṛśantaś caraṇopadhānam BhP_03.08.005/2 padmaṃ yad arcanty ahi-rāja-kanyāḥ sa-prema nānā-balibhir
GP10bhp_03u:575: BhP_03.08.006/1 muhur gṛṇanto vacasānurāga- skhalat-padenāsya kṛtāni
GP10bhp_03u:581: BhP_03.08.007/2 sanat-kumārāya sa cāha pṛṣṭaḥ sāṅkhyāyanāyāṅga
GP10bhp_03u:585: BhP_03.08.008/2 jagāda so 'smad-gurave 'nvitāya parāśarāyātha bṛhaspateś ca
GP10bhp_03u:586: BhP_03.08.009/1 provāca mahyaṃ sa dayālur ukto muniḥ pulastyena purāṇam ādyam
GP10bhp_03u:587: BhP_03.08.009/2 so 'haṃ tavaitat kathayāmi vatsa śraddhālave nityam anuvratāya
GP10bhp_03u:588: BhP_03.08.010/1 udāplutaṃ viśvam idaṃ tadāsīd yan nidrayāmīlita-dṛṅ
GP10bhp_03u:592: BhP_03.08.011/1 so 'ntaḥ śarīre 'rpita-bhūta-sūkṣmaḥ kālātmikāṃ śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:593: BhP_03.08.011/2 uvāsa tasmin salile pade sve yathānalo dāruṇi
GP10bhp_03u:595: BhP_03.08.012/1 catur-yugānāṃ ca sahasram apsu svapan svayodīritayā sva-śaktyā
GP10bhp_03u:596: BhP_03.08.012/2 kālākhyayāsādita-karma-tantro lokān apītān dadṛśe sva-dehe
GP10bhp_03u:597: BhP_03.08.013/1 tasyārtha-sūkṣmābhiniviṣṭa-dṛṣṭer antar-gato 'rtho rajasā tanīyān BhP_03.08.013/2 guṇena kālānugatena viddhaḥ sūṣyaṃs tadābhidyata nābhi-deśāt
GP10bhp_03u:598: BhP_03.08.014/1 sa padma-kośaḥ sahasodatiṣṭhat kālena karma-pratibodhanena
GP10bhp_03u:599: BhP_03.08.014/2 sva-rociṣā tat salilaṃ viśālaṃ vidyotayann arka ivātma-yoniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:600: BhP_03.08.015/1 tal loka-padmaṃ sa u eva viṣṇuḥ prāvīviśat sarva-guṇāvabhāsam
GP10bhp_03u:601: BhP_03.08.015/2 tasmin svayaṃ vedamayo vidhātā svayambhuvaṃ yaṃ sma vadanti so 'bhūt
GP10bhp_03u:602: BhP_03.08.016/1 tasyāṃ sa cāmbho-ruha-karṇikāyām avasthito lokam apaśyamānaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:603: BhP_03.08.016/2 parikraman vyomni vivṛtta-netraś catvāri lebhe 'nudiśaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:605: BhP_03.08.017/1 tasmād yugānta-śvasanāvaghūrṇa- jalormi-cakrāt salilād virūḍham BhP_03.08.017/2 upāśritaḥ kañjam u loka-tattvaṃ nātmānam addhāvidad ādi-devaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:606: BhP_03.08.018/1 ka eṣa yo 'sāv aham abja-pṛṣṭha etat kuto vābjam ananyad apsu BhP_03.08.018/2 asti hy adhastād iha kiñcanaitad adhiṣṭhitaṃ yatra satā nu
GP10bhp_03u:608: BhP_03.08.019/1 sa ittham udvīkṣya tad-abja-nāla- nāḍībhir antar-jalam
GP10bhp_03u:610: BhP_03.08.019/2 nārvāg-gatas tat-khara-nāla-nāla- nābhiṃ vicinvaṃs tad
GP10bhp_03u:612: BhP_03.08.020/1 tamasy apāre vidurātma-sargaṃ vicinvato 'bhūt sumahāṃs
GP10bhp_03u:614: BhP_03.08.020/2 yo deha-bhājāṃ bhayam īrayāṇaḥ parikṣiṇoty āyur ajasya hetiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:615: BhP_03.08.021/1 tato nivṛtto 'pratilabdha-kāmaḥ sva-dhiṣṇyam āsādya punaḥ sa devaḥ BhP_03.08.021/2 śanair jita-śvāsa-nivṛtta-citto nyaṣīdad
GP10bhp_03u:619: BhP_03.08.022/2 svayaṃ tad antar-hṛdaye 'vabhātam apaśyatāpaśyata yan na
GP10bhp_03u:621: BhP_03.08.023/1 mṛṇāla-gaurāyata-śeṣa-bhoga- paryaṅka ekaṃ puruṣaṃ śayānam
GP10bhp_03u:628: BhP_03.08.025/1 āyāmato vistarataḥ sva-māna- dehena loka-traya-saṅgraheṇa
GP10bhp_03u:651: BhP_03.08.032/1 tarhy eva tan-nābhi-saraḥ-sarojam ātmānam ambhaḥ śvasanaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:652: viyac ca BhP_03.08.032/2 dadarśa devo jagato vidhātā nātaḥ paraṃ
GP10bhp_03u:654: BhP_03.08.033/1 sa karma-bījaṃ rajasoparaktaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣann iyad eva dṛṣṭvā
GP10bhp_03u:655: BhP_03.08.033/2 astaud visargābhimukhas tam īḍyam avyakta-vartmany
GP10bhp_03u:658: BhP_03.09.001/1 jñāto 'si me 'dya sucirān nanu deha-bhājāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:659: BhP_03.09.001/2 na jñāyate bhagavato gatir ity avadyam
GP10bhp_03u:660: BhP_03.09.001/3 nānyat tvad asti bhagavann api tan na śuddhaṃ BhP_03.09.001/4 māyā-guṇa-vyatikarād yad urur vibhāsi
GP10bhp_03u:664: BhP_03.09.002/4 yan-nābhi-padma-bhavanād aham āvirāsam BhP_03.09.003/1 nātaḥ paraṃ parama yad bhavataḥ svarūpam
GP10bhp_03u:666: BhP_03.09.003/3 paśyāmi viśva-sṛjam ekam aviśvam ātman
GP10bhp_03u:668: BhP_03.09.004/1 tad vā idaṃ bhuvana-maṅgala maṅgalāya
GP10bhp_03u:669: BhP_03.09.004/2 dhyāne sma no darśitaṃ ta upāsakānām
GP10bhp_03u:674: BhP_03.09.005/3 bhaktyā gṛhīta-caraṇaḥ parayā ca teṣāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:677: BhP_03.09.006/2 śokaḥ spṛhā paribhavo vipulaś ca lobhaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:679: BhP_03.09.006/4 yāvan na te 'ṅghrim abhayaṃ pravṛṇīta lokaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:680: BhP_03.09.007/1 daivena te hata-dhiyo bhavataḥ prasaṅgāt BhP_03.09.007/2 sarvāśubhopaśamanād vimukhendriyā ye
GP10bhp_03u:684: BhP_03.09.008/2 śītoṣṇa-vāta-varaṣair itaretarāc ca BhP_03.09.008/3 kāmāgninācyuta-ruṣā ca sudurbhareṇa BhP_03.09.008/4 sampaśyato mana urukrama sīdate me BhP_03.09.009/1 yāvat pṛthaktvam idam ātmana indriyārtha-
GP10bhp_03u:685: BhP_03.09.009/2 māyā-balaṃ bhagavato jana īśa paśyet
GP10bhp_03u:686: BhP_03.09.009/3 tāvan na saṃsṛtir asau pratisaṅkrameta BhP_03.09.009/4 vyarthāpi duḥkha-nivahaṃ vahatī kriyārthā BhP_03.09.010/1 ahny āpṛtārta-karaṇā niśi niḥśayānā BhP_03.09.010/2 nānā-manoratha-dhiyā kṣaṇa-bhagna-nidrāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:688: BhP_03.09.010/4 yuṣmat-prasaṅga-vimukhā iha saṃsaranti BhP_03.09.011/1 tvaṃ bhakti-yoga-paribhāvita-hṛt-saroja
GP10bhp_03u:689: BhP_03.09.011/2 āsse śrutekṣita-patho nanu nātha puṃsām
GP10bhp_03u:692: BhP_03.09.012/1 nātiprasīdati tathopacitopacārair BhP_03.09.012/2 ārādhitaḥ sura-gaṇair hṛdi baddha-kāmaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:696: BhP_03.09.013/2 dānena cogra-tapasā paricaryayā ca BhP_03.09.013/3 ārādhanaṃ bhagavatas tava sat-kriyārtho
GP10bhp_03u:697: BhP_03.09.013/4 dharmo 'rpitaḥ karhicid mriyate na yatra
GP10bhp_03u:699: BhP_03.09.014/2 mohāya bodha-dhiṣaṇāya namaḥ parasmai BhP_03.09.014/3 viśvodbhava-sthiti-layeṣu
GP10bhp_03u:700: BhP_03.09.014/4 rāsāya te nama idaṃ cakṛmeśvarāya BhP_03.09.015/1 yasyāvatāra-guṇa-karma-viḍambanāni
GP10bhp_03u:701: BhP_03.09.015/2 nāmāni ye 'su-vigame vivaśā gṛṇanti BhP_03.09.015/3 te 'naika-janma-śamalaṃ sahasaiva hitvā BhP_03.09.015/4 saṃyānty apāvṛtāmṛtaṃ tam ajaṃ prapadye BhP_03.09.016/1 yo vā ahaṃ ca giriśaś ca vibhuḥ svayaṃ ca
GP10bhp_03u:703: BhP_03.09.016/3 bhittvā tri-pād vavṛdha eka uru-prarohas
GP10bhp_03u:705: BhP_03.09.017/1 loko vikarma-nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ BhP_03.09.017/2 karmaṇy ayaṃ tvad-udite bhavad-arcane sve
GP10bhp_03u:706: BhP_03.09.017/3 yas tāvad asya balavān iha jīvitāśāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:707: BhP_03.09.017/4 sadyaś chinatty animiṣāya namo 'stu tasmai
GP10bhp_03u:708: BhP_03.09.018/1 yasmād bibhemy aham api dviparārdha-dhiṣṇyam
GP10bhp_03u:722: BhP_03.09.021/3 tasmai namas ta udara-stha-bhavāya yoga-
GP10bhp_03u:724: BhP_03.09.022/1 so 'yaṃ samasta-jagatāṃ suhṛd eka ātmā
GP10bhp_03u:725: BhP_03.09.022/2 sattvena yan mṛḍayate bhagavān bhagena BhP_03.09.022/3 tenaiva me dṛśam anuspṛśatād yathāhaṃ BhP_03.09.022/4 srakṣyāmi pūrvavad idaṃ praṇata-priyo 'sau
GP10bhp_03u:728: BhP_03.09.023/3 tasmin sva-vikramam idaṃ sṛjato 'pi ceto
GP10bhp_03u:729: BhP_03.09.023/4 yuñjīta karma-śamalaṃ ca yathā vijahyām
GP10bhp_03u:730: BhP_03.09.024/1 nābhi-hradād iha sato 'mbhasi yasya puṃso BhP_03.09.024/2 vijñāna-śaktir aham āsam ananta-śakteḥ
GP10bhp_03u:731: BhP_03.09.024/3 rūpaṃ vicitram idam asya vivṛṇvato me
GP10bhp_03u:732: BhP_03.09.024/4 mā rīriṣīṣṭa nigamasya girāṃ visargaḥ BhP_03.09.025/1 so 'sāv adabhra-karuṇo bhagavān vivṛddha-
GP10bhp_03u:733: BhP_03.09.025/2 prema-smitena nayanāmburuhaṃ vijṛmbhan BhP_03.09.025/3 utthāya viśva-vijayāya ca no viṣādaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:735: BhP_03.09.026/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.09.026/1 sva-sambhavaṃ niśāmyaivaṃ tapo-vidyā-samādhibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:736: BhP_03.09.026/2 yāvan mano-vacaḥ stutvā virarāma sa khinnavat
GP10bhp_03u:739: BhP_03.09.028/1 loka-saṃsthāna-vijñāna ātmanaḥ parikhidyataḥ BhP_03.09.028/2 tam āhāgādhayā vācā kaśmalaṃ śamayann iva
GP10bhp_03u:741: BhP_03.09.029/1 mā veda-garbha gās tandrīṃ sarga udyamam āvaha BhP_03.09.029/2 tan mayāpāditaṃ hy agre yan māṃ prārthayate bhavān BhP_03.09.030/1 bhūyas tvaṃ tapa ātiṣṭha vidyāṃ caiva mad-āśrayām
GP10bhp_03u:742: BhP_03.09.030/2 tābhyām antar-hṛdi brahman lokān drakṣyasy apāvṛtān
GP10bhp_03u:743: BhP_03.09.031/1 tata ātmani loke ca bhakti-yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:744: BhP_03.09.031/2 draṣṭāsi māṃ tataṃ brahman mayi lokāṃs tvam ātmanaḥ BhP_03.09.032/1 yadā tu sarva-bhūteṣu dāruṣv agnim iva sthitam
GP10bhp_03u:745: BhP_03.09.032/2 praticakṣīta māṃ loko jahyāt tarhy eva kaśmalam
GP10bhp_03u:747: BhP_03.09.033/2 svarūpeṇa mayopetaṃ paśyan svārājyam ṛcchati BhP_03.09.034/1 nānā-karma-vitānena prajā bahvīḥ sisṛkṣataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:748: BhP_03.09.034/2 nātmāvasīdaty asmiṃs te varṣīyān mad-anugrahaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:749: BhP_03.09.035/1 ṛṣim ādyaṃ na badhnāti pāpīyāṃs tvāṃ rajo-guṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:750: BhP_03.09.035/2 yan mano mayi nirbaddhaṃ prajāḥ saṃsṛjato 'pi te
GP10bhp_03u:751: BhP_03.09.036/1 jñāto 'haṃ bhavatā tv adya durvijñeyo 'pi dehinām
GP10bhp_03u:752: BhP_03.09.036/2 yan māṃ tvaṃ manyase 'yuktaṃ bhūtendriya-guṇātmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:753: BhP_03.09.037/1 tubhyaṃ mad-vicikitsāyām ātmā me darśito 'bahiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:754: BhP_03.09.037/2 nālena salile mūlaṃ puṣkarasya vicinvataḥ BhP_03.09.038/1 yac cakarthāṅga mat-stotraṃ mat-kathābhyudayāṅkitam
GP10bhp_03u:755: BhP_03.09.038/2 yad vā tapasi te niṣṭhā sa eṣa mad-anugrahaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:756: BhP_03.09.039/1 prīto 'ham astu bhadraṃ te lokānāṃ vijayecchayā BhP_03.09.039/2 yad astauṣīr guṇamayaṃ nirguṇaṃ mānuvarṇayan BhP_03.09.040/1 ya etena pumān nityaṃ stutvā stotreṇa māṃ bhajet BhP_03.09.040/2 tasyāśu samprasīdeyaṃ sarva-kāma-vareśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:757: BhP_03.09.041/1 pūrtena tapasā yajñair dānair yoga-samādhinā
GP10bhp_03u:758: BhP_03.09.041/2 rāddhaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ puṃsāṃ mat-prītis tattvavin-matam
GP10bhp_03u:759: BhP_03.09.042/1 aham ātmātmanāṃ dhātaḥ preṣṭhaḥ san preyasām api
GP10bhp_03u:760: BhP_03.09.042/2 ato mayi ratiṃ kuryād dehādir yat-kṛte priyaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:762: BhP_03.09.043/2 prajāḥ sṛja yathā-pūrvaṃ yāś ca mayy anuśerate
GP10bhp_03u:763: BhP_03.09.044/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.09.044/1 tasmā evaṃ jagat-sraṣṭre pradhāna-puruṣeśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:764: BhP_03.09.044/2 vyajyedaṃ svena rūpeṇa kañja-nābhas tirodadhe
GP10bhp_03u:765: BhP_03.10.001/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.10.001/1 antarhite bhagavati brahmā loka-pitāmahaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:766: BhP_03.10.001/2 prajāḥ sasarja katidhā daihikīr mānasīr vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:767: BhP_03.10.002/1 ye ca me bhagavan pṛṣṭās tvayy arthā bahuvittama BhP_03.10.002/2 tān vadasvānupūrvyeṇa chindhi naḥ sarva-saṃśayān
GP10bhp_03u:768: BhP_03.10.003/0 sūta uvāca BhP_03.10.003/1 evaṃ sañcoditas tena kṣattrā kauṣāravir muniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:769: BhP_03.10.003/2 prītaḥ pratyāha tān praśnān hṛdi-sthān atha bhārgava BhP_03.10.004/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.10.004/1 viriñco 'pi tathā cakre divyaṃ varṣa-śataṃ tapaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:770: BhP_03.10.004/2 ātmany ātmānam āveśya yathāha bhagavān ajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:772: BhP_03.10.005/2 padmam ambhaś ca tat-kāla- kṛta-vīryeṇa kampitam
GP10bhp_03u:773: BhP_03.10.006/1 tapasā hy edhamānena vidyayā cātma-saṃsthayā
GP10bhp_03u:775: BhP_03.10.007/1 tad vilokya viyad-vyāpi puṣkaraṃ yad-adhiṣṭhitam
GP10bhp_03u:776: BhP_03.10.007/2 anena lokān prāg-līnān kalpitāsmīty acintayat BhP_03.10.008/1 padma-kośaṃ tadāviśya bhagavat-karma-coditaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:777: BhP_03.10.008/2 ekaṃ vyabhāṅkṣīd urudhā tridhā bhāvyaṃ dvi-saptadhā
GP10bhp_03u:779: BhP_03.10.009/2 dharmasya hy animittasya vipākaḥ parameṣṭhy asau
GP10bhp_03u:780: BhP_03.10.010/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.10.010/1 yathāttha bahu-rūpasya harer adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:781: BhP_03.10.010/2 kālākhyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahman yathā varṇaya naḥ prabho
GP10bhp_03u:782: BhP_03.10.011/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.10.011/1 guṇa-vyatikarākāro nirviśeṣo 'pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:783: BhP_03.10.011/2 puruṣas tad-upādānam ātmānaṃ līlayāsṛjat BhP_03.10.012/1 viśvaṃ vai brahma-tan-mātraṃ saṃsthitaṃ viṣṇu-māyayā
GP10bhp_03u:785: BhP_03.10.013/1 yathedānīṃ tathāgre ca paścād apy etad īdṛśam
GP10bhp_03u:786: BhP_03.10.013/2 sargo nava-vidhas tasya prākṛto vaikṛtas tu yaḥ BhP_03.10.014/1 kāla-dravya-guṇair asya tri-vidhaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:787: BhP_03.10.014/2 ādyas tu mahataḥ sargo guṇa-vaiṣamyam ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:788: BhP_03.10.015/1 dvitīyas tv ahamo yatra dravya-jñāna-kriyodayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:789: BhP_03.10.015/2 bhūta-sargas tṛtīyas tu tan-mātro dravya-śaktimān
GP10bhp_03u:790: BhP_03.10.016/1 caturtha aindriyaḥ sargo yas tu jñāna-kriyātmakaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:791: BhP_03.10.016/2 vaikāriko deva-sargaḥ pañcamo yan-mayaṃ manaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:792: BhP_03.10.017/1 ṣaṣṭhas tu tamasaḥ sargo yas tv abuddhi-kṛtaḥ prabhoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:793: BhP_03.10.017/2 ṣaḍ ime prākṛtāḥ sargā vaikṛtān api me śṛṇu BhP_03.10.018/1 rajo-bhājo bhagavato līleyaṃ hari-medhasaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:794: BhP_03.10.018/2 saptamo mukhya-sargas tu ṣaḍ-vidhas tasthuṣāṃ ca yaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:797: BhP_03.10.020/1 tiraścām aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ so 'ṣṭāviṃśad-vidho mataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:798: BhP_03.10.020/2 avido bhūri-tamaso ghrāṇa-jñā hṛdy avedinaḥ BhP_03.10.021/1 gaur ajo mahiṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūkaro gavayo ruruḥ
GP10bhp_03u:799: BhP_03.10.021/2 dvi-śaphāḥ paśavaś ceme avir uṣṭraś ca sattama
GP10bhp_03u:800: BhP_03.10.022/1 kharo 'śvo 'śvataro gauraḥ śarabhaś camarī tathā
GP10bhp_03u:801: BhP_03.10.022/2 ete caika-śaphāḥ kṣattaḥ śṛṇu pañca-nakhān paśūn
GP10bhp_03u:802: BhP_03.10.023/1 śvā sṛgālo vṛko vyāghro mārjāraḥ śaśa-śallakau
GP10bhp_03u:803: BhP_03.10.023/2 siṃhaḥ kapir gajaḥ kūrmo godhā ca makarādayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:805: BhP_03.10.024/2 haṃsa-sārasa-cakrāhva- kākolūkādayaḥ khagāḥ BhP_03.10.025/1 arvāk-srotas tu navamaḥ kṣattar eka-vidho nṛṇām
GP10bhp_03u:806: BhP_03.10.025/2 rajo 'dhikāḥ karma-parā duḥkhe ca sukha-māninaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:807: BhP_03.10.026/1 vaikṛtās traya evaite deva-sargaś ca sattama BhP_03.10.026/2 vaikārikas tu yaḥ proktaḥ kaumāras tūbhayātmakaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:811: BhP_03.10.028/2 daśaite vidurākhyātāḥ sargās te viśva-sṛk-kṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:812: BhP_03.10.029/1 ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśān manvantarāṇi ca
GP10bhp_03u:813: BhP_03.10.029/2 evaṃ rajaḥ-plutaḥ sraṣṭā kalpādiṣv ātmabhūr hariḥ
GP10bhp_03u:814: BhP_03.10.029/3 sṛjaty amogha-saṅkalpa ātmaivātmānam ātmanā BhP_03.11.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.11.001/1 caramaḥ sad-viśeṣāṇām aneko 'saṃyutaḥ sadā
GP10bhp_03u:815: BhP_03.11.001/2 paramāṇuḥ sa vijñeyo nṛṇām aikya-bhramo yataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:816: BhP_03.11.002/1 sata eva padārthasya svarūpāvasthitasya yat BhP_03.11.002/2 kaivalyaṃ parama-mahān aviśeṣo nirantaraḥ BhP_03.11.003/1 evaṃ kālo 'py anumitaḥ saukṣmye sthaulye ca sattama BhP_03.11.003/2 saṃsthāna-bhuktyā bhagavān avyakto vyakta-bhug vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:817: BhP_03.11.004/1 sa kālaḥ paramāṇur vai yo bhuṅkte paramāṇutām
GP10bhp_03u:818: BhP_03.11.004/2 sato 'viśeṣa-bhug yas tu sa kālaḥ paramo mahān
GP10bhp_03u:819: BhP_03.11.005/1 aṇur dvau paramāṇū syāt trasareṇus trayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:821: BhP_03.11.006/1 trasareṇu-trikaṃ bhuṅkte yaḥ kālaḥ sa truṭiḥ smṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:822: BhP_03.11.006/2 śata-bhāgas tu vedhaḥ syāt tais tribhis tu lavaḥ smṛtaḥ BhP_03.11.007/1 nimeṣas tri-lavo jñeya āmnātas te trayaḥ kṣaṇaḥ BhP_03.11.007/2 kṣaṇān pañca viduḥ kāṣṭhāṃ laghu tā daśa pañca ca
GP10bhp_03u:823: BhP_03.11.008/1 laghūni vai samāmnātā daśa pañca ca nāḍikā
GP10bhp_03u:824: BhP_03.11.008/2 te dve muhūrtaḥ praharaḥ ṣaḍ yāmaḥ sapta vā nṛṇām
GP10bhp_03u:827: BhP_03.11.010/1 yāmāś catvāraś catvāro martyānām ahanī ubhe
GP10bhp_03u:828: BhP_03.11.010/2 pakṣaḥ pañca-daśāhāni śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca mānada
GP10bhp_03u:829: BhP_03.11.011/1 tayoḥ samuccayo māsaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tad ahar-niśam
GP10bhp_03u:830: BhP_03.11.011/2 dvau tāv ṛtuḥ ṣaḍ ayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cottaraṃ divi BhP_03.11.012/1 ayane cāhanī prāhur vatsaro dvādaśa smṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:831: BhP_03.11.012/2 saṃvatsara-śataṃ n-ṇāṃ paramāyur nirūpitam BhP_03.11.013/1 graharkṣa-tārā-cakra-sthaḥ paramāṇv-ādinā jagat
GP10bhp_03u:833: BhP_03.11.014/1 saṃvatsaraḥ parivatsara iḍā-vatsara eva ca BhP_03.11.014/2 anuvatsaro vatsaraś ca viduraivaṃ prabhāṣyate BhP_03.11.015/1 yaḥ sṛjya-śaktim urudhocchvasayan sva-śaktyā
GP10bhp_03u:837: BhP_03.11.016/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.11.016/1 pitṛ-deva-manuṣyāṇām āyuḥ param idaṃ smṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:838: BhP_03.11.016/2 pareṣāṃ gatim ācakṣva ye syuḥ kalpād bahir vidaḥ BhP_03.11.017/1 bhagavān veda kālasya gatiṃ bhagavato nanu
GP10bhp_03u:839: BhP_03.11.017/2 viśvaṃ vicakṣate dhīrā yoga-rāddhena cakṣuṣā
GP10bhp_03u:840: BhP_03.11.018/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.11.018/1 kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti catur-yugam
GP10bhp_03u:841: BhP_03.11.018/2 divyair dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ sāvadhānaṃ nirūpitam BhP_03.11.019/1 catvāri trīṇi dve caikaṃ kṛtādiṣu yathā-kramam
GP10bhp_03u:842: BhP_03.11.019/2 saṅkhyātāni sahasrāṇi dvi-guṇāni śatāni ca BhP_03.11.020/1 sandhyā-sandhyāṃśayor antar yaḥ kālaḥ śata-saṅkhyayoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:843: BhP_03.11.020/2 tam evāhur yugaṃ taj-jñā yatra dharmo vidhīyate
GP10bhp_03u:844: BhP_03.11.021/1 dharmaś catuṣ-pān manujān kṛte samanuvartate
GP10bhp_03u:845: BhP_03.11.021/2 sa evānyeṣv adharmeṇa vyeti pādena vardhatā
GP10bhp_03u:846: BhP_03.11.022/1 tri-lokyā yuga-sāhasraṃ bahir ābrahmaṇo dinam
GP10bhp_03u:847: BhP_03.11.022/2 tāvaty eva niśā tāta yan nimīlati viśva-sṛk
GP10bhp_03u:849: BhP_03.11.023/2 yāvad dinaṃ bhagavato manūn bhuñjaṃś catur-daśa
GP10bhp_03u:850: BhP_03.11.024/1 svaṃ svaṃ kālaṃ manur bhuṅkte sādhikāṃ hy eka-saptatim
GP10bhp_03u:851: BhP_03.11.024/2 manvantareṣu manavas tad-vaṃśyā ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ BhP_03.11.024/3 bhavanti caiva yugapat sureśāś cānu ye ca tān BhP_03.11.025/1 eṣa dainan-dinaḥ sargo brāhmas trailokya-vartanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:853: BhP_03.11.026/1 manvantareṣu bhagavān bibhrat sattvaṃ sva-mūrtibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:854: BhP_03.11.026/2 manv-ādibhir idaṃ viśvam avaty udita-pauruṣaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:857: BhP_03.11.028/1 tam evānv api dhīyante lokā bhūr-ādayas trayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:860: BhP_03.11.029/2 yānty ūṣmaṇā maharlokāj janaṃ bhṛgv-ādayo 'rditāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:863: BhP_03.11.031/1 antaḥ sa tasmin salila āste 'nantāsano hariḥ
GP10bhp_03u:864: BhP_03.11.031/2 yoga-nidrā-nimīlākṣaḥ stūyamāno janālayaiḥ BhP_03.11.032/1 evaṃ-vidhair aho-rātraiḥ kāla-gatyopalakṣitaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:866: BhP_03.11.033/1 yad ardham āyuṣas tasya parārdham abhidhīyate
GP10bhp_03u:867: BhP_03.11.033/2 pūrvaḥ parārdho 'pakrānto hy aparo 'dya pravartate
GP10bhp_03u:868: BhP_03.11.034/1 pūrvasyādau parārdhasya brāhmo nāma mahān abhūt
GP10bhp_03u:869: BhP_03.11.034/2 kalpo yatrābhavad brahmā śabda-brahmeti yaṃ viduḥ BhP_03.11.035/1 tasyaiva cānte kalpo 'bhūd yaṃ pādmam abhicakṣate
GP10bhp_03u:870: BhP_03.11.035/2 yad dharer nābhi-sarasa āsīl loka-saroruham
GP10bhp_03u:871: BhP_03.11.036/1 ayaṃ tu kathitaḥ kalpo dvitīyasyāpi bhārata
GP10bhp_03u:872: BhP_03.11.036/2 vārāha iti vikhyāto yatrāsīc chūkaro hariḥ
GP10bhp_03u:873: BhP_03.11.037/1 kālo 'yaṃ dvi-parārdhākhyo nimeṣa upacaryate BhP_03.11.037/2 avyākṛtasyānantasya hy anāder jagad-ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:875: BhP_03.11.038/2 naiveśituṃ prabhur bhūmna īśvaro dhāma-māninām
GP10bhp_03u:876: BhP_03.11.039/1 vikāraiḥ sahito yuktair viśeṣādibhir āvṛtaḥ BhP_03.11.039/2 āṇḍakośo bahir ayaṃ pañcāśat-koṭi-vistṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:878: BhP_03.11.040/2 lakṣyate 'ntar-gatāś cānye koṭiśo hy aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:879: BhP_03.11.041/1 tad āhur akṣaraṃ brahma sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam
GP10bhp_03u:880: BhP_03.11.041/2 viṣṇor dhāma paraṃ sākṣāt puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:881: BhP_03.12.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.12.001/1 iti te varṇitaḥ kṣattaḥ kālākhyaḥ paramātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:882: BhP_03.12.001/2 mahimā veda-garbho 'tha yathāsrākṣīn nibodha me
GP10bhp_03u:884: BhP_03.12.002/2 mahāmohaṃ ca mohaṃ ca tamaś cājñāna-vṛttayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:885: BhP_03.12.003/1 dṛṣṭvā pāpīyasīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nātmānaṃ bahv amanyata
GP10bhp_03u:887: BhP_03.12.004/1 sanakaṃ ca sanandaṃ ca sanātanam athātmabhūḥ
GP10bhp_03u:888: BhP_03.12.004/2 sanat-kumāraṃ ca munīn niṣkriyān ūrdhva-retasaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:889: BhP_03.12.005/1 tān babhāṣe svabhūḥ putrān prajāḥ sṛjata putrakāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:892: BhP_03.12.006/2 krodhaṃ durviṣahaṃ jātaṃ niyantum upacakrame BhP_03.12.007/1 dhiyā nigṛhyamāṇo 'pi bhruvor madhyāt prajāpateḥ
GP10bhp_03u:894: BhP_03.12.008/1 sa vai ruroda devānāṃ pūrvajo bhagavān bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:895: BhP_03.12.008/2 nāmāni kuru me dhātaḥ sthānāni ca jagad-guro
GP10bhp_03u:896: BhP_03.12.009/1 iti tasya vacaḥ pādmo bhagavān paripālayan
GP10bhp_03u:897: BhP_03.12.009/2 abhyadhād bhadrayā vācā mā rodīs tat karomi te BhP_03.12.010/1 yad arodīḥ sura-śreṣṭha sodvega iva bālakaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:898: BhP_03.12.010/2 tatas tvām abhidhāsyanti nāmnā rudra iti prajāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:899: BhP_03.12.011/1 hṛd indriyāṇy asur vyoma vāyur agnir jalaṃ mahī BhP_03.12.011/2 sūryaś candras tapaś caiva sthānāny agre kṛtāni te BhP_03.12.012/1 manyur manur mahinaso mahāñ chiva ṛtadhvajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:900: BhP_03.12.012/2 ugraretā bhavaḥ kālo vāmadevo dhṛtavrataḥ BhP_03.12.013/1 dhīr dhṛti-rasalomā ca niyut sarpir ilāmbikā
GP10bhp_03u:901: BhP_03.12.013/2 irāvatī svadhā dīkṣā rudrāṇyo rudra te striyaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:902: BhP_03.12.014/1 gṛhāṇaitāni nāmāni sthānāni ca sa-yoṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:903: BhP_03.12.014/2 ebhiḥ sṛja prajā bahvīḥ prajānām asi yat patiḥ BhP_03.12.015/1 ity ādiṣṭaḥ sva-guruṇā bhagavān nīla-lohitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:905: BhP_03.12.016/1 rudrāṇāṃ rudra-sṛṣṭānāṃ samantād grasatāṃ jagat
GP10bhp_03u:907: BhP_03.12.017/1 alaṃ prajābhiḥ sṛṣṭābhir īdṛśībhiḥ surottama BhP_03.12.017/2 mayā saha dahantībhir diśaś cakṣurbhir ulbaṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:908: BhP_03.12.018/1 tapa ātiṣṭha bhadraṃ te sarva-bhūta-sukhāvaham
GP10bhp_03u:909: BhP_03.12.018/2 tapasaiva yathā pūrvaṃ sraṣṭā viśvam idaṃ bhavān
GP10bhp_03u:910: BhP_03.12.019/1 tapasaiva paraṃ jyotir bhagavantam adhokṣajam BhP_03.12.019/2 sarva-bhūta-guhāvāsam añjasā vindate pumān
GP10bhp_03u:911: BhP_03.12.020/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.12.020/1 evam ātmabhuvādiṣṭaḥ parikramya girāṃ patim BhP_03.12.020/2 bāḍham ity amum āmantrya viveśa tapase vanam
GP10bhp_03u:912: BhP_03.12.021/1 athābhidhyāyataḥ sargaṃ daśa putrāḥ prajajñire BhP_03.12.021/2 bhagavac-chakti-yuktasya
GP10bhp_03u:913: BhP_03.12.022/1 marīcir atry-aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:914: BhP_03.12.022/2 bhṛgur vasiṣṭho dakṣaś ca daśamas tatra nāradaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:915: BhP_03.12.023/1 utsaṅgān nārado jajñe dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhāt svayambhuvaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:916: BhP_03.12.023/2 prāṇād vasiṣṭhaḥ sañjāto bhṛgus tvaci karāt kratuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:917: BhP_03.12.024/1 pulaho nābhito jajñe pulastyaḥ karṇayor ṛṣiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:919: BhP_03.12.025/1 dharmaḥ stanād dakṣiṇato yatra nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
GP10bhp_03u:920: BhP_03.12.025/2 adharmaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasmān mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:921: BhP_03.12.026/1 hṛdi kāmo bhruvaḥ krodho lobhaś cādhara-dacchadāt
GP10bhp_03u:922: BhP_03.12.026/2 āsyād vāk sindhavo meḍhrān nirṛtiḥ pāyor aghāśrayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:923: BhP_03.12.027/1 chāyāyāḥ kardamo jajñe devahūtyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:924: BhP_03.12.027/2 manaso dehataś cedaṃ jajñe viśva-kṛto jagat
GP10bhp_03u:925: BhP_03.12.028/1 vācaṃ duhitaraṃ tanvīṃ svayambhūr haratīṃ manaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:926: BhP_03.12.028/2 akāmāṃ cakame kṣattaḥ sa-kāma iti naḥ śrutam
GP10bhp_03u:927: BhP_03.12.029/1 tam adharme kṛta-matiṃ vilokya pitaraṃ sutāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:929: BhP_03.12.030/1 naitat pūrvaiḥ kṛtaṃ tvad ye na kariṣyanti cāpare BhP_03.12.030/2 yas tvaṃ duhitaraṃ gaccher anigṛhyāṅgajaṃ prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:930: BhP_03.12.031/1 tejīyasām api hy etan na suślokyaṃ jagad-guro
GP10bhp_03u:931: BhP_03.12.031/2 yad-vṛttam anutiṣṭhan vai lokaḥ kṣemāya kalpate BhP_03.12.032/1 tasmai namo bhagavate ya idaṃ svena rociṣā
GP10bhp_03u:932: BhP_03.12.032/2 ātma-sthaṃ vyañjayām āsa sa dharmaṃ pātum arhati
GP10bhp_03u:933: BhP_03.12.033/1 sa itthaṃ gṛṇataḥ putrān puro dṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn
GP10bhp_03u:934: BhP_03.12.033/2 prajāpati-patis tanvaṃ tatyāja vrīḍitas tadā
GP10bhp_03u:935: BhP_03.12.033/3 tāṃ diśo jagṛhur ghorāṃ nīhāraṃ yad vidus tamaḥ BhP_03.12.034/1 kadācid dhyāyataḥ sraṣṭur vedā āsaṃś catur-mukhāt
GP10bhp_03u:936: BhP_03.12.034/2 kathaṃ srakṣyāmy ahaṃ lokān samavetān yathā purā
GP10bhp_03u:939: BhP_03.12.036/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.12.036/1 sa vai viśva-sṛjām īśo vedādīn mukhato 'sṛjat
GP10bhp_03u:940: BhP_03.12.036/2 yad yad yenāsṛjad devas tan me brūhi tapo-dhana
GP10bhp_03u:941: BhP_03.12.037/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.12.037/1 ṛg-yajuḥ-sāmātharvākhyān vedān pūrvādibhir
GP10bhp_03u:942: BhP_03.12.037/2 śāstram ijyāṃ stuti-stomaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vyadhāt kramāt
GP10bhp_03u:943: BhP_03.12.038/1 āyur-vedaṃ dhanur-vedaṃ gāndharvaṃ vedam ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:944: BhP_03.12.038/2 sthāpatyaṃ cāsṛjad vedaṃ kramāt pūrvādibhir mukhaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:946: BhP_03.12.039/2 sarvebhya eva vaktrebhyaḥ sasṛje sarva-darśanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:949: BhP_03.12.041/1 vidyā dānaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ dharmasyeti padāni ca
GP10bhp_03u:950: BhP_03.12.041/2 āśramāṃś ca yathā-saṅkhyam asṛjat saha vṛttibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:951: BhP_03.12.042/1 sāvitraṃ prājāpatyaṃ ca brāhmaṃ cātha bṛhat tathā
GP10bhp_03u:952: BhP_03.12.042/2 vārtā sañcaya-śālīna- śiloñcha iti vai gṛhe
GP10bhp_03u:953: BhP_03.12.043/1 vaikhānasā vālakhilyau- dumbarāḥ phenapā vane
GP10bhp_03u:954: BhP_03.12.043/2 nyāse kuṭīcakaḥ pūrvaṃ bahvodo haṃsa-niṣkriyau
GP10bhp_03u:955: BhP_03.12.044/1 ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍa-nītis tathaiva ca BhP_03.12.044/2 evaṃ vyāhṛtayaś cāsan praṇavo hy asya dahrataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:956: BhP_03.12.045/1 tasyoṣṇig āsīl lomabhyo gāyatrī ca tvaco vibhoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:957: BhP_03.12.045/2 triṣṭum māṃsāt snuto 'nuṣṭub jagaty asthnaḥ prajāpateḥ
GP10bhp_03u:958: BhP_03.12.046/1 majjāyāḥ paṅktir utpannā bṛhatī prāṇato 'bhavat
GP10bhp_03u:959: BhP_03.12.046/2 sparśas tasyābhavaj jīvaḥ svaro deha udāhṛta
GP10bhp_03u:960: BhP_03.12.047/1 ūṣmāṇam indriyāṇy āhur antaḥ-sthā balam ātmanaḥ BhP_03.12.047/2 svarāḥ sapta vihāreṇa bhavanti sma prajāpateḥ
GP10bhp_03u:963: BhP_03.12.049/1 tato 'parām upādāya sa sargāya mano dadhe BhP_03.12.049/2 ṛṣīṇāṃ bhūri-vīryāṇām api sargam avistṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:964: BhP_03.12.050/1 jñātvā tad dhṛdaye bhūyaś cintayām āsa kaurava
GP10bhp_03u:965: BhP_03.12.050/2 aho adbhutam etan me vyāpṛtasyāpi nityadā
GP10bhp_03u:966: BhP_03.12.051/1 na hy edhante prajā nūnaṃ daivam atra vighātakam BhP_03.12.051/2 evaṃ yukta-kṛtas tasya daivaṃ cāvekṣatas tadā
GP10bhp_03u:967: BhP_03.12.052/1 kasya rūpam abhūd dvedhā yat kāyam abhicakṣate
GP10bhp_03u:968: BhP_03.12.052/2 tābhyāṃ rūpa-vibhāgābhyāṃ mithunaṃ samapadyata BhP_03.12.053/1 yas tu tatra pumān so 'bhūn manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ svarāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:969: BhP_03.12.053/2 strī yāsīc chatarūpākhyā mahiṣy asya mahātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:970: BhP_03.12.054/1 tadā mithuna-dharmeṇa prajā hy edhām babhūvire
GP10bhp_03u:971: BhP_03.12.054/2 sa cāpi śatarūpāyāṃ pañcāpatyāny ajījanat BhP_03.12.055/1 priyavratottānapādau tisraḥ kanyāś ca bhārata BhP_03.12.055/2 ākūtir devahūtiś ca prasūtir iti sattama
GP10bhp_03u:972: BhP_03.12.056/1 ākūtiṃ rucaye prādāt kardamāya tu madhyamām
GP10bhp_03u:973: BhP_03.12.056/2 dakṣāyādāt prasūtiṃ ca yata āpūritaṃ jagat
GP10bhp_03u:975: BhP_03.13.001/1 niśamya vācaṃ vadato muneḥ puṇyatamāṃ nṛpa
GP10bhp_03u:977: BhP_03.13.002/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.13.002/1 sa vai svāyambhuvaḥ samrāṭ priyaḥ putraḥ svayambhuvaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:978: BhP_03.13.002/2 pratilabhya priyāṃ patnīṃ kiṃ cakāra tato mune
GP10bhp_03u:979: BhP_03.13.003/1 caritaṃ tasya rājarṣer ādi-rājasya sattama

GP10bhp_03u:1134: devaras te BhP_03.14.026/1 na yasya loke sva-janaḥ paro vā nātyādṛto nota kaścid vigarhyaḥ

GP10bhp_03u:1163: BhP_03.14.038/2 man-nideśāticāreṇa devānāṃ cātihelanāt BhP_03.14.039/1 bhaviṣyatas tavābhadrāv abhadre jāṭharādhamau

GP10bhp_03u:1308: BhP_03.15.046/0 kumārā ūcuḥ BhP_03.15.046/1 yo 'ntarhito hṛdi gato 'pi durātmanāṃ tvaṃ BhP_03.15.046/2 so 'dyaiva no nayana-mūlam ananta rāddhaḥ BhP_03.15.046/3 yarhy eva karṇa-vivareṇa guhāṃ gato naḥ

GP10bhp_03u:1344: BhP_03.16.010/1 ye me tanūr dvija-varān duhatīr madīyā BhP_03.16.010/2 bhūtāny alabdha-śaraṇāni ca bheda-buddhyā
GP10bhp_03u:1345: BhP_03.16.010/3 drakṣyanty agha-kṣata-dṛśo hy ahi-manyavas tān

GP10bhp_03u:1347: BhP_03.16.011/1 ye brāhmaṇān mayi dhiyā kṣipato 'rcayantas
GP10bhp_03u:1350: BhP_03.16.011/4 sambodhayanty aham ivāham upāhṛtas taiḥ BhP_03.16.012/1 tan me sva-bhartur avasāyam alakṣamāṇau BhP_03.16.012/2 yuṣmad-vyatikrama-gatiṃ pratipadya sadyaḥ BhP_03.16.012/3 bhūyo mamāntikam itāṃ tad anugraho me
GP10bhp_03u:1351: BhP_03.16.012/4 yat kalpatām acirato bhṛtayor vivāsaḥ BhP_03.16.013/0 brahmovāca

GP10bhp_03u:1353: BhP_03.16.013/2 nāsvādya manyu-daṣṭānāṃ teṣām ātmāpy atṛpyata
GP10bhp_03u:1354: BhP_03.16.014/1 satīṃ vyādāya śṛṇvanto laghvīṃ gurv-artha-gahvarām

GP10bhp_03u:1358: BhP_03.16.016/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ BhP_03.16.016/1 na vayaṃ bhagavan vidmas tava deva cikīrṣitam
GP10bhp_03u:1359: BhP_03.16.016/2 kṛto me 'nugrahaś ceti yad adhyakṣaḥ prabhāṣase
GP10bhp_03u:1360: BhP_03.16.017/1 brahmaṇyasya paraṃ daivaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ kila te prabho
GP10bhp_03u:1362: BhP_03.16.018/1 tvattaḥ sanātano dharmo rakṣyate tanubhis tava
GP10bhp_03u:1363: BhP_03.16.018/2 dharmasya paramo guhyo nirvikāro bhavān mataḥ

GP10bhp_03u:1365: BhP_03.16.019/2 yoginaḥ sa bhavān kiṃ svid anugṛhyeta yat paraiḥ BhP_03.16.020/1 yaṃ vai vibhūtir upayāty anuvelam anyair
GP10bhp_03u:1372: BhP_03.16.021/4 śrīvatsa-lakṣma kim agā bhaga-bhājanas tvam
GP10bhp_03u:1373: BhP_03.16.022/1 dharmasya te bhagavatas tri-yuga tribhiḥ svaiḥ BhP_03.16.022/2 padbhiś carācaram idaṃ dvija-devatārtham
GP10bhp_03u:1374: BhP_03.16.022/3 nūnaṃ bhṛtaṃ tad-abhighāti rajas tamaś ca
GP10bhp_03u:1375: BhP_03.16.022/4 sattvena no varadayā tanuvā nirasya BhP_03.16.023/1 na tvaṃ dvijottama-kulaṃ yadi hātma-gopaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1377: BhP_03.16.023/3 tarhy eva naṅkṣyati śivas tava deva panthā
GP10bhp_03u:1378: BhP_03.16.023/4 loko 'grahīṣyad ṛṣabhasya hi tat pramāṇam

GP10bhp_03u:1384: BhP_03.16.025/2 vṛttiṃ nu vā tad anumanmahi nirvyalīkam

GP10bhp_03u:1388: BhP_03.16.026/1 etau suretara-gatiṃ pratipadya sadyaḥ BhP_03.16.026/2 saṃrambha-sambhṛta-samādhy-anubaddha-yogau
GP10bhp_03u:1389: BhP_03.16.026/3 bhūyaḥ sakāśam upayāsyata āśu yo vaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1390: BhP_03.16.026/4 śāpo mayaiva nimitas tad aveta viprāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1392: BhP_03.16.027/1 atha te munayo dṛṣṭvā nayanānanda-bhājanam
GP10bhp_03u:1393: BhP_03.16.027/2 vaikuṇṭhaṃ tad-adhiṣṭhānaṃ vikuṇṭhaṃ ca svayaṃ-prabham
