GP10bhp_03u:1396: BhP_03.16.030/2 purāpavāritā dvāri viśantī mayy upārate BhP_03.16.031/1 mayi saṃrambha-yogena nistīrya brahma-helanam
GP10bhp_03u:1397: BhP_03.16.031/2 pratyeṣyataṃ nikāśaṃ me kālenālpīyasā punaḥ BhP_03.16.032/1 dvāḥsthāv ādiśya bhagavān vimāna-śreṇi-bhūṣaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:1398: BhP_03.16.032/2 sarvātiśayayā lakṣmyā juṣṭaṃ svaṃ dhiṣṇyam āviśat
GP10bhp_03u:1399: BhP_03.16.033/1 tau tu gīrvāṇa-ṛṣabhau dustarād dhari-lokataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1401: BhP_03.16.034/1 tadā vikuṇṭha-dhiṣaṇāt tayor nipatamānayoḥ BhP_03.16.034/2 hāhā-kāro mahān āsīd vimānāgryeṣu putrakāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1402: BhP_03.16.035/1 tāv eva hy adhunā prāptau pārṣada-pravarau hareḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1403: BhP_03.16.035/2 diter jaṭhara-nirviṣṭaṃ kāśyapaṃ teja ulbaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:1404: BhP_03.16.036/1 tayor asurayor adya tejasā yamayor hi vaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1405: BhP_03.16.036/2 ākṣiptaṃ teja etarhi bhagavāṃs tad vidhitsati
GP10bhp_03u:1408: BhP_03.16.037/3 kṣemaṃ vidhāsyati sa no bhagavāṃs tryadhīśas
GP10bhp_03u:1409: BhP_03.16.037/4 tatrāsmadīya-vimṛśena kiyān ihārthaḥ BhP_03.17.002/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.17.001/1 niśamyātma-bhuvā gītaṃ kāraṇaṃ śaṅkayojjhitāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1410: BhP_03.17.001/2 tataḥ sarve nyavartanta tridivāya divaukasaḥ BhP_03.17.002/1 ditis tu bhartur ādeśād apatya-pariśaṅkinī
GP10bhp_03u:1411: BhP_03.17.002/2 pūrṇe varṣa-śate sādhvī putrau prasuṣuve yamau
GP10bhp_03u:1412: BhP_03.17.003/1 utpātā bahavas tatra nipetur jāyamānayoḥ BhP_03.17.003/2 divi bhuvy antarikṣe ca lokasyoru-bhayāvahāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1413: BhP_03.17.004/1 sahācalā bhuvaś celur diśaḥ sarvāḥ prajajvaluḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1414: BhP_03.17.004/2 solkāś cāśanayaḥ petuḥ ketavaś cārti-hetavaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1415: BhP_03.17.005/1 vavau vāyuḥ suduḥsparśaḥ phūt-kārān īrayan muhuḥ BhP_03.17.005/2 unmūlayan naga-patīn vātyānīko rajo-dhvajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1417: BhP_03.17.006/2 vyomni praviṣṭa-tamasā na sma vyādṛśyate padam
GP10bhp_03u:1418: BhP_03.17.007/1 cukrośa vimanā vārdhir udūrmiḥ kṣubhitodaraḥ BhP_03.17.007/2 sodapānāś ca saritaś cukṣubhuḥ śuṣka-paṅkajāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1420: BhP_03.17.008/2 nirghātā ratha-nirhrādā vivarebhyaḥ prajajñire BhP_03.17.009/1 antar-grāmeṣu mukhato vamantyo vahnim ulbaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:1423: BhP_03.17.010/2 vyamuñcan vividhā vāco grāma-siṃhās tatas tataḥ BhP_03.17.011/1 kharāś ca karkaśaiḥ kṣattaḥ khurair ghnanto dharā-talam
GP10bhp_03u:1425: BhP_03.17.012/1 rudanto rāsabha-trastā nīḍād udapatan khagāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1426: BhP_03.17.012/2 ghoṣe 'raṇye ca paśavaḥ śakṛn-mūtram akurvata
GP10bhp_03u:1428: BhP_03.17.013/2 vyarudan deva-liṅgāni drumāḥ petur vinānilam
GP10bhp_03u:1429: BhP_03.17.014/1 grahān puṇyatamān anye bhagaṇāṃś cāpi dīpitāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1430: BhP_03.17.014/2 aticerur vakra-gatyā yuyudhuś ca parasparam
GP10bhp_03u:1431: BhP_03.17.015/1 dṛṣṭvānyāṃś ca mahotpātān atat-tattva-vidaḥ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1432: BhP_03.17.015/2 brahma-putrān ṛte bhītā menire viśva-samplavam
GP10bhp_03u:1437: BhP_03.17.017/2 gāṃ kampayantau caraṇaiḥ pade pade kaṭyā sukāñcyārkam atītya tasthatuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1438: BhP_03.17.018/1 prajāpatir nāma tayor akārṣīd yaḥ prāk sva-dehād yamayor ajāyata BhP_03.17.018/2 taṃ vai hiraṇyakaśipuṃ viduḥ prajā yaṃ taṃ hiraṇyākṣam asūta sāgrataḥ BhP_03.17.019/1 cakre hiraṇyakaśipur dorbhyāṃ brahma-vareṇa ca
GP10bhp_03u:1439: BhP_03.17.019/2 vaśe sa-pālān lokāṃs trīn akuto-mṛtyur uddhataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1440: BhP_03.17.020/1 hiraṇyākṣo 'nujas tasya priyaḥ prīti-kṛd anvaham
GP10bhp_03u:1441: BhP_03.17.020/2 gadā-pāṇir divaṃ yāto yuyutsur mṛgayan raṇam BhP_03.17.021/1 taṃ vīkṣya duḥsaha-javaṃ raṇat-kāñcana-nūpuram
GP10bhp_03u:1444: BhP_03.17.022/2 bhītā nililyire devās tārkṣya-trastā ivāhayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1445: BhP_03.17.023/1 sa vai tirohitān dṛṣṭvā mahasā svena daitya-rāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:1446: BhP_03.17.023/2 sendrān deva-gaṇān kṣībān apaśyan vyanadad bhṛśam
GP10bhp_03u:1447: BhP_03.17.024/1 tato nivṛttaḥ krīḍiṣyan gambhīraṃ bhīma-nisvanam
GP10bhp_03u:1448: BhP_03.17.024/2 vijagāhe mahā-sattvo vārdhiṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1449: BhP_03.17.025/1 tasmin praviṣṭe varuṇasya sainikā yādo-gaṇāḥ sanna-dhiyaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1451: BhP_03.17.025/2 ahanyamānā api tasya varcasā pradharṣitā dūrataraṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1453: BhP_03.17.026/1 sa varṣa-pūgān udadhau mahā-balaś caran mahormīñ chvasaneritān muhuḥ BhP_03.17.026/2 maurvyābhijaghne gadayā vibhāvarīm āsedivāṃs tāta purīṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1455: BhP_03.17.027/1 tatropalabhyāsura-loka-pālakaṃ yādo-gaṇānām ṛṣabhaṃ pracetasam BhP_03.17.027/2 smayan pralabdhuṃ praṇipatya nīcavaj jagāda me dehy adhirāja saṃyugam
GP10bhp_03u:1458: BhP_03.17.028/2 vijitya loke 'khila-daitya-dānavān yad rājasūyena purāyajat prabho BhP_03.17.029/1 sa evam utsikta-madena vidviṣā dṛḍhaṃ pralabdho bhagavān apāṃ patiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1459: BhP_03.17.029/2 roṣaṃ samutthaṃ śamayan svayā dhiyā vyavocad aṅgopaśamaṃ gatā vayam
GP10bhp_03u:1460: BhP_03.17.030/1 paśyāmi nānyaṃ puruṣāt purātanād yaḥ saṃyuge tvāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1462: BhP_03.17.030/2 ārādhayiṣyaty asurarṣabhehi taṃ manasvino yaṃ gṛṇate
GP10bhp_03u:1464: BhP_03.17.031/1 taṃ vīram ārād abhipadya vismayaḥ śayiṣyase vīra-śaye
GP10bhp_03u:1465: śvabhir vṛtaḥ BhP_03.17.031/2 yas tvad-vidhānām asatāṃ praśāntaye rūpāṇi dhatte
GP10bhp_03u:1467: BhP_03.18.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.18.001/1 tad evam ākarṇya jaleśa-bhāṣitaṃ mahā-manās tad vigaṇayya durmadaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1468: BhP_03.18.001/2 harer viditvā gatim aṅga nāradād rasātalaṃ nirviviśe tvarānvitaḥ BhP_03.18.002/1 dadarśa tatrābhijitaṃ dharā-dharaṃ pronnīyamānāvanim
GP10bhp_03u:1470: BhP_03.18.002/2 muṣṇantam akṣṇā sva-ruco 'ruṇa-śriyā jahāsa cāho vana-gocaro mṛgaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1471: BhP_03.18.003/1 āhainam ehy ajña mahīṃ vimuñca no rasaukasāṃ viśva-sṛjeyam
GP10bhp_03u:1473: BhP_03.18.003/2 na svasti yāsyasy anayā mamekṣataḥ surādhamāsādita-sūkarākṛte
GP10bhp_03u:1474: BhP_03.18.004/1 tvaṃ naḥ sapatnair abhavāya kiṃ bhṛto yo māyayā hanty
GP10bhp_03u:1476: BhP_03.18.004/2 tvāṃ yogamāyā-balam alpa-pauruṣaṃ saṃsthāpya mūḍha pramṛje
GP10bhp_03u:1478: BhP_03.18.005/1 tvayi saṃsthite gadayā śīrṇa-śīrṣaṇy asmad-bhuja-cyutayā
GP10bhp_03u:1480: BhP_03.18.005/2 baliṃ haranty ṛṣayo ye ca devāḥ svayaṃ sarve na
GP10bhp_03u:1481: bhaviṣyanty amūlāḥ BhP_03.18.006/1 sa tudyamāno 'ri-durukta-tomarair daṃṣṭrāgra-gāṃ gām upalakṣya bhītām
GP10bhp_03u:1482: BhP_03.18.006/2 todaṃ mṛṣan niragād ambu-madhyād grāhāhataḥ sa-kareṇur
GP10bhp_03u:1484: BhP_03.18.007/1 taṃ niḥsarantaṃ salilād anudruto hiraṇya-keśo dviradaṃ yathā jhaṣaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1485: BhP_03.18.007/2 karāla-daṃṣṭro 'śani-nisvano 'bravīd gata-hriyāṃ kiṃ tv asatāṃ vigarhitam BhP_03.18.008/1 sa gām udastāt salilasya gocare vinyasya tasyām adadhāt sva-sattvam
GP10bhp_03u:1486: BhP_03.18.008/2 abhiṣṭuto viśva-sṛjā prasūnair āpūryamāṇo vibudhaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1490: BhP_03.18.009/2 marmāṇy abhīkṣṇaṃ pratudantaṃ duruktaiḥ pracaṇḍa-manyuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1493: BhP_03.18.010/1 satyaṃ vayaṃ bho vana-gocarā mṛgā yuṣmad-vidhān mṛgaye
GP10bhp_03u:1495: BhP_03.18.010/2 na mṛtyu-pāśaiḥ pratimuktasya vīrā vikatthanaṃ tava gṛhṇanty abhadra
GP10bhp_03u:1496: BhP_03.18.011/1 ete vayaṃ nyāsa-harā rasaukasāṃ gata-hriyo gadayā drāvitās te
GP10bhp_03u:1497: BhP_03.18.011/2 tiṣṭhāmahe 'thāpi kathañcid ājau stheyaṃ kva yāmo balinotpādya vairam BhP_03.18.012/1 tvaṃ pad-rathānāṃ kila yūthapādhipo ghaṭasva no 'svastaya
GP10bhp_03u:1498: āśv anūhaḥ BhP_03.18.012/2 saṃsthāpya cāsmān pramṛjāśru svakānāṃ yaḥ svāṃ pratijñāṃ nātipiparty
GP10bhp_03u:1499: BhP_03.18.013/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.18.013/1 so 'dhikṣipto bhagavatā pralabdhaś ca ruṣā bhṛśam BhP_03.18.013/2 ājahārolbaṇaṃ krodhaṃ krīḍyamāno 'hi-rāḍ iva
GP10bhp_03u:1501: BhP_03.18.014/2 āsādya tarasā daityo gadayā nyahanad dharim
GP10bhp_03u:1502: BhP_03.18.015/1 bhagavāṃs tu gadā-vegaṃ visṛṣṭaṃ ripuṇorasi BhP_03.18.015/2 avañcayat tiraścīno yogārūḍha ivāntakam
GP10bhp_03u:1503: BhP_03.18.016/1 punar gadāṃ svām ādāya bhrāmayantam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1504: BhP_03.18.016/2 abhyadhāvad dhariḥ kruddhaḥ saṃrambhād daṣṭa-dacchadam
GP10bhp_03u:1505: BhP_03.18.017/1 tataś ca gadayārātiṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ bhruvi prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1506: BhP_03.18.017/2 ājaghne sa tu tāṃ saumya gadayā kovido 'hanat
GP10bhp_03u:1507: BhP_03.18.018/1 evaṃ gadābhyāṃ gurvībhyāṃ haryakṣo harir eva ca
GP10bhp_03u:1511: BhP_03.18.019/2 vicitra-mārgāṃś carator jigīṣayā vyabhād ilāyām iva śuṣmiṇor mṛdhaḥ BhP_03.18.020/1 daityasya yajñāvayavasya māyā- gṛhīta-vārāha-tanor
GP10bhp_03u:1513: BhP_03.18.020/2 kauravya mahyāṃ dviṣator vimardanaṃ didṛkṣur āgād ṛṣibhir vṛtaḥ svarāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:1516: BhP_03.18.021/2 vilakṣya daityaṃ bhagavān sahasra-ṇīr jagāda nārāyaṇam ādi-sūkaram
GP10bhp_03u:1518: BhP_03.18.022/1 eṣa te deva devānām aṅghri-mūlam upeyuṣām
GP10bhp_03u:1519: BhP_03.18.022/2 viprāṇāṃ saurabheyīṇāṃ bhūtānām apy anāgasām BhP_03.18.023/1 āgas-kṛd bhaya-kṛd duṣkṛd asmad-rāddha-varo 'suraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1520: BhP_03.18.023/2 anveṣann apratiratho lokān aṭati kaṇṭakaḥ BhP_03.18.024/1 mainaṃ māyāvinaṃ dṛptaṃ niraṅkuśam asattamam BhP_03.18.024/2 ākrīḍa bālavad deva yathāśīviṣam utthitam BhP_03.18.025/1 na yāvad eṣa vardheta svāṃ velāṃ prāpya dāruṇaḥ BhP_03.18.025/2 svāṃ deva māyām āsthāya tāvaj jahy agham acyuta BhP_03.18.026/1 eṣā ghoratamā sandhyā loka-cchambaṭ-karī prabho
GP10bhp_03u:1521: BhP_03.18.026/2 upasarpati sarvātman surāṇāṃ jayam āvaha BhP_03.18.027/1 adhunaiṣo 'bhijin nāma yogo mauhūrtiko hy agāt BhP_03.18.027/2 śivāya nas tvaṃ suhṛdām āśu nistara dustaram
GP10bhp_03u:1522: BhP_03.18.028/1 diṣṭyā tvāṃ vihitaṃ mṛtyum ayam āsāditaḥ svayam
GP10bhp_03u:1523: BhP_03.18.028/2 vikramyainaṃ mṛdhe hatvā lokān ādhehi śarmaṇi
GP10bhp_03u:1524: BhP_03.19.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.19.001/1 avadhārya viriñcasya nirvyalīkāmṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1525: BhP_03.19.001/2 prahasya prema-garbheṇa tad apāṅgena so 'grahīt
GP10bhp_03u:1526: BhP_03.19.002/1 tataḥ sapatnaṃ mukhataś carantam akuto-bhayam
GP10bhp_03u:1527: BhP_03.19.002/2 jaghānotpatya gadayā hanāv asuram akṣajaḥ BhP_03.19.003/1 sā hatā tena gadayā vihatā bhagavat-karāt
GP10bhp_03u:1528: BhP_03.19.003/2 vighūrṇitāpatad reje tad adbhutam ivābhavat BhP_03.19.004/1 sa tadā labdha-tīrtho 'pi na babādhe nirāyudham
GP10bhp_03u:1529: BhP_03.19.004/2 mānayan sa mṛdhe dharmaṃ viṣvaksenaṃ prakopayan
GP10bhp_03u:1531: BhP_03.19.005/2 mānayām āsa tad-dharmaṃ sunābhaṃ cāsmarad vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1534: BhP_03.19.006/2 citrā vāco 'tad-vidāṃ khe-carāṇāṃ tatra smāsan svasti te
GP10bhp_03u:1536: BhP_03.19.007/1 sa taṃ niśāmyātta-rathāṅgam agrato vyavasthitaṃ padma-palāśa-locanam
GP10bhp_03u:1538: ādaśac chvasan BhP_03.19.008/1 karāla-daṃṣṭraś cakṣurbhyāṃ sañcakṣāṇo dahann iva
GP10bhp_03u:1539: BhP_03.19.008/2 abhiplutya sva-gadayā hato 'sīty āhanad dharim BhP_03.19.009/1 padā savyena tāṃ sādho bhagavān yajña-sūkaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1540: BhP_03.19.009/2 līlayā miṣataḥ śatroḥ prāharad vāta-raṃhasam
GP10bhp_03u:1541: BhP_03.19.010/1 āha cāyudham ādhatsva ghaṭasva tvaṃ jigīṣasi
GP10bhp_03u:1542: BhP_03.19.010/2 ity uktaḥ sa tadā bhūyas tāḍayan vyanadad bhṛśam BhP_03.19.011/1 tāṃ sa āpatatīṃ vīkṣya bhagavān samavasthitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1543: BhP_03.19.011/2 jagrāha līlayā prāptāṃ garutmān iva pannagīm
GP10bhp_03u:1545: BhP_03.19.012/2 naicchad gadāṃ dīyamānāṃ hariṇā vigata-prabhaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1547: BhP_03.19.013/2 yajñāya dhṛta-rūpāya viprāyābhicaran yathā BhP_03.19.014/1 tad ojasā daitya-mahā-bhaṭārpitaṃ cakāsad antaḥ-kha
GP10bhp_03u:1549: BhP_03.19.014/2 cakreṇa ciccheda niśāta-neminā harir yathā tārkṣya-patatram ujjhitam
GP10bhp_03u:1550: BhP_03.19.015/1 vṛkṇe sva-śūle bahudhāriṇā hareḥ pratyetya vistīrṇam uro vibhūtimat
GP10bhp_03u:1551: BhP_03.19.015/2 pravṛddha-roṣaḥ sa kaṭhora-muṣṭinā nadan prahṛtyāntaradhīyatāsuraḥ BhP_03.19.016/1 tenettham āhataḥ kṣattar bhagavān ādi-sūkaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1552: BhP_03.19.016/2 nākampata manāk kvāpi srajā hata iva dvipaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1554: BhP_03.19.017/2 yāṃ vilokya prajās trastā menire 'syopasaṃyamam
GP10bhp_03u:1555: BhP_03.19.018/1 pravavur vāyavaś caṇḍās tamaḥ pāṃsavam airayan
GP10bhp_03u:1556: BhP_03.19.018/2 digbhyo nipetur grāvāṇaḥ kṣepaṇaiḥ prahitā iva
GP10bhp_03u:1564: BhP_03.19.022/2 sudarśanāstraṃ bhagavān prāyuṅkta dayitaṃ tri-pāt
GP10bhp_03u:1565: BhP_03.19.023/1 tadā diteḥ samabhavat sahasā hṛdi vepathuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1566: BhP_03.19.023/2 smarantyā bhartur ādeśaṃ stanāc cāsṛk prasusruve
GP10bhp_03u:1567: BhP_03.19.024/1 vinaṣṭāsu sva-māyāsu bhūyaś cāvrajya keśavam
GP10bhp_03u:1569: BhP_03.19.025/1 taṃ muṣṭibhir vinighnantaṃ vajra-sārair adhokṣajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1570: BhP_03.19.025/2 kareṇa karṇa-mūle 'han yathā tvāṣṭraṃ marut-patiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1571: BhP_03.19.026/1 sa āhato viśva-jitā hy avajñayā paribhramad-gātra
GP10bhp_03u:1575: BhP_03.19.027/1 kṣitau śayānaṃ tam akuṇṭha-varcasaṃ karāla-daṃṣṭraṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1577: BhP_03.19.027/2 ajādayo vīkṣya śaśaṃsur āgatā aho imaṃ ko nu labheta
GP10bhp_03u:1579: BhP_03.19.028/1 yaṃ yogino yoga-samādhinā raho dhyāyanti liṅgād asato mumukṣayā BhP_03.19.028/2 tasyaiṣa daitya-ṛṣabhaḥ padāhato mukhaṃ prapaśyaṃs tanum utsasarja ha
GP10bhp_03u:1580: BhP_03.19.029/1 etau tau pārṣadāv asya śāpād yātāv asad-gatim
GP10bhp_03u:1581: BhP_03.19.029/2 punaḥ katipayaiḥ sthānaṃ prapatsyete ha janmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1582: BhP_03.19.030/0 devā ūcuḥ BhP_03.19.030/1 namo namas te 'khila-yajña-tantave sthitau
GP10bhp_03u:1584: BhP_03.19.030/2 diṣṭyā hato 'yaṃ jagatām aruntudas tvat-pāda-bhaktyā vayam īśa nirvṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1585: BhP_03.19.031/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.19.031/1 evaṃ hiraṇyākṣam asahya-vikramaṃ sa sādayitvā
GP10bhp_03u:1587: BhP_03.19.031/2 jagāma lokaṃ svam akhaṇḍitotsavaṃ samīḍitaḥ puṣkara-viṣṭarādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1588: BhP_03.19.032/1 mayā yathānūktam avādi te hareḥ kṛtāvatārasya sumitra ceṣṭitam BhP_03.19.032/2 yathā hiraṇyākṣa udāra-vikramo mahā-mṛdhe krīḍanavan nirākṛtaḥ BhP_03.19.033/0 sūta uvāca BhP_03.19.033/1 iti kauṣāravākhyātām āśrutya bhagavat-kathām
GP10bhp_03u:1589: BhP_03.19.033/2 kṣattānandaṃ paraṃ lebhe mahā-bhāgavato dvija
GP10bhp_03u:1591: BhP_03.19.034/2 upaśrutya bhaven modaḥ śrīvatsāṅkasya kiṃ punaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1592: BhP_03.19.035/1 yo gajendraṃ jhaṣa-grastaṃ dhyāyantaṃ caraṇāmbujam BhP_03.19.035/2 krośantīnāṃ kareṇūnāṃ kṛcchrato 'mocayad drutam
GP10bhp_03u:1593: BhP_03.19.036/1 taṃ sukhārādhyam ṛjubhir ananya-śaraṇair nṛbhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1594: BhP_03.19.036/2 kṛtajñaḥ ko na seveta durārādhyam asādhubhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1595: BhP_03.19.037/1 yo vai hiraṇyākṣa-vadhaṃ mahādbhutaṃ vikrīḍitaṃ kāraṇa-sūkarātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1596: BhP_03.19.037/2 śṛṇoti gāyaty anumodate 'ñjasā vimucyate brahma-vadhād api dvijāḥ BhP_03.19.038/1 etan mahā-puṇyam alaṃ pavitraṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ padam āyur-āśiṣām
GP10bhp_03u:1597: BhP_03.19.038/2 prāṇendriyāṇāṃ yudhi śaurya-vardhanaṃ nārāyaṇo 'nte gatir aṅga śṛṇvatām
GP10bhp_03u:1598: BhP_03.20.001/0 śaunaka uvāca BhP_03.20.001/1 mahīṃ pratiṣṭhām adhyasya saute svāyambhuvo
GP10bhp_03u:1600: BhP_03.20.002/1 kṣattā mahā-bhāgavataḥ kṛṣṇasyaikāntikaḥ suhṛt BhP_03.20.002/2 yas tatyājāgrajaṃ kṛṣṇe sāpatyam aghavān iti
GP10bhp_03u:1601: BhP_03.20.003/1 dvaipāyanād anavaro mahitve tasya dehajaḥ BhP_03.20.003/2 sarvātmanā śritaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tat-parāṃś cāpy anuvrataḥ BhP_03.20.004/1 kim anvapṛcchan maitreyaṃ virajās tīrtha-sevayā
GP10bhp_03u:1603: BhP_03.20.005/1 tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ sūta pravṛttā hy amalāḥ kathāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1604: BhP_03.20.005/2 āpo gāṅgā ivāgha-ghnīr hareḥ pādāmbujāśrayāḥ BhP_03.20.006/1 tā naḥ kīrtaya bhadraṃ te kīrtanyodāra-karmaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1605: BhP_03.20.006/2 rasajñaḥ ko nu tṛpyeta hari-līlāmṛtaṃ piban
GP10bhp_03u:1606: BhP_03.20.007/1 evam ugraśravāḥ pṛṣṭa ṛṣibhir naimiṣāyanaiḥ BhP_03.20.007/2 bhagavaty arpitādhyātmas tān āha śrūyatām iti
GP10bhp_03u:1607: BhP_03.20.008/0 sūta uvāca BhP_03.20.008/1 harer dhṛta-kroḍa-tanoḥ sva-māyayā niśamya gor
GP10bhp_03u:1609: BhP_03.20.008/2 līlāṃ hiraṇyākṣam avajñayā hataṃ sañjāta-harṣo munim āha bhārataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1610: BhP_03.20.009/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.20.009/1 prajāpati-patiḥ sṛṣṭvā prajā-sarge prajāpatīn
GP10bhp_03u:1611: BhP_03.20.009/2 kim ārabhata me brahman prabrūhy avyakta-mārga-vit
GP10bhp_03u:1612: BhP_03.20.010/1 ye marīcy-ādayo viprā yas tu svāyambhuvo manuḥ BhP_03.20.010/2 te vai brahmaṇa ādeśāt katham etad abhāvayan
GP10bhp_03u:1613: BhP_03.20.011/1 sa-dvitīyāḥ kim asṛjan svatantrā uta karmasu BhP_03.20.011/2 āho svit saṃhatāḥ sarva idaṃ sma samakalpayan
GP10bhp_03u:1614: BhP_03.20.012/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.20.012/1 daivena durvitarkyeṇa pareṇānimiṣeṇa ca
GP10bhp_03u:1615: BhP_03.20.012/2 jāta-kṣobhād bhagavato mahān āsīd guṇa-trayāt
GP10bhp_03u:1617: BhP_03.20.013/2 jātaḥ sasarja bhūtādir viyad-ādīni pañcaśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1618: BhP_03.20.014/1 tāni caikaikaśaḥ sraṣṭum asamarthāni bhautikam BhP_03.20.014/2 saṃhatya daiva-yogena haimam aṇḍam avāsṛjan
GP10bhp_03u:1619: BhP_03.20.015/1 so 'śayiṣṭābdhi-salile āṇḍakośo nirātmakaḥ BhP_03.20.015/2 sāgraṃ vai varṣa-sāhasram anvavātsīt tam īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1620: BhP_03.20.016/1 tasya nābher abhūt padmaṃ sahasrārkoru-dīdhiti
GP10bhp_03u:1621: BhP_03.20.016/2 sarva-jīvanikāyauko yatra svayam abhūt svarāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:1622: BhP_03.20.017/1 so 'nuviṣṭo bhagavatā yaḥ śete salilāśaye
GP10bhp_03u:1623: BhP_03.20.017/2 loka-saṃsthāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ nirmame saṃsthayā svayā BhP_03.20.018/1 sasarja cchāyayāvidyāṃ pañca-parvāṇam agrataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1624: BhP_03.20.018/2 tāmisram andha-tāmisraṃ tamo moho mahā-tamaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1627: BhP_03.20.020/1 kṣut-tṛḍbhyām upasṛṣṭās te taṃ jagdhum abhidudruvuḥ BhP_03.20.020/2 mā rakṣatainaṃ jakṣadhvam ity ūcuḥ kṣut-tṛḍ-arditāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1628: BhP_03.20.021/1 devas tān āha saṃvigno mā māṃ jakṣata rakṣata BhP_03.20.021/2 aho me yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi prajā yūyaṃ babhūvitha
GP10bhp_03u:1629: BhP_03.20.022/1 devatāḥ prabhayā yā yā dīvyan pramukhato 'sṛjat
GP10bhp_03u:1630: BhP_03.20.022/2 te ahārṣur devayanto visṛṣṭāṃ tāṃ prabhām ahaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1633: BhP_03.20.024/1 tato hasan sa bhagavān asurair nirapatrapaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1634: BhP_03.20.024/2 anvīyamānas tarasā kruddho bhītaḥ parāpatat BhP_03.20.025/1 sa upavrajya varadaṃ prapannārti-haraṃ harim
GP10bhp_03u:1636: BhP_03.20.026/1 pāhi māṃ paramātmaṃs te preṣaṇenāsṛjaṃ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1637: BhP_03.20.026/2 tā imā yabhituṃ pāpā upākrāmanti māṃ prabho
GP10bhp_03u:1638: BhP_03.20.027/1 tvam ekaḥ kila lokānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ kleśa-nāśanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1639: BhP_03.20.027/2 tvam ekaḥ kleśadas teṣām anāsanna-padāṃ tava
GP10bhp_03u:1641: BhP_03.20.028/2 vimuñcātma-tanuṃ ghorām ity ukto vimumoca ha BhP_03.20.029/1 tāṃ kvaṇac-caraṇāmbhojāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1646: BhP_03.20.031/2 upalabhyāsurā dharma sarve sammumuhuḥ striyam BhP_03.20.032/1 aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho asyā navaṃ vayaḥ BhP_03.20.032/2 madhye kāmayamānānām akāmeva visarpati
GP10bhp_03u:1647: BhP_03.20.033/1 vitarkayanto bahudhā tāṃ sandhyāṃ pramadākṛtim BhP_03.20.033/2 abhisambhāvya viśrambhāt paryapṛcchan kumedhasaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1648: BhP_03.20.034/1 kāsi kasyāsi rambhoru ko vārthas te 'tra bhāmini
GP10bhp_03u:1650: BhP_03.20.035/1 yā vā kācit tvam abale diṣṭyā sandarśanaṃ tava BhP_03.20.035/2 utsunoṣīkṣamāṇānāṃ kanduka-krīḍayā manaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1651: BhP_03.20.036/1 naikatra te jayati śālini pāda-padmaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1655: BhP_03.20.037/1 iti sāyantanīṃ sandhyām asurāḥ pramadāyatīm BhP_03.20.037/2 pralobhayantīṃ jagṛhur matvā mūḍha-dhiyaḥ striyam
GP10bhp_03u:1656: BhP_03.20.038/1 prahasya bhāva-gambhīraṃ jighrantyātmānam ātmanā BhP_03.20.038/2 kāntyā sasarja bhagavān gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇān BhP_03.20.039/1 visasarja tanuṃ tāṃ vai jyotsnāṃ kāntimatīṃ priyām
GP10bhp_03u:1657: BhP_03.20.039/2 ta eva cādaduḥ prītyā viśvāvasu-purogamāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1658: BhP_03.20.040/1 sṛṣṭvā bhūta-piśācāṃś ca bhagavān ātma-tandriṇā
GP10bhp_03u:1659: BhP_03.20.040/2 dig-vāsaso mukta-keśān vīkṣya cāmīlayad dṛśau
GP10bhp_03u:1660: BhP_03.20.041/1 jagṛhus tad-visṛṣṭāṃ tāṃ jṛmbhaṇākhyāṃ tanuṃ prabhoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1661: BhP_03.20.041/2 nidrām indriya-vikledo yayā bhūteṣu dṛśyate
GP10bhp_03u:1662: BhP_03.20.041/3 yenocchiṣṭān dharṣayanti tam unmādaṃ pracakṣate BhP_03.20.042/1 ūrjasvantaṃ manyamāna ātmānaṃ bhagavān ajaḥ BhP_03.20.042/2 sādhyān gaṇān pitṛ-gaṇān parokṣeṇāsṛjat prabhuḥ BhP_03.20.043/1 ta ātma-sargaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ pitaraḥ pratipedire
GP10bhp_03u:1663: BhP_03.20.043/2 sādhyebhyaś ca pitṛbhyaś ca kavayo yad vitanvate
GP10bhp_03u:1664: BhP_03.20.044/1 siddhān vidyādharāṃś caiva tirodhānena so 'sṛjat
GP10bhp_03u:1665: BhP_03.20.044/2 tebhyo 'dadāt tam ātmānam antardhānākhyam adbhutam
GP10bhp_03u:1666: BhP_03.20.045/1 sa kinnarān kimpuruṣān pratyātmyenāsṛjat prabhuḥ BhP_03.20.045/2 mānayann ātmanātmānam ātmābhāsaṃ vilokayan
GP10bhp_03u:1667: BhP_03.20.046/1 te tu taj jagṛhū rūpaṃ tyaktaṃ yat parameṣṭhinā BhP_03.20.046/2 mithunī-bhūya gāyantas tam evoṣasi karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1668: BhP_03.20.047/1 dehena vai bhogavatā śayāno bahu-cintayā
GP10bhp_03u:1669: BhP_03.20.047/2 sarge 'nupacite krodhād utsasarja ha tad vapuḥ BhP_03.20.048/1 ye 'hīyantāmutaḥ keśā ahayas te 'ṅga jajñire
GP10bhp_03u:1670: BhP_03.20.048/2 sarpāḥ prasarpataḥ krūrā nāgā bhogoru-kandharāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1671: BhP_03.20.049/1 sa ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṛta-kṛtyam ivātmabhūḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1672: BhP_03.20.049/2 tadā manūn sasarjānte manasā loka-bhāvanān
GP10bhp_03u:1673: BhP_03.20.050/1 tebhyaḥ so 'sṛjat svīyaṃ puraṃ puruṣam ātmavān
GP10bhp_03u:1674: BhP_03.20.050/2 tān dṛṣṭvā ye purā sṛṣṭāḥ praśaśaṃsuḥ prajāpatim
GP10bhp_03u:1675: BhP_03.20.051/1 aho etaj jagat-sraṣṭaḥ sukṛtaṃ bata te kṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:1676: BhP_03.20.051/2 pratiṣṭhitāḥ kriyā yasmin sākam annam adāma he
GP10bhp_03u:1677: BhP_03.20.052/1 tapasā vidyayā yukto yogena susamādhinā BhP_03.20.052/2 ṛṣīn ṛṣir hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasarjābhimatāḥ prajāḥ BhP_03.20.053/1 tebhyaś caikaikaśaḥ svasya dehasyāṃśam adād ajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1679: BhP_03.21.001/0 vidura uvāca BhP_03.21.001/1 svāyambhuvasya ca manor aṃśaḥ parama-sammataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1680: BhP_03.21.001/2 kathyatāṃ bhagavan yatra maithunenaidhire prajāḥ BhP_03.21.002/1 priyavratottānapādau sutau svāyambhuvasya vai
GP10bhp_03u:1682: BhP_03.21.003/1 tasya vai duhitā brahman devahūtīti viśrutā
GP10bhp_03u:1683: BhP_03.21.003/2 patnī prajāpater uktā kardamasya tvayānagha BhP_03.21.004/1 tasyāṃ sa vai mahā-yogī yuktāyāṃ yoga-lakṣaṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1684: BhP_03.21.004/2 sasarja katidhā vīryaṃ tan me śuśrūṣave vada
GP10bhp_03u:1685: BhP_03.21.005/1 rucir yo bhagavān brahman dakṣo vā brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ BhP_03.21.005/2 yathā sasarja bhūtāni labdhvā bhāryāṃ ca mānavīm
GP10bhp_03u:1686: BhP_03.21.006/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.21.006/1 prajāḥ sṛjeti bhagavān kardamo brahmaṇoditaḥ BhP_03.21.006/2 sarasvatyāṃ tapas tepe sahasrāṇāṃ samā daśa
GP10bhp_03u:1689: BhP_03.21.008/1 tāvat prasanno bhagavān puṣkarākṣaḥ kṛte yuge
GP10bhp_03u:1690: BhP_03.21.008/2 darśayām āsa taṃ kṣattaḥ śābdaṃ brahma dadhad vapuḥ BhP_03.21.009/1 sa taṃ virajam arkābhaṃ sita-padmotpala-srajam
GP10bhp_03u:1695: BhP_03.21.011/2 dṛṣṭvā khe 'vasthitaṃ vakṣaḥ- śriyaṃ kaustubha-kandharam
GP10bhp_03u:1697: BhP_03.21.012/2 gīrbhis tv abhyagṛṇāt prīti- svabhāvātmā kṛtāñjaliḥ BhP_03.21.013/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_03.21.013/1 juṣṭaṃ batādyākhila-sattva-rāśeḥ sāṃsiddhyam akṣṇos tava
GP10bhp_03u:1698: darśanān naḥ BhP_03.21.013/2 yad-darśanaṃ janmabhir īḍya sadbhir āśāsate yogino rūḍha-yogāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1699: BhP_03.21.014/1 ye māyayā te hata-medhasas tvat- pādāravindaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1701: BhP_03.21.014/2 upāsate kāma-lavāya teṣāṃ rāsīśa kāmān niraye 'pi ye syuḥ BhP_03.21.015/1 tathā sa cāhaṃ parivoḍhu-kāmaḥ samāna-śīlāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1703: BhP_03.21.015/2 upeyivān mūlam aśeṣa-mūlaṃ durāśayaḥ kāma-dughāṅghripasya
GP10bhp_03u:1704: BhP_03.21.016/1 prajāpates te vacasādhīśa tantyā lokaḥ kilāyaṃ kāma-hato
GP10bhp_03u:1706: BhP_03.21.016/2 ahaṃ ca lokānugato vahāmi baliṃ ca śuklānimiṣāya tubhyam BhP_03.21.017/1 lokāṃś ca lokānugatān paśūṃś ca hitvā śritās te caraṇātapatram
GP10bhp_03u:1709: BhP_03.21.018/1 na te 'jarākṣa-bhramir āyur eṣāṃ trayodaśāraṃ tri-śataṃ
GP10bhp_03u:1711: BhP_03.21.018/2 ṣaṇ-nemy ananta-cchadi yat tri-ṇābhi karāla-sroto jagad ācchidya dhāvat
GP10bhp_03u:1712: BhP_03.21.019/1 ekaḥ svayaṃ san jagataḥ sisṛkṣayā- dvitīyayātmann
GP10bhp_03u:1714: BhP_03.21.019/2 sṛjasy adaḥ pāsi punar grasiṣyase yathorṇa-nābhir bhagavan
GP10bhp_03u:1716: BhP_03.21.020/1 naitad batādhīśa padaṃ tavepsitaṃ yan māyayā nas tanuṣe bhūta-sūkṣmam
GP10bhp_03u:1717: BhP_03.21.020/2 anugrahāyāstv api yarhi māyayā lasat-tulasyā bhagavān vilakṣitaḥ BhP_03.21.021/1 taṃ tvānubhūtyoparata-kriyārthaṃ sva-māyayā
GP10bhp_03u:1719: BhP_03.21.021/2 namāmy abhīkṣṇaṃ namanīya-pāda- sarojam alpīyasi kāma-varṣam
GP10bhp_03u:1720: BhP_03.21.022/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_03.21.022/1 ity avyalīkaṃ praṇuto 'bja-nābhas tam ābabhāṣe vacasāmṛtena
GP10bhp_03u:1724: BhP_03.21.023/1 viditvā tava caityaṃ me puraiva samayoji tat
GP10bhp_03u:1725: BhP_03.21.023/2 yad-artham ātma-niyamais tvayaivāhaṃ samarcitaḥ BhP_03.21.024/1 na vai jātu mṛṣaiva syāt prajādhyakṣa mad-arhaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:1728: BhP_03.21.025/2 brahmāvartaṃ yo 'dhivasan śāsti saptārṇavāṃ mahīm
GP10bhp_03u:1729: BhP_03.21.026/1 sa ceha vipra rājarṣir mahiṣyā śatarūpayā
GP10bhp_03u:1730: BhP_03.21.026/2 āyāsyati didṛkṣus tvāṃ paraśvo dharma-kovidaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1732: BhP_03.21.027/2 mṛgayantīṃ patiṃ dāsyaty anurūpāya te prabho
GP10bhp_03u:1733: BhP_03.21.028/1 samāhitaṃ te hṛdayaṃ yatremān parivatsarān BhP_03.21.028/2 sā tvāṃ brahman nṛpa-vadhūḥ kāmam āśu bhajiṣyati
GP10bhp_03u:1734: BhP_03.21.029/1 yā ta ātma-bhṛtaṃ vīryaṃ navadhā prasaviṣyati
GP10bhp_03u:1735: BhP_03.21.029/2 vīrye tvadīye ṛṣaya ādhāsyanty añjasātmanaḥ BhP_03.21.030/1 tvaṃ ca samyag anuṣṭhāya nideśaṃ ma uśattamaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1736: BhP_03.21.030/2 mayi tīrthī-kṛtāśeṣa- kriyārtho māṃ prapatsyase
GP10bhp_03u:1737: BhP_03.21.031/1 kṛtvā dayāṃ ca jīveṣu dattvā cābhayam ātmavān
GP10bhp_03u:1738: BhP_03.21.031/2 mayy ātmānaṃ saha jagad drakṣyasy ātmani cāpi mām BhP_03.21.032/1 sahāhaṃ svāṃśa-kalayā tvad-vīryeṇa mahā-mune
GP10bhp_03u:1739: BhP_03.21.032/2 tava kṣetre devahūtyāṃ praṇeṣye tattva-saṃhitām
GP10bhp_03u:1740: BhP_03.21.033/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.21.033/1 evaṃ tam anubhāṣyātha bhagavān pratyag-akṣajaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:1744: BhP_03.21.034/2 ākarṇayan patra-rathendra-pakṣair uccāritaṃ stomam udīrṇa-sāma

GP10bhp_03u:1967: BhP_03.24.006/2 kārdamaṃ vīryam āpanno jajñe 'gnir iva dāruṇi BhP_03.24.007/1 avādayaṃs tadā vyomni vāditrāṇi ghanāghanāḥ BhP_03.24.007/2 gāyanti taṃ sma gandharvā nṛtyanty apsaraso mudā

GP10bhp_03u:1970: BhP_03.24.010/1 bhagavantaṃ paraṃ brahma sattvenāṃśena śatru-han

GP10bhp_03u:1989: BhP_03.24.020/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.24.020/1 tāv āśvāsya jagat-sraṣṭā kumāraiḥ saha-nāradaḥ

GP10bhp_03u:1994: BhP_03.24.023/2 khyātiṃ ca bhṛgave 'yacchad vasiṣṭhāyāpy arundhatīm BhP_03.24.024/1 atharvaṇe 'dadāc chāntiṃ yayā yajño vitanyate
GP10bhp_03u:1996: BhP_03.24.025/1 tatas ta ṛṣayaḥ kṣattaḥ kṛta-dārā nimantrya tam BhP_03.24.025/2 prātiṣṭhan nandim āpannāḥ svaṃ svam āśrama-maṇḍalam
GP10bhp_03u:1997: BhP_03.24.026/1 sa cāvatīrṇaṃ tri-yugam ājñāya vibudharṣabham BhP_03.24.026/2 vivikta upasaṅgamya praṇamya samabhāṣata
GP10bhp_03u:1998: BhP_03.24.027/1 aho pāpacyamānānāṃ niraye svair amaṅgalaiḥ BhP_03.24.027/2 kālena bhūyasā nūnaṃ prasīdantīha devatāḥ BhP_03.24.028/1 bahu-janma-vipakvena samyag-yoga-samādhinā

GP10bhp_03u:2011: BhP_03.24.034/2 parivrajat-padavīm āsthito 'haṃ cariṣye tvāṃ hṛdi yuñjan viśokaḥ BhP_03.24.035/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
GP10bhp_03u:2012: BhP_03.24.035/1 mayā proktaṃ hi lokasya pramāṇaṃ satya-laukike

GP10bhp_03u:2015: BhP_03.24.037/1 eṣa ātma-patho 'vyakto naṣṭaḥ kālena bhūyasā

GP10bhp_03u:2017: BhP_03.24.038/1 gaccha kāmaṃ mayāpṛṣṭo mayi sannyasta-karmaṇā
GP10bhp_03u:2018: BhP_03.24.038/2 jitvā sudurjayaṃ mṛtyum amṛtatvāya māṃ bhaja

GP10bhp_03u:2023: BhP_03.24.042/1 vrataṃ sa āsthito maunam ātmaika-śaraṇo muniḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2026: BhP_03.24.044/1 nirahaṅkṛtir nirmamaś ca nirdvandvaḥ sama-dṛk sva-dṛk

GP10bhp_03u:2033: BhP_03.25.001/0 śaunaka uvāca BhP_03.25.001/1 kapilas tattva-saṅkhyātā bhagavān ātma-māyayā

GP10bhp_03u:2039: BhP_03.25.005/2 tasmin bindusare 'vātsīd bhagavān kapilaḥ kila

GP10bhp_03u:2042: BhP_03.25.007/2 yena sambhāvyamānena prapannāndhaṃ tamaḥ prabho BhP_03.25.008/1 tasya tvaṃ tamaso 'ndhasya duṣpārasyādya pāragam BhP_03.25.008/2 sac-cakṣur janmanām ante labdhaṃ me tvad-anugrahāt
GP10bhp_03u:2043: BhP_03.25.009/1 ya ādyo bhagavān puṃsām īśvaro vai bhavān kila BhP_03.25.009/2 lokasya tamasāndhasya cakṣuḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ BhP_03.25.010/1 atha me deva sammoham apākraṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
GP10bhp_03u:2044: BhP_03.25.010/2 yo 'vagraho 'haṃ mametīty etasmin yojitas tvayā
GP10bhp_03u:2045: BhP_03.25.011/1 taṃ tvā gatāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ sva-bhṛtya-saṃsāra-taroḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2047: BhP_03.25.011/2 jijñāsayāhaṃ prakṛteḥ pūruṣasya namāmi sad-dharma-vidāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2049: BhP_03.25.012/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.25.012/1 iti sva-mātur niravadyam īpsitaṃ niśamya
GP10bhp_03u:2054: BhP_03.25.013/1 yoga ādhyātmikaḥ puṃsāṃ mato niḥśreyasāya me
GP10bhp_03u:2055: BhP_03.25.013/2 atyantoparatir yatra duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
GP10bhp_03u:2056: BhP_03.25.014/1 tam imaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yam avocaṃ purānaghe
GP10bhp_03u:2058: BhP_03.25.015/1 cetaḥ khalv asya bandhāya muktaye cātmano matam

GP10bhp_03u:2063: BhP_03.25.017/2 nirantaraṃ svayaṃ-jyotir aṇimānam akhaṇḍitam BhP_03.25.018/1 jñāna-vairāgya-yuktena bhakti-yuktena cātmanā
GP10bhp_03u:2064: BhP_03.25.018/2 paripaśyaty udāsīnaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca hataujasam BhP_03.25.019/1 na yujyamānayā bhaktyā bhagavaty akhilātmani BhP_03.25.019/2 sadṛśo 'sti śivaḥ panthā yogināṃ brahma-siddhaye
GP10bhp_03u:2065: BhP_03.25.020/1 prasaṅgam ajaraṃ pāśam ātmanaḥ kavayo viduḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2069: BhP_03.25.022/1 mayy ananyena bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām
GP10bhp_03u:2071: BhP_03.25.023/1 mad-āśrayāḥ kathā mṛṣṭāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca BhP_03.25.023/2 tapanti vividhās tāpā naitān mad-gata-cetasaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2072: BhP_03.25.024/1 ta ete sādhavaḥ sādhvi sarva-saṅga-vivarjitāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2073: BhP_03.25.024/2 saṅgas teṣv atha te prārthyaḥ saṅga-doṣa-harā hi te BhP_03.25.025/1 satāṃ prasaṅgān mama vīrya-saṃvido bhavanti
GP10bhp_03u:2075: BhP_03.25.025/2 taj-joṣaṇād āśv apavarga-vartmani śraddhā ratir bhaktir
GP10bhp_03u:2077: BhP_03.25.026/1 bhaktyā pumān jāta-virāga aindriyād dṛṣṭa-śrutān
GP10bhp_03u:2079: BhP_03.25.026/2 cittasya yatto grahaṇe yoga-yukto yatiṣyate ṛjubhir yoga-mārgaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2080: BhP_03.25.027/1 asevayāyaṃ prakṛter guṇānāṃ jñānena vairāgya-vijṛmbhitena
GP10bhp_03u:2081: BhP_03.25.027/2 yogena mayy arpitayā ca bhaktyā māṃ pratyag-ātmānam
GP10bhp_03u:2083: BhP_03.25.028/0 devahūtir uvāca BhP_03.25.028/1 kācit tvayy ucitā bhaktiḥ kīdṛśī mama gocarā
GP10bhp_03u:2084: BhP_03.25.028/2 yayā padaṃ te nirvāṇam añjasānvāśnavā aham
GP10bhp_03u:2085: BhP_03.25.029/1 yo yogo bhagavad-bāṇo nirvāṇātmaṃs tvayoditaḥ BhP_03.25.029/2 kīdṛśaḥ kati cāṅgāni yatas tattvāvabodhanam BhP_03.25.030/1 tad etan me vijānīhi yathāhaṃ manda-dhīr hare
GP10bhp_03u:2086: BhP_03.25.030/2 sukhaṃ buddhyeya durbodhaṃ yoṣā bhavad-anugrahāt
GP10bhp_03u:2087: BhP_03.25.031/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.25.031/1 viditvārthaṃ kapilo mātur itthaṃ jāta-sneho yatra tanvābhijātaḥ BhP_03.25.031/2 tattvāmnāyaṃ yat pravadanti sāṅkhyaṃ provāca vai
GP10bhp_03u:2091: BhP_03.25.032/2 sattva evaika-manaso vṛttiḥ svābhāvikī tu yā
GP10bhp_03u:2092: BhP_03.25.034/1 animittā bhāgavatī bhaktiḥ siddher garīyasī BhP_03.25.034/2 jarayaty āśu yā kośaṃ nigīrṇam analo yathā
GP10bhp_03u:2093: BhP_03.25.035/1 naikātmatāṃ me spṛhayanti kecin mat-pāda-sevābhiratā
GP10bhp_03u:2095: BhP_03.25.035/2 ye 'nyonyato bhāgavatāḥ prasajya sabhājayante mama pauruṣāṇi BhP_03.25.036/1 paśyanti te me rucirāṇy amba santaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2097: BhP_03.25.036/2 rūpāṇi divyāni vara-pradāni sākaṃ vācaṃ spṛhaṇīyāṃ vadanti
GP10bhp_03u:2100: BhP_03.25.037/2 hṛtātmano hṛta-prāṇāṃś ca bhaktir anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2102: BhP_03.25.038/1 atho vibhūtiṃ mama māyāvinas tām aiśvaryam aṣṭāṅgam anupravṛttam BhP_03.25.038/2 śriyaṃ bhāgavatīṃ vāspṛhayanti bhadrāṃ parasya me te
GP10bhp_03u:2103: 'śnuvate tu loke BhP_03.25.039/1 na karhicin mat-parāḥ śānta-rūpe naṅkṣyanti no me 'nimiṣo
GP10bhp_03u:2104: leḍhi hetiḥ BhP_03.25.039/2 yeṣām ahaṃ priya ātmā sutaś ca sakhā guruḥ suhṛdo daivam iṣṭam BhP_03.25.040/1 imaṃ lokaṃ tathaivāmum ātmānam ubhayāyinam BhP_03.25.040/2 ātmānam anu ye ceha ye rāyaḥ paśavo gṛhāḥ BhP_03.25.041/1 visṛjya sarvān anyāṃś ca mām evaṃ viśvato-mukham
GP10bhp_03u:2105: BhP_03.25.041/2 bhajanty ananyayā bhaktyā tān mṛtyor atipāraye

GP10bhp_03u:2114: BhP_03.26.001/1 atha te sampravakṣyāmi tattvānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak
GP10bhp_03u:2115: BhP_03.26.001/2 yad viditvā vimucyeta puruṣaḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2118: BhP_03.26.003/1 anādir ātmā puruṣo nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2119: BhP_03.26.003/2 pratyag-dhāmā svayaṃ-jyotir viśvaṃ yena samanvitam
GP10bhp_03u:2120: BhP_03.26.004/1 sa eṣa prakṛtiṃ sūkṣmāṃ daivīṃ guṇamayīṃ vibhuḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2123: BhP_03.26.006/1 evaṃ parābhidhyānena kartṛtvaṃ prakṛteḥ pumān BhP_03.26.006/2 karmasu kriyamāṇeṣu guṇair ātmani manyate BhP_03.26.007/1 tad asya saṃsṛtir bandhaḥ pāra-tantryaṃ ca tat-kṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:2124: BhP_03.26.007/2 bhavaty akartur īśasya sākṣiṇo nirvṛtātmanaḥ BhP_03.26.008/1 kārya-kāraṇa-kartṛtve kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiṃ viduḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2125: BhP_03.26.008/2 bhoktṛtve sukha-duḥkhānāṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param
GP10bhp_03u:2126: BhP_03.26.009/0 devahūtir uvāca BhP_03.26.009/1 prakṛteḥ puruṣasyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ puruṣottama
GP10bhp_03u:2127: BhP_03.26.009/2 brūhi kāraṇayor asya sad-asac ca yad-ātmakam

GP10bhp_03u:2130: BhP_03.26.010/2 pradhānaṃ prakṛtiṃ prāhur aviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavat BhP_03.26.011/1 pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir brahma caturbhir daśabhis tathā
GP10bhp_03u:2131: BhP_03.26.011/2 etac catur-viṃśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ prādhānikaṃ viduḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2132: BhP_03.26.012/1 mahā-bhūtāni pañcaiva bhūr āpo 'gnir marun nabhaḥ BhP_03.26.012/2 tan-mātrāṇi ca tāvanti gandhādīni matāni me BhP_03.26.013/1 indriyāṇi daśa śrotraṃ tvag dṛg rasana-nāsikāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2133: BhP_03.26.013/2 vāk karau caraṇau meḍhraṃ pāyur daśama ucyate

GP10bhp_03u:2137: BhP_03.26.015/2 sanniveśo mayā prokto yaḥ kālaḥ pañca-viṃśakaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2138: BhP_03.26.016/1 prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam

GP10bhp_03u:2141: BhP_03.26.018/1 antaḥ puruṣa-rūpeṇa kāla-rūpeṇa yo bahiḥ BhP_03.26.018/2 samanvety eṣa sattvānāṃ bhagavān ātma-māyayā
GP10bhp_03u:2142: BhP_03.26.019/1 daivāt kṣubhita-dharmiṇyāṃ svasyāṃ yonau paraḥ pumān
GP10bhp_03u:2143: BhP_03.26.019/2 ādhatta vīryaṃ sāsūta mahat-tattvaṃ hiraṇmayam

GP10bhp_03u:2146: BhP_03.26.021/1 yat tat sattva-guṇaṃ svacchaṃ śāntaṃ bhagavataḥ padam

GP10bhp_03u:2148: BhP_03.26.022/1 svacchatvam avikāritvaṃ śāntatvam iti cetasaḥ BhP_03.26.022/2 vṛttibhir lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yathāpāṃ prakṛtiḥ parā
GP10bhp_03u:2151: BhP_03.26.024/1 vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś ca yato bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2152: BhP_03.26.024/2 manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām api
GP10bhp_03u:2153: BhP_03.26.025/1 sahasra-śirasaṃ sākṣād yam anantaṃ pracakṣate
GP10bhp_03u:2155: BhP_03.26.026/1 kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca kāryatvaṃ ceti lakṣaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:2156: BhP_03.26.026/2 śānta-ghora-vimūḍhatvam iti vā syād ahaṅkṛteḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2161: BhP_03.26.029/1 taijasāt tu vikurvāṇād buddhi-tattvam abhūt sati BhP_03.26.029/2 dravya-sphuraṇa-vijñānam indriyāṇām anugrahaḥ BhP_03.26.030/1 saṃśayo 'tha viparyāso niścayaḥ smṛtir eva ca BhP_03.26.030/2 svāpa ity ucyate buddher lakṣaṇaṃ vṛttitaḥ pṛthak
GP10bhp_03u:2163: BhP_03.26.031/2 prāṇasya hi kriyā-śaktir buddher vijñāna-śaktitā
GP10bhp_03u:2165: BhP_03.26.032/2 śabda-mātram abhūt tasmān nabhaḥ śrotraṃ tu śabdagam

GP10bhp_03u:2167: BhP_03.26.033/2 tan-mātratvaṃ ca nabhaso lakṣaṇaṃ kavayo viduḥ BhP_03.26.034/1 bhūtānāṃ chidra-dātṛtvaṃ bahir antaram eva ca
GP10bhp_03u:2170: BhP_03.26.035/2 sparśo 'bhavat tato vāyus tvak sparśasya ca saṅgrahaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2171: BhP_03.26.036/1 mṛdutvaṃ kaṭhinatvaṃ ca śaityam uṣṇatvam eva ca
GP10bhp_03u:2172: BhP_03.26.036/2 etat sparśasya sparśatvaṃ tan-mātratvaṃ nabhasvataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2173: BhP_03.26.037/1 cālanaṃ vyūhanaṃ prāptir netṛtvaṃ dravya-śabdayoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2175: BhP_03.26.038/1 vāyoś ca sparśa-tanmātrād rūpaṃ daiveritād abhūt
GP10bhp_03u:2176: BhP_03.26.038/2 samutthitaṃ tatas tejaś cakṣū rūpopalambhanam BhP_03.26.039/1 dravyākṛtitvaṃ guṇatā vyakti-saṃsthātvam eva ca BhP_03.26.039/2 tejastvaṃ tejasaḥ sādhvi rūpa-mātrasya vṛttayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2177: BhP_03.26.040/1 dyotanaṃ pacanaṃ pānam adanaṃ hima-mardanam
GP10bhp_03u:2178: BhP_03.26.040/2 tejaso vṛttayas tv etāḥ śoṣaṇaṃ kṣut tṛḍ eva ca
GP10bhp_03u:2180: BhP_03.26.041/2 rasa-mātram abhūt tasmād ambho jihvā rasa-grahaḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2182: BhP_03.26.042/2 bhautikānāṃ vikāreṇa rasa eko vibhidyate BhP_03.26.043/1 kledanaṃ piṇḍanaṃ tṛptiḥ prāṇanāpyāyanondanam
GP10bhp_03u:2183: BhP_03.26.043/2 tāpāpanodo bhūyastvam ambhaso vṛttayas tv imāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2185: BhP_03.26.044/2 gandha-mātram abhūt tasmāt pṛthvī ghrāṇas tu gandhagaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2186: BhP_03.26.045/1 karambha-pūti-saurabhya- śāntogrāmlādibhiḥ pṛthak BhP_03.26.045/2 dravyāvayava-vaiṣamyād gandha eko vibhidyate
GP10bhp_03u:2187: BhP_03.26.046/1 bhāvanaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ dhāraṇaṃ sad-viśeṣaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:2189: BhP_03.26.047/1 nabho-guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tac chrotram ucyate
GP10bhp_03u:2190: BhP_03.26.047/2 vāyor guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tat sparśanaṃ viduḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2191: BhP_03.26.048/1 tejo-guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tac cakṣur ucyate

GP10bhp_03u:2193: BhP_03.26.048/3 bhūmer guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya sa ghrāṇa ucyate
GP10bhp_03u:2194: BhP_03.26.049/1 parasya dṛśyate dharmo hy aparasmin samanvayāt
GP10bhp_03u:2195: BhP_03.26.049/2 ato viśeṣo bhāvānāṃ bhūmāv evopalakṣyate BhP_03.26.050/1 etāny asaṃhatya yadā mahad-ādīni sapta vai BhP_03.26.050/2 kāla-karma-guṇopeto jagad-ādir upāviśat
GP10bhp_03u:2197: BhP_03.26.051/2 utthitaṃ puruṣo yasmād udatiṣṭhad asau virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2198: BhP_03.26.052/1 etad aṇḍaṃ viśeṣākhyaṃ krama-vṛddhair daśottaraiḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2202: BhP_03.26.053/2 tam āviśya mahā-devo bahudhā nirbibheda kham
GP10bhp_03u:2203: BhP_03.26.054/1 nirabhidyatāsya prathamaṃ mukhaṃ vāṇī tato 'bhavat
GP10bhp_03u:2204: BhP_03.26.054/2 vāṇyā vahnir atho nāse prāṇoto ghrāṇa etayoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2205: BhP_03.26.055/1 ghrāṇād vāyur abhidyetām akṣiṇī cakṣur etayoḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2207: BhP_03.26.056/1 nirbibheda virājas tvag- roma-śmaśrv-ādayas tataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2208: BhP_03.26.056/2 tata oṣadhayaś cāsan śiśnaṃ nirbibhide tataḥ

GP10bhp_03u:2210: BhP_03.26.057/2 gudād apāno 'pānāc ca mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2211: BhP_03.26.058/1 hastau ca nirabhidyetāṃ balaṃ tābhyāṃ tataḥ svarāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2212: BhP_03.26.058/2 pādau ca nirabhidyetāṃ gatis tābhyāṃ tato hariḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2213: BhP_03.26.059/1 nāḍyo 'sya nirabhidyanta tābhyo lohitam ābhṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:2214: BhP_03.26.059/2 nadyas tataḥ samabhavann udaraṃ nirabhidyata BhP_03.26.060/1 kṣut-pipāse tataḥ syātāṃ samudras tv etayor abhūt
GP10bhp_03u:2215: BhP_03.26.060/2 athāsya hṛdayaṃ bhinnaṃ hṛdayān mana utthitam
GP10bhp_03u:2216: BhP_03.26.061/1 manasaś candramā jāto buddhir buddher girāṃ patiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2217: BhP_03.26.061/2 ahaṅkāras tato rudraś cittaṃ caityas tato 'bhavat
GP10bhp_03u:2218: BhP_03.26.062/1 ete hy abhyutthitā devā naivāsyotthāpane 'śakan
GP10bhp_03u:2219: BhP_03.26.062/2 punar āviviśuḥ khāni tam utthāpayituṃ kramāt
GP10bhp_03u:2220: BhP_03.26.063/1 vahnir vācā mukhaṃ bheje nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2221: BhP_03.26.063/2 ghrāṇena nāsike vāyur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2222: BhP_03.26.064/1 akṣiṇī cakṣuṣādityo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ BhP_03.26.064/2 śrotreṇa karṇau ca diśo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2223: BhP_03.26.065/1 tvacaṃ romabhir oṣadhyo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2224: BhP_03.26.065/2 retasā śiśnam āpas tu nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ

GP10bhp_03u:2226: BhP_03.26.066/2 hastāv indro balenaiva nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2227: BhP_03.26.067/1 viṣṇur gatyaiva caraṇau nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2228: BhP_03.26.067/2 nāḍīr nadyo lohitena nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2229: BhP_03.26.068/1 kṣut-tṛḍbhyām udaraṃ sindhur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ BhP_03.26.068/2 hṛdayaṃ manasā candro nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2230: BhP_03.26.069/1 buddhyā brahmāpi hṛdayaṃ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2231: BhP_03.26.069/2 rudro 'bhimatyā hṛdayaṃ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2232: BhP_03.26.070/1 cittena hṛdayaṃ caityaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ prāviśad yadā BhP_03.26.070/2 virāṭ tadaiva puruṣaḥ salilād udatiṣṭhata BhP_03.26.071/1 yathā prasuptaṃ puruṣaṃ prāṇendriya-mano-dhiyaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2233: BhP_03.26.071/2 prabhavanti vinā yena notthāpayitum ojasā BhP_03.26.072/1 tam asmin pratyag-ātmānaṃ dhiyā yoga-pravṛttayā
GP10bhp_03u:2234: BhP_03.26.072/2 bhaktyā viraktyā jñānena vivicyātmani cintayet BhP_03.27.001/0 śrī-bhagavān
GP10bhp_03u:2235: BhP_03.27.001/1 prakṛti-stho 'pi puruṣo nājyate prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2237: BhP_03.27.002/1 sa eṣa yarhi prakṛter guṇeṣv abhiviṣajjate
GP10bhp_03u:2238: BhP_03.27.002/2 ahaṅkriyā-vimūḍhātmā kartāsmīty abhimanyate BhP_03.27.003/1 tena saṃsāra-padavīm avaśo 'bhyety anirvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2240: BhP_03.27.004/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
GP10bhp_03u:2241: BhP_03.27.004/2 dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā
GP10bhp_03u:2242: BhP_03.27.005/1 ata eva śanaiś cittaṃ prasaktam asatāṃ pathi
GP10bhp_03u:2243: BhP_03.27.005/2 bhakti-yogena tīvreṇa viraktyā ca nayed vaśam BhP_03.27.006/1 yamādibhir yoga-pathair abhyasañ śraddhayānvitaḥ BhP_03.27.006/2 mayi bhāvena satyena mat-kathā-śravaṇena ca
GP10bhp_03u:2247: BhP_03.27.008/2 vivikta-śaraṇaḥ śānto maitraḥ karuṇa ātmavān
GP10bhp_03u:2248: BhP_03.27.009/1 sānubandhe ca dehe 'sminn akurvann asad-āgraham
GP10bhp_03u:2249: BhP_03.27.009/2 jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
GP10bhp_03u:2252: BhP_03.27.011/1 mukta-liṅgaṃ sad-ābhāsam asati pratipadyate BhP_03.27.011/2 sato bandhum asac-cakṣuḥ sarvānusyūtam advayam BhP_03.27.012/1 yathā jala-stha ābhāsaḥ sthala-sthenāvadṛśyate
GP10bhp_03u:2253: BhP_03.27.012/2 svābhāsena tathā sūryo jala-sthena divi sthitaḥ BhP_03.27.013/1 evaṃ trivṛd-ahaṅkāro
GP10bhp_03u:2255: BhP_03.27.014/1 bhūta-sūkṣmendriya-mano- buddhy-ādiṣv iha nidrayā BhP_03.27.014/2 līneṣv asati yas tatra vinidro nirahaṅkriyaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2256: BhP_03.27.015/1 manyamānas tadātmānam anaṣṭo naṣṭavan mṛṣā BhP_03.27.015/2 naṣṭe 'haṅkaraṇe draṣṭā naṣṭa-vitta ivāturaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2259: BhP_03.27.017/0 devahūtir uvāca BhP_03.27.017/1 puruṣaṃ prakṛtir brahman na vimuñcati karhicit
GP10bhp_03u:2260: BhP_03.27.017/2 anyonyāpāśrayatvāc ca nityatvād anayoḥ prabho BhP_03.27.018/1 yathā gandhasya bhūmeś ca na bhāvo vyatirekataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2261: BhP_03.27.018/2 apāṃ rasasya ca yathā tathā buddheḥ parasya ca BhP_03.27.019/1 akartuḥ karma-bandho 'yaṃ puruṣasya yad-āśrayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2262: BhP_03.27.019/2 guṇeṣu satsu prakṛteḥ kaivalyaṃ teṣv ataḥ katham
GP10bhp_03u:2263: BhP_03.27.020/1 kvacit tattvāvamarśena nivṛttaṃ bhayam ulbaṇam BhP_03.27.020/2 anivṛtta-nimittatvāt punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate BhP_03.27.021/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
GP10bhp_03u:2265: BhP_03.27.021/2 tīvrayā mayi bhaktyā ca śruta-sambhṛtayā ciram
GP10bhp_03u:2266: BhP_03.27.022/1 jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā BhP_03.27.022/2 tapo-yuktena yogena tīvreṇātma-samādhinā
GP10bhp_03u:2267: BhP_03.27.023/1 prakṛtiḥ puruṣasyeha dahyamānā tv ahar-niśam
GP10bhp_03u:2268: BhP_03.27.023/2 tiro-bhavitrī śanakair agner yonir ivāraṇiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2269: BhP_03.27.024/1 bhukta-bhogā parityaktā dṛṣṭa-doṣā ca nityaśaḥ BhP_03.27.024/2 neśvarasyāśubhaṃ dhatte sve mahimni sthitasya ca
GP10bhp_03u:2270: BhP_03.27.025/1 yathā hy apratibuddhasya prasvāpo bahv-anartha-bhṛt
GP10bhp_03u:2271: BhP_03.27.025/2 sa eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate
GP10bhp_03u:2272: BhP_03.27.026/1 evaṃ vidita-tattvasya prakṛtir mayi mānasam
GP10bhp_03u:2279: BhP_03.27.029/2 yad gatvā na nivarteta yogī liṅgād vinirgame
GP10bhp_03u:2280: BhP_03.27.030/1 yadā na yogopacitāsu ceto māyāsu siddhasya viṣajjate 'ṅga
GP10bhp_03u:2281: BhP_03.27.030/2 ananya-hetuṣv atha me gatiḥ syād ātyantikī yatra na
GP10bhp_03u:2284: BhP_03.28.001/1 yogasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye sabījasya nṛpātmaje BhP_03.28.001/2 mano yenaiva vidhinā prasannaṃ yāti sat-patham
GP10bhp_03u:2285: BhP_03.28.002/1 sva-dharmācaraṇaṃ śaktyā vidharmāc ca nivartanam
GP10bhp_03u:2290: BhP_03.28.004/2 brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ svādhyāyaḥ puruṣārcanam BhP_03.28.005/1 maunaṃ sad-āsana-jayaḥ sthairyaṃ prāṇa-jayaḥ śanaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2291: BhP_03.28.005/2 pratyāhāraś cendriyāṇāṃ viṣayān manasā hṛdi BhP_03.28.006/1 sva-dhiṣṇyānām eka-deśe manasā prāṇa-dhāraṇam
GP10bhp_03u:2292: BhP_03.28.006/2 vaikuṇṭha-līlābhidhyānaṃ samādhānaṃ tathātmanaḥ BhP_03.28.007/1 etair anyaiś ca pathibhir mano duṣṭam asat-patham
GP10bhp_03u:2293: BhP_03.28.007/2 buddhyā yuñjīta śanakair jita-prāṇo hy atandritaḥ BhP_03.28.008/1 śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya vijitāsana āsanam BhP_03.28.008/2 tasmin svasti samāsīna ṛju-kāyaḥ samabhyaset
GP10bhp_03u:2295: BhP_03.28.009/2 pratikūlena vā cittaṃ yathā sthiram acañcalam
GP10bhp_03u:2296: BhP_03.28.010/1 mano 'cirāt syād virajaṃ jita-śvāsasya yoginaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2297: BhP_03.28.010/2 vāyv-agnibhyāṃ yathā lohaṃ dhmātaṃ tyajati vai malam
GP10bhp_03u:2298: BhP_03.28.011/1 prāṇāyāmair dahed doṣān dhāraṇābhiś ca kilbiṣān
GP10bhp_03u:2300: BhP_03.28.012/1 yadā manaḥ svaṃ virajaṃ yogena susamāhitam
GP10bhp_03u:2313: BhP_03.28.018/2 dhyāyed devaṃ samagrāṅgaṃ yāvan na cyavate manaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2314: BhP_03.28.019/1 sthitaṃ vrajantam āsīnaṃ śayānaṃ vā guhāśayam
GP10bhp_03u:2317: BhP_03.28.020/2 vilakṣyaikatra saṃyujyād aṅge bhagavato muniḥ BhP_03.28.021/1 sañcintayed bhagavataś caraṇāravindaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2322: BhP_03.28.022/2 tīrthena mūrdhny adhikṛtena śivaḥ śivo 'bhūt
GP10bhp_03u:2328: BhP_03.28.023/4 saṃlālitaṃ hṛdi vibhor abhavasya kuryāt BhP_03.28.024/1 ūrū suparṇa-bhujayor adhi śobhamānāv BhP_03.28.024/2 ojo-nidhī atasikā-kusumāvabhāsau
GP10bhp_03u:2346: BhP_03.28.028/4 caityasya tattvam amalaṃ maṇim asya kaṇṭhe
GP10bhp_03u:2351: BhP_03.28.030/1 yac chrī-niketam alibhiḥ parisevyamānaṃ BhP_03.28.030/2 bhūtyā svayā kuṭila-kuntala-vṛnda-juṣṭam
GP10bhp_03u:2355: BhP_03.28.031/2 tāpa-trayopaśamanāya nisṛṣṭam akṣṇoḥ BhP_03.28.031/3 snigdha-smitānuguṇitaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2366: BhP_03.28.034/2 bhaktyā dravad-dhṛdaya utpulakaḥ pramodāt BhP_03.28.034/3 autkaṇṭhya-bāṣpa-kalayā muhur ardyamānas BhP_03.28.034/4 tac cāpi citta-baḍiśaṃ śanakair viyuṅkte BhP_03.28.035/1 muktāśrayaṃ yarhi nirviṣayaṃ viraktaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2367: BhP_03.28.035/2 nirvāṇam ṛcchati manaḥ sahasā yathārciḥ BhP_03.28.035/3 ātmānam atra puruṣo 'vyavadhānam ekam
GP10bhp_03u:2369: BhP_03.28.036/1 so 'py etayā caramayā manaso nivṛttyā
GP10bhp_03u:2371: BhP_03.28.036/3 hetutvam apy asati kartari duḥkhayor yat
GP10bhp_03u:2373: BhP_03.28.037/1 dehaṃ ca taṃ na caramaḥ sthitam utthitaṃ vā BhP_03.28.037/2 siddho vipaśyati yato 'dhyagamat svarūpam
GP10bhp_03u:2374: BhP_03.28.037/3 daivād upetam atha daiva-vaśād apetaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2376: BhP_03.28.038/1 deho 'pi daiva-vaśagaḥ khalu karma yāvat
GP10bhp_03u:2379: BhP_03.28.038/4 svāpnaṃ punar na bhajate pratibuddha-vastuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2380: BhP_03.28.039/1 yathā putrāc ca vittāc ca pṛthaṅ martyaḥ pratīyate BhP_03.28.039/2 apy ātmatvenābhimatād dehādeḥ puruṣas tathā BhP_03.28.040/1 yatholmukād visphuliṅgād dhūmād vāpi sva-sambhavāt
GP10bhp_03u:2381: BhP_03.28.040/2 apy ātmatvenābhimatād yathāgniḥ pṛthag ulmukāt BhP_03.28.041/1 bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇāt pradhānāj jīva-saṃjñitāt
GP10bhp_03u:2382: BhP_03.28.041/2 ātmā tathā pṛthag draṣṭā bhagavān brahma-saṃjñitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2385: BhP_03.28.043/1 sva-yoniṣu yathā jyotir ekaṃ nānā pratīyate BhP_03.28.043/2 yonīnāṃ guṇa-vaiṣamyāt tathātmā prakṛtau sthitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2386: BhP_03.28.044/1 tasmād imāṃ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ daivīṃ sad-asad-ātmikām
GP10bhp_03u:2388: BhP_03.29.001/0 devahūtir uvāca BhP_03.29.001/1 lakṣaṇaṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ prakṛteḥ puruṣasya
GP10bhp_03u:2390: BhP_03.29.002/1 yathā sāṅkhyeṣu kathitaṃ yan-mūlaṃ tat pracakṣate BhP_03.29.002/2 bhakti-yogasya me mārgaṃ brūhi vistaraśaḥ prabho BhP_03.29.003/1 virāgo yena puruṣo bhagavan sarvato bhavet
GP10bhp_03u:2391: BhP_03.29.003/2 ācakṣva jīva-lokasya vividhā mama saṃsṛtīḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2392: BhP_03.29.004/1 kālasyeśvara-rūpasya pareṣāṃ ca parasya te
GP10bhp_03u:2393: BhP_03.29.004/2 svarūpaṃ bata kurvanti yad-dhetoḥ kuśalaṃ janāḥ BhP_03.29.005/1 lokasya mithyābhimater acakṣuṣaś ciraṃ prasuptasya tamasy
GP10bhp_03u:2395: BhP_03.29.005/2 śrāntasya karmasv anuviddhayā dhiyā tvam āvirāsīḥ kila
GP10bhp_03u:2397: BhP_03.29.006/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.29.006/1 iti mātur vacaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ pratinandya mahā-muniḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2398: BhP_03.29.006/2 ābabhāṣe kuru-śreṣṭha prītas tāṃ karuṇārditaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2400: BhP_03.29.007/1 bhakti-yogo bahu-vidho mārgair bhāmini bhāvyate
GP10bhp_03u:2402: BhP_03.29.008/1 abhisandhāya yo hiṃsāṃ dambhaṃ mātsaryam eva vā
GP10bhp_03u:2403: BhP_03.29.008/2 saṃrambhī bhinna-dṛg bhāvaṃ mayi kuryāt sa tāmasaḥ BhP_03.29.009/1 viṣayān abhisandhāya yaśa aiśvaryam eva vā
GP10bhp_03u:2404: BhP_03.29.009/2 arcādāv arcayed yo māṃ pṛthag-bhāvaḥ sa rājasaḥ BhP_03.29.010/1 karma-nirhāram uddiśya parasmin vā tad-arpaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:2405: BhP_03.29.010/2 yajed yaṣṭavyam iti vā pṛthag-bhāvaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ BhP_03.29.011/1 mad-guṇa-śruti-mātreṇa mayi sarva-guhāśaye
GP10bhp_03u:2407: BhP_03.29.012/1 lakṣaṇaṃ bhakti-yogasya nirguṇasya hy udāhṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:2408: BhP_03.29.012/2 ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame BhP_03.29.013/1 sālokya-sārṣṭi-sāmīpya- sārūpyaikatvam apy uta
GP10bhp_03u:2409: BhP_03.29.013/2 dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2410: BhP_03.29.014/1 sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ BhP_03.29.014/2 yenātivrajya tri-guṇaṃ mad-bhāvāyopapadyate
GP10bhp_03u:2414: BhP_03.29.016/2 bhūteṣu mad-bhāvanayā sattvenāsaṅgamena ca BhP_03.29.017/1 mahatāṃ bahu-mānena dīnānām anukampayā BhP_03.29.017/2 maitryā caivātma-tulyeṣu yamena niyamena ca
GP10bhp_03u:2415: BhP_03.29.018/1 ādhyātmikānuśravaṇān nāma-saṅkīrtanāc ca me BhP_03.29.018/2 ārjavenārya-saṅgena nirahaṅkriyayā tathā BhP_03.29.019/1 mad-dharmaṇo guṇair etaiḥ parisaṃśuddha āśayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2416: BhP_03.29.019/2 puruṣasyāñjasābhyeti śruta-mātra-guṇaṃ hi mām BhP_03.29.020/1 yathā vāta-ratho ghrāṇam āvṛṅkte gandha āśayāt
GP10bhp_03u:2417: BhP_03.29.020/2 evaṃ yoga-rataṃ ceta ātmānam avikāri yat
GP10bhp_03u:2418: BhP_03.29.021/1 ahaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhūtātmāvasthitaḥ sadā BhP_03.29.021/2 tam avajñāya māṃ martyaḥ kurute 'rcā-viḍambanam
GP10bhp_03u:2419: BhP_03.29.022/1 yo māṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu santam ātmānam īśvaram
GP10bhp_03u:2420: BhP_03.29.022/2 hitvārcāṃ bhajate mauḍhyād bhasmany eva juhoti saḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2421: BhP_03.29.023/1 dviṣataḥ para-kāye māṃ mānino bhinna-darśinaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2422: BhP_03.29.023/2 bhūteṣu baddha-vairasya na manaḥ śāntim ṛcchati
GP10bhp_03u:2425: BhP_03.29.025/1 arcādāv arcayet tāvad īśvaraṃ māṃ sva-karma-kṛt
GP10bhp_03u:2426: BhP_03.29.025/2 yāvan na veda sva-hṛdi sarva-bhūteṣv avasthitam
GP10bhp_03u:2427: BhP_03.29.026/1 ātmanaś ca parasyāpi yaḥ karoty antarodaram
GP10bhp_03u:2428: BhP_03.29.026/2 tasya bhinna-dṛśo mṛtyur vidadhe bhayam ulbaṇam
GP10bhp_03u:2429: BhP_03.29.027/1 atha māṃ sarva-bhūteṣu bhūtātmānaṃ kṛtālayam BhP_03.29.027/2 arhayed dāna-mānābhyāṃ maitryābhinnena cakṣuṣā BhP_03.29.028/1 jīvāḥ śreṣṭhā hy ajīvānāṃ tataḥ prāṇa-bhṛtaḥ śubhe
GP10bhp_03u:2430: BhP_03.29.028/2 tataḥ sa-cittāḥ pravarās tataś cendriya-vṛttayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2432: BhP_03.29.029/2 tebhyo gandha-vidaḥ śreṣṭhās tataḥ śabda-vido varāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2434: BhP_03.29.030/2 teṣāṃ bahu-padāḥ śreṣṭhāś catuṣ-pādas tato dvi-pāt
GP10bhp_03u:2435: BhP_03.29.031/1 tato varṇāś ca catvāras teṣāṃ brāhmaṇa uttamaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2436: BhP_03.29.031/2 brāhmaṇeṣv api veda-jño hy artha-jño 'bhyadhikas tataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2437: BhP_03.29.032/1 artha-jñāt saṃśaya-cchettā tataḥ śreyān sva-karma-kṛt
GP10bhp_03u:2438: BhP_03.29.032/2 mukta-saṅgas tato bhūyān adogdhā dharmam ātmanaḥ BhP_03.29.033/1 tasmān mayy arpitāśeṣa- kriyārthātmā nirantaraḥ BhP_03.29.033/2 mayy arpitātmanaḥ puṃso mayi sannyasta-karmaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2439: BhP_03.29.033/3 na paśyāmi paraṃ bhūtam akartuḥ sama-darśanāt
GP10bhp_03u:2441: BhP_03.29.034/2 īśvaro jīva-kalayā praviṣṭo bhagavān iti
GP10bhp_03u:2442: BhP_03.29.035/1 bhakti-yogaś ca yogaś ca mayā mānavy udīritaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2443: BhP_03.29.035/2 yayor ekatareṇaiva puruṣaḥ puruṣaṃ vrajet BhP_03.29.036/1 etad bhagavato rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ BhP_03.29.036/2 paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ daivaṃ karma-viceṣṭitam
GP10bhp_03u:2444: BhP_03.29.037/1 rūpa-bhedāspadaṃ divyaṃ kāla ity abhidhīyate
GP10bhp_03u:2445: BhP_03.29.037/2 bhūtānāṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ yato bhinna-dṛśāṃ bhayam
GP10bhp_03u:2446: BhP_03.29.038/1 yo 'ntaḥ praviśya bhūtāni bhūtair atty akhilāśrayaḥ BhP_03.29.038/2 sa viṣṇv-ākhyo 'dhiyajño 'sau kālaḥ kalayatāṃ prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2447: BhP_03.29.039/1 na cāsya kaścid dayito na dveṣyo na ca bāndhavaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2448: BhP_03.29.039/2 āviśaty apramatto 'sau pramattaṃ janam anta-kṛt
GP10bhp_03u:2449: BhP_03.29.040/1 yad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati yad-bhayāt
GP10bhp_03u:2450: BhP_03.29.040/2 yad-bhayād varṣate devo bha-gaṇo bhāti yad-bhayāt
GP10bhp_03u:2451: BhP_03.29.041/1 yad vanaspatayo bhītā latāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GP10bhp_03u:2452: BhP_03.29.041/2 sve sve kāle 'bhigṛhṇanti puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GP10bhp_03u:2453: BhP_03.29.042/1 sravanti sarito bhītā notsarpaty udadhir yataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2454: BhP_03.29.042/2 agnir indhe sa-giribhir bhūr na majjati yad-bhayāt
GP10bhp_03u:2455: BhP_03.29.043/1 nabho dadāti śvasatāṃ padaṃ yan-niyamād adaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2456: BhP_03.29.043/2 lokaṃ sva-dehaṃ tanute mahān saptabhir āvṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:2457: BhP_03.29.044/1 guṇābhimānino devāḥ sargādiṣv asya yad-bhayāt
GP10bhp_03u:2458: BhP_03.29.044/2 vartante 'nuyugaṃ yeṣāṃ vaśa etac carācaram
GP10bhp_03u:2460: BhP_03.29.045/2 janaṃ janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunāntakam BhP_03.30.001/0 kapila uvāca BhP_03.30.001/1 tasyaitasya jano nūnaṃ nāyaṃ vedoru-vikramam
GP10bhp_03u:2461: BhP_03.30.001/2 kālyamāno 'pi balino vāyor iva ghanāvaliḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2462: BhP_03.30.002/1 yaṃ yam artham upādatte duḥkhena sukha-hetave
GP10bhp_03u:2463: BhP_03.30.002/2 taṃ taṃ dhunoti bhagavān pumān chocati yat-kṛte
GP10bhp_03u:2464: BhP_03.30.003/1 yad adhruvasya dehasya sānubandhasya durmatiḥ BhP_03.30.003/2 dhruvāṇi manyate mohād gṛha-kṣetra-vasūni ca
GP10bhp_03u:2465: BhP_03.30.004/1 jantur vai bhava etasmin yāṃ yāṃ yonim anuvrajet BhP_03.30.004/2 tasyāṃ tasyāṃ sa labhate nirvṛtiṃ na virajyate
GP10bhp_03u:2466: BhP_03.30.005/1 naraka-stho 'pi dehaṃ vai na pumāṃs tyaktum icchati
GP10bhp_03u:2470: BhP_03.30.007/1 sandahyamāna-sarvāṅga eṣām udvahanādhinā BhP_03.30.007/2 karoty avirataṃ mūḍho duritāni durāśayaḥ BhP_03.30.008/1 ākṣiptātmendriyaḥ strīṇām asatīnāṃ ca māyayā BhP_03.30.008/2 raho racitayālāpaiḥ śiśūnāṃ kala-bhāṣiṇām
GP10bhp_03u:2472: BhP_03.30.009/2 kurvan duḥkha-pratīkāraṃ sukhavan manyate gṛhī
GP10bhp_03u:2473: BhP_03.30.010/1 arthair āpāditair gurvyā hiṃsayetas-tataś ca tān BhP_03.30.010/2 puṣṇāti yeṣāṃ poṣeṇa śeṣa-bhug yāty adhaḥ svayam
GP10bhp_03u:2474: BhP_03.30.011/1 vārtāyāṃ lupyamānāyām ārabdhāyāṃ punaḥ punaḥ BhP_03.30.011/2 lobhābhibhūto niḥsattvaḥ parārthe kurute spṛhām BhP_03.30.012/1 kuṭumba-bharaṇākalpo manda-bhāgyo vṛthodyamaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2475: BhP_03.30.012/2 śriyā vihīnaḥ kṛpaṇo dhyāyan chvasiti mūḍha-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2477: BhP_03.30.013/2 nādriyante yathā pūrvaṃ kīnāśā iva go-jaram
GP10bhp_03u:2478: BhP_03.30.014/1 tatrāpy ajāta-nirvedo bhriyamāṇaḥ svayam bhṛtaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2479: BhP_03.30.014/2 jarayopātta-vairūpyo maraṇābhimukho gṛhe BhP_03.30.015/1 āste 'vamatyopanyastaṃ gṛha-pāla ivāharan
GP10bhp_03u:2484: BhP_03.30.017/2 vācyamāno 'pi na brūte kāla-pāśa-vaśaṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2487: BhP_03.30.019/1 yama-dūtau tadā prāptau bhīmau sarabhasekṣaṇau
GP10bhp_03u:2488: BhP_03.30.019/2 sa dṛṣṭvā trasta-hṛdayaḥ śakṛn-mūtraṃ vimuñcati
GP10bhp_03u:2489: BhP_03.30.020/1 yātanā-deha āvṛtya pāśair baddhvā gale balāt BhP_03.30.020/2 nayato dīrgham adhvānaṃ daṇḍyaṃ rāja-bhaṭā yathā
GP10bhp_03u:2491: BhP_03.30.021/2 pathi śvabhir bhakṣyamāṇa ārto 'ghaṃ svam anusmaran BhP_03.30.022/1 kṣut-tṛṭ-parīto 'rka-davānalānilaiḥ santapyamānaḥ pathi tapta-vāluke
GP10bhp_03u:2492: BhP_03.30.022/2 kṛcchreṇa pṛṣṭhe kaśayā ca tāḍitaś calaty aśakto 'pi
GP10bhp_03u:2494: BhP_03.30.023/1 tatra tatra patan chrānto mūrcchitaḥ punar utthitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2495: BhP_03.30.023/2 pathā pāpīyasā nītas tarasā yama-sādanam
GP10bhp_03u:2496: BhP_03.30.024/1 yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi navatiṃ nava cādhvanaḥ BhP_03.30.024/2 tribhir muhūrtair dvābhyāṃ vā nītaḥ prāpnoti yātanāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2498: BhP_03.30.025/2 ātma-māṃsādanaṃ kvāpi sva-kṛttaṃ parato 'pi vā
GP10bhp_03u:2503: BhP_03.30.028/1 yās tāmisrāndha-tāmisrā rauravādyāś ca yātanāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2504: BhP_03.30.028/2 bhuṅkte naro vā nārī vā mithaḥ saṅgena nirmitāḥ BhP_03.30.029/1 atraiva narakaḥ svarga iti mātaḥ pracakṣate
GP10bhp_03u:2505: BhP_03.30.029/2 yā yātanā vai nārakyas tā ihāpy upalakṣitāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2506: BhP_03.30.030/1 evaṃ kuṭumbaṃ bibhrāṇa udaram bhara eva vā
GP10bhp_03u:2507: BhP_03.30.030/2 visṛjyehobhayaṃ pretya bhuṅkte tat-phalam īdṛśam
GP10bhp_03u:2508: BhP_03.30.031/1 ekaḥ prapadyate dhvāntaṃ hitvedaṃ sva-kalevaram
GP10bhp_03u:2509: BhP_03.30.031/2 kuśaletara-pātheyo bhūta-droheṇa yad bhṛtam BhP_03.30.032/1 daivenāsāditaṃ tasya śamalaṃ niraye pumān BhP_03.30.032/2 bhuṅkte kuṭumba-poṣasya hṛta-vitta ivāturaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2511: BhP_03.30.033/2 yāti jīvo 'ndha-tāmisraṃ caramaṃ tamasaḥ padam
GP10bhp_03u:2512: BhP_03.30.034/1 adhastān nara-lokasya yāvatīr yātanādayaḥ BhP_03.30.034/2 kramaśaḥ samanukramya punar atrāvrajec chuciḥ BhP_03.30.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
GP10bhp_03u:2513: BhP_03.31.001/1 karmaṇā daiva-netreṇa jantur dehopapattaye BhP_03.31.001/2 striyāḥ praviṣṭa udaraṃ puṃso retaḥ-kaṇāśrayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2514: BhP_03.31.002/1 kalalaṃ tv eka-rātreṇa pañca-rātreṇa budbudam
GP10bhp_03u:2515: BhP_03.31.002/2 daśāhena tu karkandhūḥ peśy aṇḍaṃ vā tataḥ param BhP_03.31.003/1 māsena tu śiro dvābhyāṃ bāhv-aṅghry-ādy-aṅga-vigrahaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2517: BhP_03.31.004/1 caturbhir dhātavaḥ sapta pañcabhiḥ kṣut-tṛḍ-udbhavaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2518: BhP_03.31.004/2 ṣaḍbhir jarāyuṇā vītaḥ kukṣau bhrāmyati dakṣiṇe
GP10bhp_03u:2520: BhP_03.31.005/2 śete viṇ-mūtrayor garte sa jantur jantu-sambhave
GP10bhp_03u:2521: BhP_03.31.006/1 kṛmibhiḥ kṣata-sarvāṅgaḥ saukumāryāt pratikṣaṇam BhP_03.31.006/2 mūrcchām āpnoty uru-kleśas tatratyaiḥ kṣudhitair muhuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2522: BhP_03.31.007/1 kaṭu-tīkṣṇoṣṇa-lavaṇa- rūkṣāmlādibhir ulbaṇaiḥ BhP_03.31.007/2 mātṛ-bhuktair upaspṛṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgotthita-vedanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2523: BhP_03.31.008/1 ulbena saṃvṛtas tasminn antraiś ca bahir āvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2524: BhP_03.31.008/2 āste kṛtvā śiraḥ kukṣau bhugna-pṛṣṭha-śirodharaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2525: BhP_03.31.009/1 akalpaḥ svāṅga-ceṣṭāyāṃ śakunta iva pañjare
GP10bhp_03u:2526: BhP_03.31.009/2 tatra labdha-smṛtir daivāt karma janma-śatodbhavam
GP10bhp_03u:2527: BhP_03.31.009/3 smaran dīrgham anucchvāsaṃ śarma kiṃ nāma vindate
GP10bhp_03u:2528: BhP_03.31.010/1 ārabhya saptamān māsāl labdha-bodho 'pi vepitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2529: BhP_03.31.010/2 naikatrāste sūti-vātair viṣṭhā-bhūr iva sodaraḥ BhP_03.31.011/1 nāthamāna ṛṣir bhītaḥ sapta-vadhriḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2530: BhP_03.31.011/2 stuvīta taṃ viklavayā vācā yenodare 'rpitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2531: BhP_03.31.012/0 jantur uvāca BhP_03.31.012/1 tasyopasannam avituṃ jagad icchayātta-
GP10bhp_03u:2533: BhP_03.31.012/3 so 'haṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ hy akuto-bhayaṃ me
GP10bhp_03u:2535: BhP_03.31.013/1 yas tv atra baddha iva karmabhir āvṛtātmā
GP10bhp_03u:2539: BhP_03.31.014/1 yaḥ pañca-bhūta-racite rahitaḥ śarīre BhP_03.31.014/2 cchanno 'yathendriya-guṇārtha-cid-ātmako
GP10bhp_03u:2544: BhP_03.31.015/3 naṣṭa-smṛtiḥ punar ayaṃ pravṛṇīta lokaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2546: BhP_03.31.016/1 jñānaṃ yad etad adadhāt katamaḥ sa devas
GP10bhp_03u:2549: BhP_03.31.016/4 tāpa-trayopaśamanāya vayaṃ bhajema BhP_03.31.017/1 dehy anya-deha-vivare
GP10bhp_03u:2551: BhP_03.31.017/3 icchann ito vivasituṃ gaṇayan sva-māsān
GP10bhp_03u:2552: BhP_03.31.017/4 nirvāsyate kṛpaṇa-dhīr bhagavan kadā nu
GP10bhp_03u:2553: BhP_03.31.018/1 yenedṛśīṃ gatim asau daśa-māsya īśa
GP10bhp_03u:2555: BhP_03.31.018/3 svenaiva tuṣyatu kṛtena sa dīna-nāthaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2556: BhP_03.31.018/4 ko nāma tat-prati vināñjalim asya kuryāt
GP10bhp_03u:2557: BhP_03.31.019/1 paśyaty ayaṃ dhiṣaṇayā nanu sapta-vadhriḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2559: BhP_03.31.019/3 yat-sṛṣṭayāsaṃ tam ahaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2560: BhP_03.31.019/4 paśye bahir hṛdi ca caityam iva pratītam
GP10bhp_03u:2561: BhP_03.31.020/1 so 'haṃ vasann api vibho bahu-duḥkha-vāsaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2562: BhP_03.31.020/2 garbhān na nirjigamiṣe bahir andha-kūpe
GP10bhp_03u:2564: BhP_03.31.020/4 mithyā matir yad-anu saṃsṛti-cakram etat
GP10bhp_03u:2567: BhP_03.31.021/3 bhūyo yathā vyasanam etad aneka-randhraṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2569: BhP_03.31.022/0 kapila uvāca BhP_03.31.022/1 evaṃ kṛta-matir garbhe daśa-māsyaḥ stuvann ṛṣiḥ BhP_03.31.022/2 sadyaḥ kṣipaty avācīnaṃ prasūtyai sūti-mārutaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2570: BhP_03.31.023/1 tenāvasṛṣṭaḥ sahasā kṛtvāvāk śira āturaḥ BhP_03.31.023/2 viniṣkrāmati kṛcchreṇa nirucchvāso hata-smṛtiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2571: BhP_03.31.024/1 patito bhuvy asṛṅ-miśraḥ viṣṭhā-bhūr iva ceṣṭate BhP_03.31.024/2 rorūyati gate jñāne viparītāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2572: BhP_03.31.025/1 para-cchandaṃ na viduṣā puṣyamāṇo janena saḥ BhP_03.31.025/2 anabhipretam āpannaḥ pratyākhyātum anīśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2575: BhP_03.31.027/1 tudanty āma-tvacaṃ daṃśā maśakā matkuṇādayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2576: BhP_03.31.027/2 rudantaṃ vigata-jñānaṃ kṛmayaḥ kṛmikaṃ yathā
GP10bhp_03u:2577: BhP_03.31.028/1 ity evaṃ śaiśavaṃ bhuktvā duḥkhaṃ paugaṇḍam eva ca BhP_03.31.028/2 alabdhābhīpsito 'jñānād iddha-manyuḥ śucārpitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2578: BhP_03.31.029/1 saha dehena mānena vardhamānena manyunā BhP_03.31.029/2 karoti vigrahaṃ kāmī kāmiṣv antāya cātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2579: BhP_03.31.030/1 bhūtaiḥ pañcabhir ārabdhe dehe dehy abudho 'sakṛt
GP10bhp_03u:2580: BhP_03.31.030/2 ahaṃ mamety asad-grāhaḥ karoti kumatir matim
GP10bhp_03u:2581: BhP_03.31.031/1 tad-arthaṃ kurute karma yad-baddho yāti saṃsṛtim BhP_03.31.031/2 yo 'nuyāti dadat kleśam avidyā-karma-bandhanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2582: BhP_03.31.032/1 yady asadbhiḥ pathi punaḥ śiśnodara-kṛtodyamaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2583: BhP_03.31.032/2 āsthito ramate jantus tamo viśati pūrvavat
GP10bhp_03u:2584: BhP_03.31.033/1 satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā maunaṃ buddhiḥ śrīr hrīr yaśaḥ kṣamā
GP10bhp_03u:2585: BhP_03.31.033/2 śamo damo bhagaś ceti yat-saṅgād yāti saṅkṣayam BhP_03.31.034/1 teṣv aśānteṣu mūḍheṣu khaṇḍitātmasv asādhuṣu BhP_03.31.034/2 saṅgaṃ na kuryāc chocyeṣu yoṣit-krīḍā-mṛgeṣu ca
GP10bhp_03u:2586: BhP_03.31.035/1 na tathāsya bhaven moho bandhaś cānya-prasaṅgataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2587: BhP_03.31.035/2 yoṣit-saṅgād yathā puṃso yathā tat-saṅgi-saṅgataḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2588: BhP_03.31.036/1 prajāpatiḥ svāṃ duhitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tad-rūpa-dharṣitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2590: BhP_03.31.037/1 tat-sṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭeṣu ko nv akhaṇḍita-dhīḥ pumān
GP10bhp_03u:2591: BhP_03.31.037/2 ṛṣiṃ nārāyaṇam ṛte yoṣin-mayyeha māyayā
GP10bhp_03u:2592: BhP_03.31.038/1 balaṃ me paśya māyāyāḥ strī-mayyā jayino diśām BhP_03.31.038/2 yā karoti padākrāntān bhrūvi-jṛmbheṇa kevalam
GP10bhp_03u:2593: BhP_03.31.039/1 saṅgaṃ na kuryāt pramadāsu jātu yogasya pāraṃ param ārurukṣuḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2594: BhP_03.31.039/2 mat-sevayā pratilabdhātma-lābho vadanti yā niraya-dvāram
GP10bhp_03u:2596: BhP_03.31.040/1 yopayāti śanair māyā yoṣid deva-vinirmitā
GP10bhp_03u:2597: BhP_03.31.040/2 tām īkṣetātmano mṛtyuṃ tṛṇaiḥ kūpam ivāvṛtam
GP10bhp_03u:2598: BhP_03.31.041/1 yāṃ manyate patiṃ mohān man-māyām ṛṣabhāyatīm
GP10bhp_03u:2601: BhP_03.31.042/2 daivopasāditaṃ mṛtyuṃ mṛgayor gāyanaṃ yathā BhP_03.31.043/1 dehena jīva-bhūtena lokāl lokam anuvrajan
GP10bhp_03u:2602: BhP_03.31.043/2 bhuñjāna eva karmāṇi karoty avirataṃ pumān
GP10bhp_03u:2603: BhP_03.31.044/1 jīvo hy asyānugo deho bhūtendriya-mano-mayaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2604: BhP_03.31.044/2 tan-nirodho 'sya maraṇam āvirbhāvas tu sambhavaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2605: BhP_03.31.045/1 dravyopalabdhi-sthānasya dravyekṣāyogyatā yadā BhP_03.31.045/2 tat pañcatvam ahaṃ-mānād utpattir dravya-darśanam
GP10bhp_03u:2606: BhP_03.31.046/1 yathākṣṇor dravyāvayava- darśanāyogyatā yadā BhP_03.31.046/2 tadaiva cakṣuṣo draṣṭur draṣṭṛtvāyogyatānayoḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2607: BhP_03.31.047/1 tasmān na kāryaḥ santrāso na kārpaṇyaṃ na sambhramaḥ BhP_03.31.047/2 buddhvā jīva-gatiṃ dhīro mukta-saṅgaś cared iha BhP_03.31.048/1 samyag-darśanayā buddhyā yoga-vairāgya-yuktayā
GP10bhp_03u:2608: BhP_03.31.048/2 māyā-viracite loke caren nyasya kalevaram
GP10bhp_03u:2609: BhP_03.32.001/0 kapila uvāca BhP_03.32.001/1 atha yo gṛha-medhīyān dharmān evāvasan gṛhe
GP10bhp_03u:2610: BhP_03.32.001/2 kāmam arthaṃ ca dharmān svān dogdhi bhūyaḥ piparti tān
GP10bhp_03u:2611: BhP_03.32.002/1 sa cāpi bhagavad-dharmāt kāma-mūḍhaḥ parāṅ-mukhaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2612: BhP_03.32.002/2 yajate kratubhir devān pit-ṃś ca śraddhayānvitaḥ BhP_03.32.003/1 tac-chraddhayākrānta-matiḥ pitṛ-deva-vrataḥ pumān
GP10bhp_03u:2613: BhP_03.32.003/2 gatvā cāndramasaṃ lokaṃ soma-pāḥ punar eṣyati BhP_03.32.004/1 yadā cāhīndra-śayyāyāṃ śete 'nantāsano hariḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2614: BhP_03.32.004/2 tadā lokā layaṃ yānti ta ete gṛha-medhinām
GP10bhp_03u:2615: BhP_03.32.005/1 ye sva-dharmān na duhyanti dhīrāḥ kāmārtha-hetave
GP10bhp_03u:2617: BhP_03.32.006/1 nivṛtti-dharma-niratā nirmamā nirahaṅkṛtāḥ BhP_03.32.006/2 sva-dharmāptena sattvena pariśuddhena cetasā
GP10bhp_03u:2618: BhP_03.32.007/1 sūrya-dvāreṇa te yānti puruṣaṃ viśvato-mukham
GP10bhp_03u:2620: BhP_03.32.008/1 dvi-parārdhāvasāne yaḥ pralayo brahmaṇas tu te BhP_03.32.008/2 tāvad adhyāsate lokaṃ parasya para-cintakāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2627: BhP_03.32.010/3 tenaiva sākam amṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ BhP_03.32.010/4 brahma pradhānam upayānty
GP10bhp_03u:2628: BhP_03.32.011/1 atha taṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ hṛt-padmeṣu kṛtālayam
GP10bhp_03u:2629: BhP_03.32.011/2 śrutānubhāvaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja bhāvena bhāmini BhP_03.32.012/1 ādyaḥ sthira-carāṇāṃ yo veda-garbhaḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2631: BhP_03.32.013/1 bheda-dṛṣṭyābhimānena niḥsaṅgenāpi karmaṇā BhP_03.32.013/2 kartṛtvāt saguṇaṃ brahma puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabham BhP_03.32.014/1 sa saṃsṛtya punaḥ kāle kāleneśvara-mūrtinā
GP10bhp_03u:2633: BhP_03.32.015/1 aiśvaryaṃ pārameṣṭhyaṃ ca te 'pi dharma-vinirmitam
GP10bhp_03u:2634: BhP_03.32.015/2 niṣevya punar āyānti guṇa-vyatikare sati
GP10bhp_03u:2635: BhP_03.32.016/1 ye tv ihāsakta-manasaḥ karmasu śraddhayānvitāḥ BhP_03.32.016/2 kurvanty apratiṣiddhāni nityāny api ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2637: BhP_03.32.017/2 pit-n yajanty anudinaṃ gṛheṣv abhiratāśayāḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2638: BhP_03.32.018/1 trai-vargikās te puruṣā vimukhā hari-medhasaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2639: BhP_03.32.018/2 kathāyāṃ kathanīyoru- vikramasya madhudviṣaḥ BhP_03.32.019/1 nūnaṃ daivena vihatā ye cācyuta-kathā-sudhām
GP10bhp_03u:2640: BhP_03.32.019/2 hitvā śṛṇvanty asad-gāthāḥ purīṣam iva viḍ-bhujaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2641: BhP_03.32.020/1 dakṣiṇena pathāryamṇaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ vrajanti te BhP_03.32.020/2 prajām anu prajāyante śmaśānānta-kriyā-kṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2642: BhP_03.32.021/1 tatas te kṣīṇa-sukṛtāḥ punar lokam imaṃ sati
GP10bhp_03u:2643: BhP_03.32.021/1 patanti vivaśā devaiḥ sadyo vibhraṃśitodayāḥ BhP_03.32.022/1 tasmāt tvaṃ sarva-bhāvena bhajasva parameṣṭhinam BhP_03.32.022/2 tad-guṇāśrayayā bhaktyā bhajanīya-padāmbujam
GP10bhp_03u:2645: BhP_03.32.023/2 janayaty āśu vairāgyaṃ jñānaṃ yad brahma-darśanam
GP10bhp_03u:2646: BhP_03.32.024/1 yadāsya cittam artheṣu sameṣv indriya-vṛttibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2647: BhP_03.32.024/2 na vigṛhṇāti vaiṣamyaṃ priyam apriyam ity uta
GP10bhp_03u:2650: BhP_03.32.026/1 jñāna-mātraṃ paraṃ brahma paramātmeśvaraḥ pumān
GP10bhp_03u:2651: BhP_03.32.026/2 dṛśy-ādibhiḥ pṛthag bhāvair bhagavān eka īyate BhP_03.32.027/1 etāvān eva yogena samagreṇeha yoginaḥ BhP_03.32.027/2 yujyate 'bhimato hy artho yad asaṅgas tu kṛtsnaśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2652: BhP_03.32.028/1 jñānam ekaṃ parācīnair indriyair brahma nirguṇam
GP10bhp_03u:2654: BhP_03.32.029/1 yathā mahān ahaṃ-rūpas tri-vṛt pañca-vidhaḥ svarāṭ
GP10bhp_03u:2655: BhP_03.32.029/2 ekādaśa-vidhas tasya vapur aṇḍaṃ jagad yataḥ BhP_03.32.030/1 etad vai śraddhayā bhaktyā yogābhyāsena nityaśaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2657: BhP_03.32.031/1 ity etat kathitaṃ gurvi jñānaṃ tad brahma-darśanam
GP10bhp_03u:2658: BhP_03.32.031/2 yenānubuddhyate tattvaṃ prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca BhP_03.32.032/1 jñāna-yogaś ca man-niṣṭho nairguṇyo bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2659: BhP_03.32.032/2 dvayor apy eka evārtho bhagavac-chabda-lakṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2661: BhP_03.32.033/2 eko nāneyate tadvad bhagavān śāstra-vartmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2664: BhP_03.32.035/1 yogena vividhāṅgena bhakti-yogena caiva hi BhP_03.32.035/2 dharmeṇobhaya-cihnena yaḥ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān
GP10bhp_03u:2666: BhP_03.32.036/2 īyate bhagavān ebhiḥ saguṇo nirguṇaḥ sva-dṛk
GP10bhp_03u:2667: BhP_03.32.037/1 prāvocaṃ bhakti-yogasya svarūpaṃ te catur-vidham
GP10bhp_03u:2670: BhP_03.32.038/2 yāsv aṅga praviśann ātmā na veda gatim ātmanaḥ BhP_03.32.039/1 naitat khalāyopadiśen nāvinītāya karhicit
GP10bhp_03u:2671: BhP_03.32.039/2 na stabdhāya na bhinnāya naiva dharma-dhvajāya ca
GP10bhp_03u:2673: BhP_03.32.040/2 nābhaktāya ca me jātu na mad-bhakta-dviṣām api
GP10bhp_03u:2675: BhP_03.32.041/2 bhūteṣu kṛta-maitrāya śuśrūṣābhiratāya ca BhP_03.32.042/1 bahir-jāta-virāgāya śānta-cittāya dīyatām
GP10bhp_03u:2676: BhP_03.32.042/2 nirmatsarāya śucaye yasyāhaṃ preyasāṃ priyaḥ BhP_03.32.043/1 ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād amba śraddhayā puruṣaḥ sakṛt
GP10bhp_03u:2677: BhP_03.32.043/2 yo vābhidhatte mac-cittaḥ sa hy eti padavīṃ ca me
GP10bhp_03u:2678: BhP_03.33.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.33.001/1 evaṃ niśamya kapilasya vaco janitrīsā kardamasya dayitā kila devahūtiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2680: BhP_03.33.002/0 devahūtir uvāca BhP_03.33.002/1 athāpy ajo 'ntaḥ-salile śayānaṃ bhūtendriyārthātma-mayaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2681: vapus te BhP_03.33.002/2 guṇa-pravāhaṃ sad-aśeṣa-bījaṃ dadhyau svayaṃ yaj-jaṭharābja-jātaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2682: BhP_03.33.003/1 sa eva viśvasya bhavān vidhatte guṇa-pravāheṇa
GP10bhp_03u:2686: BhP_03.33.004/1 sa tvaṃ bhṛto me jaṭhareṇa nātha kathaṃ nu yasyodara etad āsīt BhP_03.33.004/2 viśvaṃ yugānte vaṭa-patra ekaḥ śete sma māyā-śiśur
GP10bhp_03u:2688: BhP_03.33.005/1 tvaṃ deha-tantraḥ praśamāya pāpmanāṃ nideśa-bhājāṃ ca vibho vibhūtaye
GP10bhp_03u:2689: BhP_03.33.005/2 yathāvatārās tava sūkarādayas tathāyam apy ātma-pathopalabdhaye
GP10bhp_03u:2691: api kvacit BhP_03.33.006/2 śvādo 'pi sadyaḥ savanāya kalpate kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu
GP10bhp_03u:2692: BhP_03.33.007/1 aho bata śva-paco 'to garīyān yaj-jihvāgre vartate nāma tubhyam
GP10bhp_03u:2693: BhP_03.33.007/2 tepus tapas te juhuvuḥ sasnur āryā brahmānūcur nāma gṛṇanti ye te
GP10bhp_03u:2694: BhP_03.33.008/1 taṃ tvām ahaṃ brahma paraṃ pumāṃsaṃ pratyak-srotasy ātmani saṃvibhāvyam BhP_03.33.008/2 sva-tejasā dhvasta-guṇa-pravāhaṃ vande viṣṇuṃ kapilaṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2696: BhP_03.33.009/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.33.009/1 īḍito bhagavān evaṃ kapilākhyaḥ paraḥ pumān
GP10bhp_03u:2698: BhP_03.33.010/0 kapila uvāca BhP_03.33.010/1 mārgeṇānena mātas te susevyenoditena me BhP_03.33.010/2 āsthitena parāṃ kāṣṭhām acirād avarotsyasi BhP_03.33.011/1 śraddhatsvaitan mataṃ mahyaṃ juṣṭaṃ yad brahma-vādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2699: BhP_03.33.011/2 yena mām abhayaṃ yāyā mṛtyum ṛcchanty atad-vidaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2700: BhP_03.33.012/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_03.33.012/1 iti pradarśya bhagavān satīṃ tām ātmano
GP10bhp_03u:2702: BhP_03.33.013/1 sā cāpi tanayoktena yogādeśena yoga-yuk
GP10bhp_03u:2703: BhP_03.33.013/2 tasminn āśrama āpīḍe sarasvatyāḥ samāhitā BhP_03.33.014/1 abhīkṣṇāvagāha-kapiśān jaṭilān kuṭilālakān BhP_03.33.014/2 ātmānaṃ cogra-tapasā bibhratī cīriṇaṃ kṛśam
GP10bhp_03u:2705: BhP_03.33.015/2 sva-gārhasthyam anaupamyaṃ prārthyaṃ vaimānikair api
GP10bhp_03u:2707: BhP_03.33.016/2 āsanāni ca haimāni susparśāstaraṇāni ca BhP_03.33.017/1 svaccha-sphaṭika-kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca
GP10bhp_03u:2711: BhP_03.33.019/1 yatra praviṣṭam ātmānaṃ vibudhānucarā jaguḥ BhP_03.33.019/2 vāpyām utpala-gandhinyāṃ
GP10bhp_03u:2712: BhP_03.33.020/1 hitvā tad īpsitatamam apy ākhaṇḍala-yoṣitām
GP10bhp_03u:2715: BhP_03.33.021/2 jñāta-tattvāpy abhūn naṣṭe vatse gaur iva vatsalā
GP10bhp_03u:2716: BhP_03.33.022/1 tam eva dhyāyatī devam apatyaṃ kapilaṃ harim
GP10bhp_03u:2717: BhP_03.33.022/2 babhūvācirato vatsa niḥspṛhā tādṛśe gṛhe BhP_03.33.023/1 dhyāyatī bhagavad-rūpaṃ yad āha dhyāna-gocaram
GP10bhp_03u:2719: BhP_03.33.024/1 bhakti-pravāha-yogena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā BhP_03.33.024/2 yuktānuṣṭhāna-jātena jñānena brahma-hetunā
GP10bhp_03u:2725: BhP_03.33.027/2 na sasmāra tadātmānaṃ svapne dṛṣṭam ivotthitaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2726: BhP_03.33.028/1 tad-dehaḥ parataḥ poṣo 'py akṛśaś cādhy-asambhavāt
GP10bhp_03u:2727: BhP_03.33.028/2 babhau malair avacchannaḥ sadhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2730: BhP_03.33.030/1 evaṃ sā kapiloktena mārgeṇācirataḥ param BhP_03.33.030/2 ātmānaṃ brahma-nirvāṇaṃ bhagavantam avāpa ha
GP10bhp_03u:2731: BhP_03.33.031/1 tad vīrāsīt puṇyatamaṃ kṣetraṃ trailokya-viśrutam
GP10bhp_03u:2732: BhP_03.33.031/2 nāmnā siddha-padaṃ yatra sā saṃsiddhim upeyuṣī
GP10bhp_03u:2733: BhP_03.33.032/1 tasyās tad yoga-vidhuta- mārtyaṃ martyam abhūt sarit
GP10bhp_03u:2734: BhP_03.33.032/2 srotasāṃ pravarā saumya siddhidā siddha-sevitā
GP10bhp_03u:2735: BhP_03.33.033/1 kapilo 'pi mahā-yogī bhagavān pitur āśramāt
GP10bhp_03u:2736: BhP_03.33.033/2 mātaraṃ samanujñāpya prāg-udīcīṃ diśaṃ yayau BhP_03.33.034/1 siddha-cāraṇa-gandharvair munibhiś cāpsaro-gaṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2738: BhP_03.33.035/1 āste yogaṃ samāsthāya sāṅkhyācāryair abhiṣṭutaḥ BhP_03.33.035/2 trayāṇām api lokānām upaśāntyai samāhitaḥ BhP_03.33.036/1 etan nigaditaṃ tāta yat pṛṣṭo 'haṃ tavānagha
GP10bhp_03u:2739: BhP_03.33.036/2 kapilasya ca saṃvādo devahūtyāś ca pāvanaḥ
GP10bhp_03u:2740: BhP_03.33.037/1 ya idam anuśṛṇoti yo 'bhidhatte kapila-muner matam
